more description: A True 4 Season Resort- Enjoy the inside pool and hot tub during the Fall and Winter and then go to the Outdoor Pools in the Spring and Summer. Play Tennis or Pickleball, walk or ride a bike across the marsh to the beach.  Have the best vacation!The spaceCheck out all this renovated vacation rental villa has to offer at our Hilton Head Resort villa.  It has an open floor plan with quartz counter-tops, stainless appliances, stainless farm sink, and tile plank flooring throughout.  The villa sleeps 6 with a queen bed in the main bedroom, 2 twin and a twin over full bunkbed in the second bedroom.  It comfortably sleeps 6 people and is located on the quiet third floor.  Elevator is close to the entrance of the villa.Hilton Head Resort has amazing amenities, well maintained grounds, and it is a short walk or bike ride to the beach. You can also ride the beach shuttle during the summer season.  Gated Community with 24-hr. SecurityShort boardwalk across the marsh to beachIndoor Heated PoolHot tub2 Outdoor poolsFree Wi-FiTennis Courts, Pickleball Courts, and Badminton CourtBarbecue Grills and Tables for grillingBike Rentals on siteAll Resort Amenities included in reservation

Completely remodeled from with all new fixtures, furnishings, housewares and accessories, this charming beach villa has just opened its doors for guests in March 2019.  Amenities include coffee, cocoa, popcorn, breakfast treats and bottled water to consume; and beach towels, chairs, umbrellas and other items to borrow while here.The spaceEnjoy a sampling of fruit and snacks as well as bottled water and fresh flowers.  Please tell us about your special occasion and we will do our best to make it extra special upon your arrival.Sleeping areas include queen pillow top bed in master bedroom, queen size sleeper sofa with gel mattress in living room and two bunk beds with plush toppers for comfort in separate sleeping area with doors for privacy.

description: Oceanview at Breakers - Vitamin’Sea
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by The Boys Of HHI2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in November 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Situated in the heart of Coligny, Vitamin’Sea at The Breakers is the perfect place to relax and unwind. The year-round heated pool and spectacular ocean views are two of the greatest highlights. I do not know if you will find a more private and romantic villa that is more tastefully designed and decorated in the Coligny area. Now with 2 Elevators.Breathe in the sea air from the balcony from the high-top table and chairs. Or, just sit on the sofa to watch the surf.The spaceThis charming one bedroom, one bath, with pools and ocean view end-unit is located on the second floor. There is a new elevator on the North end of the complex. The one bedroom, with plush Queen bed, high thread count sheets, a ceiling fan and has a large flat panel TV is perfect for enjoying movies in bed. The well-equipped kitchen has a full-size stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, and both Keurig and Nespresso coffee/espresso makers. Electrolux steam washing machine and steam dryer make laundry enjoyable. Vitimin’Sea is perfectly located at the Coligny Beach Plaza and situated on the award-winning best island on the continental United States. You should not need to pack anything other than your vacation clothes, flip-flops, and a toothbrush. We hope we have included everything and anything you could ever desire or ask for.Over 60 shops, restaurants, and the Piggly Wiggly supermarket are within walking distance of Coligny Plaza. And you are next door to the popular Coligny Beach Plaza.This villa is located in the middle of everything and has endless bike/jogging trails that connect with the island's 75-mile path network. The home boasts some additional luxury features like Alexa pucks, smartphone charging stations throughout, Netflix movies and so much more. The bedroom and baths feature Beekman 1802 designer amenities, alarm clocks, white noise machines, earplugs, and a ceiling fan. The towels and linens are of high-quality and high thread count.

description: #BEACHES ARE OPEN-VILLA W/ POOL, BEACHFRONT RESORT
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by April & Derek5 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in March 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Our two bedroom, two bath Villa is a first floor unit and a three minute walk to the sandy shores of Hilton Head Island. Our gated resort features numerous amenities: two pools (one of which is the largest beach front pool on the island), 10 lighted tennis courts, fitness center, bike rental, playground, and three restaurants. Reserve your beach vacation today!The spaceFirst floor Villa that is fully equipped with everything you need to make you feel like you're at home while at the beach. Your long-past-due beach retreat awaits you the moment you arrive at our two bedroom, two bathroom Villa that is nestled in the Hilton Head Island Beach & Tennis Resort.  You’ll be charmed by the coastal decor throughout and the close proximity to the beach, pool, restaurants, etc. The property features an open floor concept, making this unit ideal for families traveling together. With plush furniture and a large Smart TV, the inviting living room provides the perfect place to gather with your loved ones. Behind the living area is a dining room table that comfortably seats six.  The fully equipped kitchen makes it ideal and convenient for a short or long term stay.  After a fun-filled day on the sandy shores of Hilton Head Island, you’ll be happy to retreat to the cozy master bedroom with a King bed, TV, and full bathroom.  The second spacious bedroom features one queen bed and one twin bed and a TV as well.Be sure to make use of all the amazing community amenities this property has to offer. Take the kids to the playground, go for a swim in the pool or get a quick workout in at the fitness center. There’s no shortage of fun activities at your disposal when you stay at the Hilton Head Island Beach and Tennis Resort.***Traveling with friends or a larger group?  We also own another two bedroom/two bathroom Tennis Villa in the same resort. Along with a one bedroom/one bathroom oceanfront Ocean Villa.  Check out our other listings below or send us a message with further questions:  https://abnb.me/WoMF5rzoo3https://abnb.me/34URNZCqo3

more description: This one bedroom, one bath oceanfront Villa is a third floor end unit that sleeps 5. There is a queen bed, a set of bunk beds (Intended for children) and a twin size sleeper sofa. It is a three minute walk to the sandy shores of Hilton Head Island. The gated resort has these amenities: two pools (one of which is the largest beach front pool on the island), 10 tennis courts, pickle ball courts, fitness center, bike rental, playground, and three restaurants. Reserve your beach vacation today!The spaceThird floor (elevator in the building), end unit Villa with AMAZING views of the Atlantic Ocean and Hilton Head beaches from outdoor balcony and living room. The Villa is fully equipped with everything you need to make you feel like you're at home while at the beach.  This Villa has been completely remodeled from top to bottom: new stainless steel appliances, kitchen cabinets, quartz countertops, new flooring throughout, new furniture in every room, new bathroom, new fixtures...no expense was spared for this luxury Villa.Your long-past-due beach retreat awaits you the moment you arrive at this one bedroom, one bathroom Ocean Villa that is nestled in the Hilton Head Island Beach & Tennis Resort. You'll be charmed by the coastal decor throughout and the very short walk to the beach, pool, restaurants, etc.The property features an open floor concept, making this unit ideal for a couple's getaway or a family with a couple young children. With plush furniture and a large flat-screen cable TV set up, the inviting living room provides the perfect place to relax after a day at the beach.Adjoining the living room area is the modern kitchen with full size appliances and a large island that comfortably seats four people for meals and a gathering place. The fully equipped kitchen makes it ideal and convenient for a short or long term stay.After a fun-filled day on the sandy shores of Hilton Head Island, you'll be happy to retreat to the cozy bedroom with a comfortable queen bed. There's aset of bunk beds built into the hallway outside the bedroom, these are intended for children and are a perfect space and novelty for the little ones. You’ll also be able to use the twin size sleeper sofa. Be sure to make use of all the amazing community amenities this property has to offer. Take the kids to the playground, go for a swim in the pool or get a quick workout in at the fitness center. There's no shortage of fun activities at your disposal when you stay at the Hilton Head Island Beach and Tennis Resort. I look forward to hosting you!

number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in October 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: LUXURIOUS, PENTHOUSE, DIRECT OCEANFRONT HOME! UNOBSTRUCTED OCEAN VIEWS! SO CLOSE YOU CAN HEAR THE WAVES CRASH WITH THE WINDOWS CLOSED! DIRECT BEACH ACCESS! POOL ACCESS! ALL BRAND NEW! 4TH FLOOR (TOP FLOOR)! PRIVATE BALCONY! MILLION DOLLAR OCEAN VIEWS! SPA SHOWER! KING BED! CAN SLEEP 4! THIS IS LUXURY LIVING WITH NO RESORT AMENITY CHARGES! SAVE THOUSANDS OF DOLLARS COMPARED TO OTHER NAMED RESORTS LUXURY HOTEL PROPERTIES!**UPGRADED INTERNET & HD TV PACKAGE + FREE AMENITIES**The spaceYour newly renovated and remodeled HGTV inspired luxurious ocean front vacation home is located inside the award winning Hilton Head Beach & Tennis Resort.  Located on the #1 island in the US, America’s Favorite Island since 2016, and the #2 Beach Town in the South…Ocean Overlook II awaits you, your family, and friends.  Ocean Overlook II is one of the closet ocean front homes on all of Hilton Head Island and offers the most expansive and breath-taking panoramic views of the Atlantic Ocean from the highest floor possible on the resort!  With a four foot custom coffee bar and spa bathroom offering a custom two foot rainfall/waterfall shower head with six body jets, regular shower head, and handheld body sprayer with recess shower lighting...this 4th floor penthouse home truly redefines what it means to enjoy a luxurious escape at an ocean front beach retreat experience.  Ocean Overlook II has been completely upgraded, updated and fully equipped.  The kitchen has been redesigned and includes: new quartz countertops, all new fingerprint stainless steel appliances, a four foot custom coffee bar that can double as additional dining space for two, over 60 square feet of a custom subway ceramic tile design defines the coffee bar and kitchen area, floating shelving, along with a fully equipped kitchen that offers a variety of equipment for cooking and baking, such as: crock-pot, Ninja blender, waffle makers, etc.  Your designated four foot coffee bar area has also been designed for your enjoyment and includes: a drip coffee maker, K-Elite (Keurig machine for brewing coffees/teas/espressos), a robust bean grinder, a Capresso that will perfect a latte, cappuccino, or shot of espresso, an Aeroccino (milk frother) for topping those perfect lattes and cappuccinos, an electric kettle to make teas and pour overs even easier, and an Aeropress for anyone desiring to take their coffee skills to the next level…coffee supplies are not provided by owner.  Your great room has been fully furnished with: a dining table that seats two and doubles as a work space for anyone needing to complete work remotely, additional dining space can be utilized at the coffee bar as it doubles for additional dining for two, a couch that converts to a queen size bed, windows and doors slide open to ensure you create the perfect ocean breeze, a Samsung 65” 4K UHD HDR TV (which includes cable & Netflix access), and a 52” high-end ceiling fan for a true entertainment experience!  Your master bedroom has also been equipped with: a Samsung 65” 4K UHD HDR TV (which includes cable), a 52” high-end ceiling fan, closet space with hanging racks, night stands, a ten foot custom tiled accent wall from floor to ceiling, a custom hand woven bed frame and matching dresser with six drawers for storage, a TEMPER-Pedic king size mattress to ensure ultra comfort and personal pleasure, and additional closet storage.  The bathroom has been redesigned with a custom shower that was handmade in California that includes: a two foot rainfall shower head, a two foot waterfall shower head, six body jets, a regular shower head, and a handheld body wand. The shower systems can work independently or all at the same time...even though our home is equipped with a fifty gallon hot water heater, if you use the entire shower system at one time (all ten shower heads) the length of time that hot water is available could be reduced.  The shower was installed for users to be able to turn on the water without getting wet so it can be the perfect temperature before shower entry.  The niche has even been extended over two feet and the shower ends are solid slabs of quartz!  The vanity is 48" and has been topped with a matching solid slab of quartz from the shower.  The vanity lighting was ordered from a speciality lighting store just outside of Atlanta and the mirror lights up to provide additional lighting (if needed) and allows for bluetooth connectivity if you desire to listen to music will in the bathroom.Fast, free & secure wi-fi is included for everyone staying with you in your vacation home.  When it’s time to shut the technology off, a library of board games are accessible.Our 5-star cleaning service will prepare your vacation home and provide you with a starter kit that includes: fresh linens, fresh towels for four people, paper towels, toilet paper, shampoo, conditioner, and soap.Ocean Overlook II is the ultimate beach experience that allows you to enjoy all of the sites and sounds of the ocean from your the comfort of your vacation home.  It maximizes privacy while enjoying miles of endless, preserved sandy shoreline views...normally viewed from million dollar mansions.  Ocean Overlook II provides you with access to a complete list of amenities such as: 57 acres of beautifully landscaped grounds, resort restaurants & bars, free tennis, free pickleball, free volleyball, free playground access, free access to fishing areas, free access to multiple picnic & BBQ areas, free gym & fitness center access, and free access to two pools with one being the largest olympic-sized pool on the island, and onsite bike rentals.If you decide to leave the resort, Ocean Overlook II is only 3 miles to the Hilton Head Airport, within 6 miles of 24 championship golf courses & the famous Coligny Plaza, 7 miles of 50 restaurants, and 8 miles of 500+ stores for shopping.  The island trolly service, known as "The Breeze," will even assist you getting to major places on the island from the resort if you do not have a car.ADDITIONAL NOTES:*You must be 25 years or older to rent.*Parking pass required for each vehicle.*Our availability calendar is updated in real-time.*Guest entry is utilized with a unique digital code which is specifically reset for your stay.HOUSE RULES:*No pets*Report villa issues ASAP*No loud music on balcony*Do not rearrange furniture*Please leave sand on the beach*No smoking or open flame of any kind*Always follow renter agreement rules & guidelines*Always close & lock windows & doors (when unoccupied)*Always turn off appliances, TVs, lights, etc (when unoccupied)*Always store bikes on bike racks near parking lot (locks recommended)

more description: Welcome to Beachwalk Bungalow! Our beautifully updated 3 BR 3.5 BA townhome is THE definition of a *prime* location. Walk to the stunning, private Shipyard Beach in under 5 mins, and enjoy the community pool right outside your front door! This spacious property is family-friendly with many areas to unwind and relax including two family rooms on the main level, a huge eat-in kitchen, a brand new private deck off the back with a gas grill, and two owner's suites. Cozy and nicely decorated!The spaceThe most important thing to know is that Beachwalk Bungalow is located in the best neighborhood in the Shipyard development - the closest one to the beach! 🏖 Our home is at the front of the neighborhood which makes it the shortest walk to the beach possible, and we are right across the cul-de-sac from the large community pool 🏊‍♀️ which is a huge hit with kids and parents!As you come in the front door, you'll pass a spacious living room on your right, followed by the powder room/laundry room, followed by a big open family room / fully stocked kitchen / dining room combo space. There is a sliding glass door leading to the brand new oversized deck with even more space to kick back and enjoy the warmth of HHI! In the yard behind the deck is a propane gas grill for you to use as much as you'd like.The upper level has 3 bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms - two of the bedrooms are Owner's Suites with King beds and en-suite baths, and the third bedroom has two twin beds and another full bath directly across the hall. All bedrooms are spacious and have great closet space and storage. Beachwalk Bungalow has multiple TVs, all equipped with basic cable and streaming connections. We provide free Netflix and HBO Max, and you're welcome to log in to your own services as well! There is free, unmarked parking in the cul-de-sac where this home is located as well as bike parking (Shipyard and Hilton Head are designed to be explored by bike, the island is covered in beautiful paths). 🚲 👶🏼 We are infant and child friendly! Enjoy our complimentary amenities: mini crib, firm mattress and crib sheet; high chair (also converts to a baby outdoor/beach chair); baby dishes & bibs; diaper pail; and a small assortment of baby/young child books, toys, and pool floats.

more description: Message me for the free night or book it & I can adjust the rate immediatelyOCEAN VIEW-Amazing View-Beachfront 65” & 43” smart TV’s Beachfront-3 MIN WALK to oceanKING BED! Beautiful updatesBeachfront condo. Hilton Head Island is a favorite US Island.  Enjoy the tropical landscape with miles of bike trailsSleeps 4- 1 KING BED w/bunks in the same roomBunks are not TWIN SIZE but kid size.Beachfront RESORT, private beach, 2 restaurants, beachfront pool, fitness center & bike rentalThe spaceEnjoy your morning coffee while relaxing on the private balcony. You’ll love the amazing view and sensory experience. Listen to the waves...Breath in the fresh ocean air... Enjoy a beautiful beachfront ocean view...Our stays are different than hotel stays. Our condo offers extra comforts. The following is a 1 or 2 minute read and provides important information so that you are prepared for your stay: BATH AMENITIES We provide the following:1. Hotel size shampoo, conditioner, and shower gel and/or soap2. Hand soap3. Extra roll of toilet paper  KITCHEN SUPPLIES1. 1 small sized dish soap2. 1 scrub pad3. 2 dishwasher pods4. 1 roll paper towel5. 3 trash bags. This is only enough for a 1- or 2-night stay, please bring extra toilet paper, bathroom and kitchen essentials if needed.We have a single serve KUERIG. Bring your personal coffee supplies.We DO NOT Supply beach towels, chairs, umbrellas or toys. We can provide rental information.One parking pass is included with cleaning fee. Extra passes are $25 each and you’ll need to let me know ahead of time if needed.Our guests are an extraordinary part of the Airbnb Community, and they help us by being GREEN, CLEAN and SUPREME guests! This allows us to continue to offer a great stay at a good value.  Be a GREEN GUESTGreen guests conserve water by reusing towels. Each guest is provided with a set of towels.  If needed there is a pay laundry on the first and second floors. Cards can be purchased at the guest services building when you check in. Be a CLEAN GUEST You pay a cleaning fee that covers sanitization and refreshing after each stay.  While on vacation we don't want to ask much of you.  To keep with our high standards of sanitization and make a smooth transition to our next guest, please take a few minutes prior to departure to do the following:1. Place dirty towels in the tub and unused towels on bedroom shelf.  Why am I being asked to do this?Less laundry= less water usage= a greener environment2. Leave used beds unmade3. Load and start dishwasherWhy am I being asked to do this? If you start the dishwasher before the cleaner arrives, we are assured they are finished drying and fully disinfected prior to the next guest arrival4. Remove all trash and place in garbage bins located in the parking lotWhy am I being asked to do this?We have found this method keeps the condo smelling its freshest for the next guest  Be a SUPREME GUEST Our guests are supreme. They are each equally important to us and demonstrate great qualities and character.Thank you for booking our place! We’re here to help before and during your stay. Please reach out anytime with questions or suggestions for restaurants, excursions or attractions. We’re here to help!

more description: GPS address, 3 North Forest Beach Drive, HHI, SC 29928North Shore Place is a fabulous newer upscale condominium complex on North Forest Beach Drive. It is located directly across from both the ocean approximately (100 yards) and Coligny Plaza. This 1290 square feet, 2nd floor Villa features a king size bed in the master, two double beds in the guest room and a sofa bed.The spaceGPS address, 3 North Forest Beach Drive, HHI, SC 29928North Shore Place is a fabulous newer upscale condominium complex on North Forest Beach Drive. It is located directly across  the street from both the ocean, Coligny Plaza and one of the Sea Crest’s pools which you will also have access to. The Sea Crest pools are heated during the months of March and April. This Villa is 1290 soft and is located on the second floor of the building with a large covered veranda to enjoy the cool ocean breezes and views of the landscaping and street. There is a spectacular rooftop swimming pool and sundeck on the 4th floor. It has an easily accessible beach walk that leads directly to the beach. The villa is conveniently located within a block from the beach & adjacent to Coligny Plaza with its shopping, grocery store, and various restaurants with live entertainment. North Shore Place Villas features secured covered gated parking under the building for your vehicle (code required/space available) and elevator access to all floors (code required). Luggage carts and bike racks are plentiful in the covered garage area.This elegant, spacious villa has stone floors, high ceilings, and beautiful moldings and is designer decorated. The living room offers numerous windows, all with designer draperies. The living area is beautifully decorated with large comfortable chairs. The kitchen has a large bar with seating for four, stainless steel GE appliances and white cabinets. The dining area, beside the kitchen, has a large table with seating for six. The master bedroom has a King bed with matching end tables and designer window treatments, Smart Cable TV and spacious private bath with walk-in shower and separate oversized soaking tub. The guest bedroom has two double beds and a private bath with tub and shower combination. The villa also has it's own stackable washer and dryer.Of additional interest is a spacious veranda overlooking Coligny Plaza, which is adjacent to North Shore. So not only are you right across the street from Seacrest and use of that oceanfront pool, but you are next to Coligny Plaza with all of its many shops, restaurants, grocery store, bakery, gourmet coffee and the famous Frosty Frog. You may find you don't need to get back into the car for anything. Beach chairs and umbrella are available for rent March - October.

description: Charming villa with pool, balcony, full kitchen, central AC, & washer/dryer
name: Villa in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire villa hosted by Vacasa South Carolina6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 4 beds ·  · 2.5 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 2.5 baths**__**Joined in December 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
The spaceSurf Court Villas 5The famous white shores of Hilton Head Beach are just one block away from this coastal charmer. Walk directly to the beach via the walkway across the street and spend sun-soaked days lounging on the shore. For extra adventure, book a dolphin tour or rent bikes and take a ride on one of the island's popular nature trails. Walk or bike less than a half-mile to Coligny Circle for a plethora of dining and shopping options, convenient amenities, and recreation at Coligny Beach Park and the Coligny Plaza Shopping Center. Several world-class golf courses are available on the island. Make sure to use the property's glittering pool for some much-needed you-time.

Upon entry, you'll be met with a bright interior and a warm feeling of welcome throughout the space. Relax and make yourself at home by resting on the plush furniture, watching your favorite shows on the large TV, or having brunch on the private balcony. Prepare grand meals and beach picnic snacks in the full kitchen, equipped with stainless steel appliances, a breakfast bar, and a formal dining table. Two bedrooms ensure that everyone will receive a comfortable night's rest from the day's adventures, especially for those who sleep in the bunk beds- perfect for kids to host their own sleepovers!

Make memories that'll last a lifetime when you spend your vacation here on the gorgeous Hilton Head Island.

SHARED AMENITIES
-Pool

THINGS TO KNOW
This property is managed by Vacasa Vacation Rentals of Hilton Head Island LLC. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 2.Parking notes: There is free parking for 1 vehicles. Complex parkingCity/town permit number:30743

more description: Hilton Head awaits at this 2-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom condo! This completely renovated (2019) unit for 8 has1,340 sq. ft., updated paint, furniture, appliances, and offers access to the Courtside Villas 2 pools (Open April 1-Oct 31).The ideal location is within a 1/2 mile of the beach and Coligny Plaza featuring shops, galleries, and restaurants. The newly completed Lowcountry Celebration Park is 0.7 miles from the condo. An hour/day of free tennis at VanDerMeer Tennis is included (w/ reservations)The spaceThis is a two story townhome is one flight above street level. Updated paint, furnishings, new appliances (in 2019) and ample natural light create an inviting space for you! Gather in the living room to watch the flat-screen TV while you get settled.Stainless steel appliances await your favorite recipe in the fully equipped kitchen. Converse with the cook at the 2-person breakfast bar before sitting down to a tasty meal at the dining table. (Please see Other Things to Note for list of items supplied).Step down the balcony’s spiral staircase to visit the pool. Cool off with a refreshing swim while others achieve a sun-kissed look in the lounge chairs.End the day in one of the 2 bedrooms each featuring comfy beds, en-suite bathrooms, and TVs.

description: Beach Resort-OceanView Villa-Stylish Total Remodel
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Maria4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 4 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in January 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: FULLY REMODELED OCEAN VIEW VILLALocated in Hilton Head Beach & Tennis Resort, this beautiful 540 Square foot  Villa is perfect for a small family or couple looking for a relaxing and fun getaway. The second floor balcony offers a view of both the ocean and pool, as well as, offering the soothing sounds of the ocean wavesLocated within a gated community and with access to the beach just steps away.  The resort also features  2 private pools,  3 restaurants, bike rentals, a private gym & more!The spaceThis Villa will not disappoint! The location is fantastic and is just steps away from the beach, pool, and ocean side bar & grill.  The second floor balcony, with all new seating, is the perfect place to unwind, sip your morning coffee, or evening wine, and let the cares of the world fade away.We offer a private queen bedroom with it's own TV,  1 set of adorably themed bunks in the hallway with fun LED lighting (best suited for children under12 size 75” X 25”), and a  brand new sofa sleeper.  However, the villa is 540 square feet so it is not large.  Best suited for couples and small families:) The private bathroom has access from the master bedroom and the hall. The kitchen has all new appliances and all the necessary amenities to cook or prepare meals.  The living room features a brand new 65" TV with cable channels.  Free WIFI is also included.  All new furniture, flooring, paint and decor. This Villa is located very conveniently to the restaurants at the resort.  Jamaica Joez offers outdoor seating poolside with magnificent views of the ocean, as well as, a fantastic variety of food and drinks.   Coconutz Sports Bar also has some great outdoor and indoor seating with a beautiful view of the Marsh.  You might even catch a glimpse of the resident gator sunning.  Another dining option is Gatorz Pizza and Wings, which is a local favorite!  There is also an ice cream and slushy stand for an afternoon treat.The bike paths are gorgeous and endless and there are bikes available for renting right at the resort. The tennis, pickle ball courts, playgrounds, cookout areas, and fully remodeled gym ensure that everyone is having a great time, and of course, there is the beach!  We do provide  a few essential beach toys and chairs. Come and soak up the sun and the fun .

Completely remodeled from floor to ceiling with all new fixtures, appliances, furnishings, housewares and accessories, this charming beach villa has just opened its doors for guests July 2018. more description: Perfect for family vacations, golf and business trips. Unit is a couple minute walk to a beautiful beach with a private entrance. This is a private-gated complex with 10 fully-light tennis courts, two large outdoor swimming pools, hot tub, racquetball courts, fitness centers, four playgrounds and outdoor grills.The resort also overlooks Port Royal golf course, one of the top 75 Golf Resorts in the country.The spaceGUIDEBOOK: https://hostful.ly/gskftfcOur space sleeps up to 6 (2 in the Queen bed, 1 in each full size bed and 2 on the Queen-sized pull out couch).  The kitchen is fully updated and the mattresses are very comfy.  Dishware, cooking utensils and glassware is provided.  2nd floor unit with stairs. The unit is ~1,000 sq ft. and feel very spacious with a great balcony to enjoy a drink on.Pool is open March 1-November 1 (heated and cooled accordingly)Unfortunately our association does not allow pets. Free trolley ride with stop right outside property!In addition to the great balcony, we have a full wet bar to enjoy cocktails and wine.

more description: Welcome to Sunset Oasis!Fully remodeled, inviting and stylish home with modern decor. Sunset Oasis is meant to make you feel warm and welcomed, your home away from home. Just a short 15 min walk to Coligny Beach, or 3 min drive to the free parking lot. This condo is only steps away from tennis courts and pool. Short walk to local restaurants, bars and shopping. There is a playground just a few minutes away, along with many bike trails that will take you around the Island.We hope you enjoy!The spaceThere is one flight of stairs you have to climb to access the condo so it is not wheel chair accessible.We have a smart lock, so all is required is a code upon arrival. In the condo, from the bedrooms to the main living area is a slight step up; so be careful when walking through. The bathroom is a Jack & Jill layout so there is a shared shower.

description: FreeBikes&BeachChairs⭐New Renovation 4/2021⭐HHBT⭐
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Amber & Brian3 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 3 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in April 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: *4/22/2021 Brand new bath & kitchen with convection microwave, LVP flooring, lighting, fixtures, furniture, mattress, everything from curtains to bedding & Samsung smartTV. Our end unit offers amazing 360 views of the ocean & resort from our front & rear balconies! We're so proud to share our new space with you. We wanted to keep the vintage vibe of the villa while adding all the luxury and modern comforts you expect while traveling and relaxing in style. *2-3 guest max. No pets. 25 age minimum*The spaceOUR RESORT AT A GLANCE:THE BEACHOur Four private boardwalks, which access the beach ARE AVAILABLE and OPEN to our guests. THE RESORTPools, playgrounds,basketball,tennis center, tennis courts and pickle ball courts are all OPEN!!!!Fitness center open daily 10am-6pm. Please obtain an access card from the Resort's front desk for entry to gym. A refundable $20 deposit and signed waiver is required.Jamaica Joe’z Beachfront Bar and Grille is open for the summer season. Coconutz & Gatorz Pizza OPEN daily for take-out and indoor/outdoor dining service to include both food, full bar beverage service, and Family Style Meals! Front Desk open daily 24/7***I will continue to update here as things change and evolve . As always we provide clean, sanitized accommodations and are committed to keeping our guests as healthy and happy as possible. Please do your part to stay safe, respect our home and leave the condo as you found itBEACH CHAIRS & BEACH TOWELS provided for up to 2 guests. 2 BIKES are included in your reservation and are the property of the condo, located just outside your door.Walk-up a few steps or take the ramp and elevator to your 2nd floor beach getaway. Condo is handicap accessible, located parallel to ramp and elevator, with no shared hallway. Perfect for rolling coolers and luggage as well! This end unit offers 360° views from your front and rear balcony. Located on the 2nd floor in popular C building, it is the closest to oceanfront pool, beach bar, & ocean.Our condo has everything you need for a short stay, business trip or long vacation. Ideal for 2 guests, can accommodate 3 guests max. Total square footage of our condo is 540 sqft. All the oceanfront villas on the resort are this size and can vary in layout.Please note,  Additional guests after 2 is $100/nt. max occupancy is 3 and will be strictly enforced.Our full-size kitchen is brand new april 2021, clean and perfect for preparing full meals or small snacks. 4 burner cooktop, storm wash dishwasher, counter depth frig, and convection microwave that can cook anything from steaks, pizza and even cookies or just warm up your leftovers from our 3 onsite restaurants! We provide 5 cup coffee maker, filters & gourmet coffee, magic bullet blender, toaster, and cook wear.Living space has a 42" Samsung smart TV, futon style sofa, Bose bluetooth speaker, and secure high-speed WiFi. Bathroom updated in April 2021 and is equiped with full-size tub/shower. Beach equipment located in Hallway closet in including chairs, cooler and boogie boards, basket of toys, beach games, ect. PLEASE wash sand off bikes, chairs and equipment each day and return where you found them. Will make locating items easier for you and guests that come after you.Queen bed in the master replaced in April 2020 with a Zinus charcoal memory foam mattress. Full size closet with shelving and hangers in main hallway. Laundry card and detergant provided in utility closet. You can refill money card at front-desk with cash or credit card, laundry rooms are located at the end of hallways on 1st and 2nd floors. Cost to wash and dry is $4.The lighted tennis and pickleball courts are top notch with tennis pro onsite. Basketball court and playground are located beside gym. It's an easy walk to the beach. Stop at Jamaica Joez by the pool when you are hungry, need a drink or just an ice cream cone!Coconuts sports bar and Gator's pizza restaurant are located on site, inside the Convention Center.Please feel free to use whatever you find around the condo. We try to keep it well stocked with fun. All we ask is that you wash off any sand and return it where you found it for future guests enjoyment. If anything is lost or broken during your stay, no worries, just let us know, we very much appreciate it and understand things happen.One $25 resort/parking pass is included in your stay. Please request any additional parking passes needed at least 24hrs prior to your arrival. Each additional parking pass is $25. Passes cannot be issued by security and must be issued only by contacting me prior to arrival. Guests visiting you during your stay may be called into security by utilizing the condo phone in your unit AFTER checkin.Other items included in your stay: Sheets, bath and hand towels, wash clothes and kitchen towels. Starter toilet paper, toiletries, paper towels, trash bags, hand soap, dish soap, laundry card and detergant. We will provide enough to get you started or for a short stay. Extra can be provided for longer stays, please contact us prior to checkin

name: Condo in Hilton Head Island

more description: Welcome to Fiddler's Cove!The Barefoot Bungalow is an immaculately clean and tastefully decorated 2-bedroom 2-bathroom condo that is only a short 5 minute walk to private beach access.The spaceImmaculately clean and tastefully decorated 2-bedroom condo has two full private baths, making it very comfortable for a family of 4 or use the queen sleeper sofa and expand to accommodate up to 6. The master bedroom has a queen sized bed, 2 twin-sized beds in the second bedroom, and a pack-n-play for the little one. There’s ceiling fans/lights in every room - even the balcony! There’s Smart TV's  in the family room as well as both bedrooms.  The condo has a well stocked kitchen, full pantry with cooking essentials, a booster high-chair, a washer and dryer and games. Bed linens, bath towels and blankets are provided as well as a starter supply of basic amenities. There’s cable and high speed wifi internet.This 2nd floor villa is also one of the CLOSEST Fiddler's Cove units to the beach and is just an easy 5 minute walk to beautiful Folly Field Beach! Choose from the private neighborhood beach access or public access, which has a boardwalk with an extended rubber beach mat walkway, restrooms, and sand showers. For additional fun beach chairs, beach umbrella, beach wagon, boogie boards and beach toys are provided. Just about everything except the food, beach towels and sand! :)

description: Relaxing 2Br/2ba condo on HHI, minutes from beach
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Kacie4 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in November 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: An easy 10-minute walk from the beach, this condo is an excellent getaway for families, golf trips, or working away from home. Enjoy the two pools, one of which is just steps from the unit, or any of the other amenities, including tennis courts, outdoor grilling, fitness center, and playgrounds. The home is in a private gated community with 24/7 security. After enjoying your day, end your night watching your favorite shows with Roku or relaxing on the private balcony.The spaceThere are so many things our space offers! Come enjoy one or both pools between March and November. The hot tub is available year round!There is a shared clubhouse with a game area including corn hole and ping pong table, as well as racquetball court and workout area. If you enjoy tennis, there are multiple courts throughout the condo complex. If you prefer golf, you are welcome to enjoy any of the 20+ courses on the island.For ocean lovers, the beach isn't far away! It is about a 5 minute walk to the boardwalk, and then a few minutes from there to the beach. The boardwalk to the public beach has bathrooms.The condo itself is 2 bedroom 2 bathroom, located on the second level with no elevators. The main bedroom has a queen bed with a bathroom en suite and the second bedroom has two twin beds. There is a pack and play as well for children.There are so many shops and restaurants within driving distance, or enjoy a nice meal cooked in our full kitchen. There is also a shared bbq pit just outside the condo!If relaxing is your thing, enjoy our TVs with Roku or one of the offered beach reads in the unit. You can relax on the sectional couch or on the nice balcony.We can't wait to host you!

description: Year-Round Heated Oceanfront Pool!
name: Apartment in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Melissa And Brian4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 4 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in April 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: New Featured Amenity at Ocean Dunes- HEATED POOL! Ours is an Ultra-Deluxe one-bedroom Ocean Dunes villa.  Newly renovated down to the studs and completely updated.  Everything is new! First floor convenience with spectacular views (especially sunrise), of the best beach on Hilton Head Island and just a short walk to Coligny Circle.The spaceLocated in the heart of South Forest Beach, our Ocean Dunes DIRECT OCEANFRONT villa was recently renovated down to the studs.  BRAND NEW EVERYTHING! Even the pool is brand new! Guests will appreciate the genuine wood flooring, updated kitchen with granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances, pocket-door in bedroom to create a more spacious feel, and a useful hallway closet that includes a washer/dryer... the only in-room washer/dryer in the entire complex!  Perfect for a romantic getaway, friend bonding trip or a small family vacation.  Our one-bedroom offers 538 square feet of pure coastal bliss! Come and smell the salty ocean air and enjoy the breezes through the palm trees from our direct ocean front balcony. Ocean Dunes is located in the South Forest Beach area directly nestled in between the Marriott Grande Ocean ($550 per night) & Hilton Ocean Oak ($50,000 timeshare/$700 per night).  You will enjoy the same fantastic ocean front location and access to some hotel amenities (like the ocean front tiki bars), for less than half the cost of staying at either of these resorts. Ocean Dunes provides a tranquil ocean front experience.  Just steps outside of the door, we boast our own private pool with direct beach access and private beach cabana bathrooms. Coligny Plaza and the public beach are located a few blocks down within easy walking distance. The plaza offers unique shopping, casual or fine dining, as well as great live entertainment. Sea Pines infamous Harbour Town and South Beach make for a great bike ride or short drive.   Golfers will enjoy dozens of nearby challenging public championship golf courses. Bed linens, bath towels, extra pillows and blankets, plus a small supply of toiletries are supplied as well. We offer a comfortable queen bed in the master suite with a queen sofa sleeper in the living room. Flat screen TV’s in both living and bedroom with digital cable and free Wi-fi. The living room opens onto a balcony/deck overlooking 2 pools with direct ocean views. The kitchen is fully equipped with oven, range, microwave, dishwasher and refrigerator/freezer and stocked with everything you will need for meal prep. This villa is conveniently located on the 1st floor with minimal steps up to the front door.  There is a ramp as well as elevators.  Ocean Dunes also provides luggage carts for unloading and loading your personal belongings.  (Note: even though we are on the first floor we are elevated high enough to provide ocean views from the generous balcony).This villa is smoke-free (including balcony) and pet-free.  We appreciate your consideration.  Enjoy your stay!

description: Charming villa with pool, balcony, full kitchen, central AC, & washer/dryer
name: Villa in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire villa hosted by Vacasa South Carolina6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 4 beds ·  · 2.5 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 2.5 baths**__**Joined in December 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
The spaceSurf Court Villas 5The famous white shores of Hilton Head Beach are just one block away from this coastal charmer. Walk directly to the beach via the walkway across the street and spend sun-soaked days lounging on the shore. For extra adventure, book a dolphin tour or rent bikes and take a ride on one of the island's popular nature trails. Walk or bike less than a half-mile to Coligny Circle for a plethora of dining and shopping options, convenient amenities, and recreation at Coligny Beach Park and the Coligny Plaza Shopping Center. Several world-class golf courses are available on the island. Make sure to use the property's glittering pool for some much-needed you-time.

Upon entry, you'll be met with a bright interior and a warm feeling of welcome throughout the space. Relax and make yourself at home by resting on the plush furniture, watching your favorite shows on the large TV, or having brunch on the private balcony. Prepare grand meals and beach picnic snacks in the full kitchen, equipped with stainless steel appliances, a breakfast bar, and a formal dining table. Two bedrooms ensure that everyone will receive a comfortable night's rest from the day's adventures, especially for those who sleep in the bunk beds- perfect for kids to host their own sleepovers!

Make memories that'll last a lifetime when you spend your vacation here on the gorgeous Hilton Head Island.

SHARED AMENITIES
-Pool

THINGS TO KNOW
This property is managed by Vacasa Vacation Rentals of Hilton Head Island LLC. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 2.Parking notes: There is free parking for 1 vehicles. Complex parkingCity/town permit number:30743

more description: Desirable elevated 1st floor direct oceanfront corner unit. Enjoy un-obscured  180 degree ocean views, sound of the waves and fresh ocean breeze.  This totally renovated condo is footsteps to the beach and by foot minutes away from shops and restaurants.The spaceOur condo accommodates two people only. The condo will embrace you in a warm atmosphere of modern Scandinavian style. From the condo you will enjoy a wonderful 180 degree view of the Atlantic Ocean.The fully renovated condo will include amenities such as highspeed Wifi,  cable TV and Netflix. The kitchen is fully equipped with large microwave, coffee maker, toaster and everything else you may need to cook and serve a meal.  Granite counters and stainless steel appliances.The bedroom features one queen size bed. The sofa in the living room folds out into a full size sleeper bed. Pillows and bedding for the sofa is in the closet. For privacy the bedroom and living room/hallway can be separated by the pocket door. The bathroom is fitted with a large tiled shower. -  From the bedroom there is direct access to the bathroom and another access from the hallway.The A/C system is one of the newest available on the market and it is very quiet. It is imbedded in the ceiling and has a climate remote control in each room - Our condo is one of the few that provide such a convenient comfort.

description: Beach Skybox-panoramic view, hear, feel the ocean.
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Ambrose6 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in September 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Enjoy the beach in Nov. & Dec. from the comfort of our balcony. Beach Skybox - Panoramic and close-up view of the beach and ocean. See, hear and feel the beach and ocean. Our third floor balcony has the best view of the beach and Atlantic Ocean on the island. You can watch the spectacular sunrises and the moon rise over the ocean.  Our condo is renovated and thoroughly cleaned. It has all new appliances and everything replaced. Watch the sunrises and experience the beach and ocean 24/7.The space“Beach Skybox” provides a spectacular panoramic view of the beach and ocean. The sight, sound and feel are simply the best on the island. You can enjoy and experience the mysterious and ever changing moods of the beach and ocean any time of the day and in all seasons.  Everything in the condo is designed around this amazing scenery. We try to provide a comfortable, well-equipped and decorated condo for your vacation and even work if necessary. We are ideal for year round vacations for a couple or a small family.  The queen bed in the bedroom, queen sleeper sofa and bunk beds (76" x 24") provide a capacity for 4 adults and 2 children.  But it is more comfortable for 2 to 4 persons.  Beachfront condos are small.  So, please plan accordingly.For your safety, the condo is thoroughly cleaned, sanitized and ozonized before your arrival. Ozone is environmentally friendly, it’s made from oxygen. It kills bacteria and viruses throughout the condo including the ductwork. It decomposes back to oxygen afterwards.  We have an air purifier with plasma wave to kill germs and with HEPA filter to remove dust, pollen, bacteria, viruses and other common air pollutants.  An auto-drain dehumidifier is installed in the bathroom to lower the indoor humidity for your comfort. The heat pump has been serviced and ductwork thoroughly cleaned.  A new EcoBee thermostat helps regulate the  temperature and humidity. Please keep doors closed as much as possible.  If you leave balcony door open, please turn off heat pump.  This is as safe and comfortable as I know how as a chemist.  As a chemist, I understand the danger of chemicals on humans.  I don’t use chemicals lightly.  For example, I don’t use pesticides in and around my house.  Keeping house clean and use traps as necessary work great.For your entertainment, we have new 58” and 32” Samsung UHD TV’s equipped with local HD cable and streaming with YouTube TV and Amazon Prime Videos.  You may connect to your own streaming services.  Also available is a  DVD player and a collection of DVD's. We provide high speed Internet at 300/30 mbps.  Newly added is a lighthouse bookcase with Lefton and Danbury Lighthouse collections. The switch for the lights is on electrical extension in bottom center of bookcase.  The GoVee Flow Plus (H6056) light bars respond to ambient sound or TV or to your devices via the GoVee app.  A wireless Bugani Nebula 100 Bluetooth light and sound speaker brings TV sound and bass close to you.  It is paired with TV and can be chosen as desired.  Or you can connect your music to it via bluetooth. Color changing lamps are controlled by a small remote.We provide paper towels, toilet paper, soap, dish washing detergent and dishwasher detergent that usually lasts a week.  We provide most kitchen amenities.  We provide quality towels and linens.It requires a lot of space, work and effort to bring your own beach equipment especially from long distance.  For your convenience, beach chairs(5), Hi-Boy beach chairs(1), umbrellas(3) including a wind-proof umbrella, a Sun Ninja 10' x 10' tent, beach wagon(1) and some beach and pool toys are provided.  Bring your own favorite beach equipment or use ours.  We are now providing beach towels/blankets. These are oversized (84” x 42”) microfiber towels. They are good for the beach and pool because they are light weight, sand free, soft and quick dry. These can also be used as a blanket for TV watching or as an extra blanket for the bed. They are four in the closet in the hallway. If you use them, just leave them out with other towel, linens for washing when you leave. Please let me know how these towels/blankets work out for you. Dining/office table and chairs/stools are height adjustable for view of the beach and ocean while dining or working. On the balcony, we have folding counter height chairs, regular folding chairs and folding table for your beach and ocean experience. We have many updates including all new furniture, queen bed, queen sofa bed with memory foam mattress and special pad that eliminates folding bar discomfort, luxury vinyl flooring, new ceiling with fan and light fixtures, vanity, toilet, bathroom fixtures, refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, coffee makers, dishes, utensils and cookware. Everything is newly painted including the balcony  We replaced all electrical outlets, installed new combination and dead bolt locks on entrance door and new hardware on all the other doors. Water leak sensors protect condo from potential water damages. Please keep WiFi receiver plugged in and leave sensors at their places.If you need to work from home or beach, a home office can be set up with the adjustable height dining/office table or with the 48” x 24” adjustable height (24”, 30” or 35”) folding table.  A high speed Internet at 300/30 mbps is available.  A HP laser jet B/W printer/scanner is available. You can use the two spare TV's as monitors or the two Samsung TV's as monitors.

more description: Welcome to our beautifully renovated 1st floor unit in Fiddler's Cove.  Perfect for a tennis, golf, biking or beach holiday! A 5-7 min walk to Folly Field beach via private or public beach access. Use our beach equipment and towels for your day at the beach! Minutes away by car to dozens of Bluffton's and Hilton Head Island's world class golf courses. Keyless entry and complimentary secure wifi! Enjoy 5 star amenities including 2 pools, hot tub, racquetball, pickle ball courts, gym,  and more!The spaceThis villa has a newly renovated fully equipped kitchen with everything you’ll need, including many extras such as crockpot, Keurig coffee maker, blender, plenty of cookware, and well stocked for your home away . White cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and lovely laminate floors. This unit also has a washer and dryer, beach cart, beach chairs, umbrella, toys, and cooler for your quick stroll to the beach via either a private or public access. There are three Smart TV's and wifi for your convenience.Our master bedroom provides a super comfortable queen-sized bed with a new flat screen TV, and a ceramic tiled walk-in shower! Also fully renovated in 2018.Our guest bedroom has a new flat screen tv, and a set of super comfortable twin size beds with a separate, renovated guest bathroom! All bedding provided.Our living room has a beautiful large sofa and two chairs, with a new wall-mounted flat screen smart TV! The dining area includes a wet bar and seating at our table and breakfast bar for six. Sheets for queen bed in master bedroom and 2 twin beds in guest room are included, as well as rollaway. You will have plenty of bath, and hand towels, and wash cloths. Six beach towels also provided in the main closet. The storage box on the patio is also full of items for you to use during your stay. Beach chairs, umbrella, cart, sand toys, cooler, tennis rackets and more! We also have tennis racquets and balls! Our villa is located on the first floor so no lugging groceries, luggage or beach items up and down the stairs!*Primary guests must be 25 years, or older, in age in order to rent this unit.

more description: Beachfront Building w/Panoramic Ocean to Marsh View!!●CONDO:HGTV Featured Decorator!New 100% RenovationKING BEDExpanded BedroomTwo XL SmartTVsFREE: Netflix, Amazon Prime, WIFI, Cable, Phone CallsLuxe Coastal InteriorCoffee BarBeach Chairs, Umbrella, Boogie Boards , Ice Chest, Pool NoodlesQuiet Top FloorOcean/Marsh View - NOT Parking Lot!Keyless Entry●RESORT:Oceanfront Pool w/Tiki Bar & Grille3 Restaurants & 2 BarsFREE: Tennis, Gym, Pickleball & More!Bike RentalsConciergeThe spaceIf you like what you see: Press ❤ on the upper right corner to save our listing so you can easily return to book!HGTV Designer condo with Panoramic Ocean to Marsh Views from the balcony!  Beachfront building located in an amenity-packed, gated resort!  THIS CONDO PROVIDES :● QUIET VIEWS:  Ocean, Marsh & Trees--NOT a noisy parking lot!● HGTV featured decorator completed 100% High-end renovation● KING BED (Most units only have a Queen Bed w/ 12" space on each side)● Expanded Bedroom● Two XL SmartTVs ● FREE:  Netflix & Prime, Fast Wi-Fi, Cable & Long Distance Phone Calls● Black-Out Sleeping conditions in Bedroom● Multiple COFFEE making options!● A/C  & Heat in Bathroom - very unusual for this resort!● Stocked Kitchen w/Stainless Appliances ● High-Efficiency A/C● BEACH EQUIP: boogie boards, beach chairs, umbrella, cooler, noodles● QUIET & PRIVATE Top Floor, End Unit - No Neighbors above, or on right● PACK & PLAY BED + HIGH CHAIR  RESORT AMENITIES: ● 4 Boardwalks for Private Beach Access!!● Largest Beachfront Pool on HHI ● Beachfront Tiki Bar & Grille! (Winter Hours: November - mid February)● 2cd pool ● FREE: Gym, Tennis & Pickleball ● 3 Restaurants & 2 Bars ● Beach Bike Rentals● BBQ area  ● Beach Volleyball ● Basketball ● Playground ● Racquetball● RV, BOAT & TRAILER PARKING● Front Desk Concierge!● Free Seasonal Trolley Stop ROOM BY ROOM FEATURES:BEDS:1 King Bed1 Queen Sofa Bed1 Pack & Play Bed LIVING ROOM:●  55" SmartTV with Free Cable & Netflix● Couch features comfy upgraded Queen SleeperMASTER BEDROOM:● Rare King Bed● EXPANDED BEDROOM● Ceiling fan● USB ports, 2 large closets.● Ceiling Fan● SmartTV w/ Free Netflix & Cable● BATHROOM100% renovated w/glassed-in custom tile tub/shower, + Handheld Sprayer, all-new stone-topped vanity, new flooring & more--tons of storage. A/C & Heat in bathroom- unusual for this resort!● KITCHENAll-New, Fully Stocked w/ Full-Size Stainless Appliances, Gorgeous Granite Counters & Marble Backsplash!● DININGFull-size Dining Table Seats 4● DESKKeep up with your emails on Antique Wood Desk● COFFEEWe provide Keurig and drip-style coffee makers, a French Press, and a coffee bean grinder.  Coffee is such a personal choice—plan to bring your favorite K cups, ground, or whole coffee beans!● BALCONY  Ocean, Marsh & Tree Views---Quiet & Serene--NO noisy parking lot below! Seating for 4!  BEACH EQUIP PROVIDED: Boogie boards, beach chairs, umbrella, ice chest & pool noodles!  ● LAUNDRY1 floor below.  Clean sheets & towels are provided at check-in-----if you'd like to do laundry during your stay, the front office has laundry cards for purchase.● CLEANING:Our Cleaning Service uses chemical disinfectants, in addition to their regular, thorough cleaning.  We also provide Antibacterial Cleaners!  Additionally, we have contactless & keyless check-in using a coded keypad on the door!● PARKING Plenty of parking on both sides of our building.  Parking for one car is included in your reservation.   IMPORTANT:  1 car pass is provided.  There is a resort fee of $25 per car for additional parking passes.  If you need additional parking passes, - let us know additional Driver's Name & Dates so we can send an Airbnb invoice.● ELEVATOR, LUGGAGE RAMP & TROLLEYS IN BUILDING  HILTON HEAD KNOWN FOR:12 miles of pristine Beaches!!!, Sunsets over the inland Waterway & Marshes, 24 Golf Courses + RBC Heritage Golf Tournament at Sea Pines!  100’s of Restaurants (Southern Food & eating on the water!), boating, chartered fishing trips, arts, culture & history, waterfront activities, marinas, nature trails, wildlife, Mitchellville (freed slave settlement), historic Civil War landmarks, coastal nature preserves, African-American Gullah-Geechee history, golf, kayaking, tennis, yoga, scenic biking trails & biking on the beach, paddle boarding, Kite-Surfing, music events, horseback riding on the beach, huge Outlet Mall just off-island & more!!Visit Old Town Bluffton with its many restaurants & shopping opportunities, including 2 Outlet Malls - just off -island!   Also check out Historic Beaufort, SC ---just 30 minutes away!!35 back road miles to Historic Savannah and a 2-hour drive from Beautiful Charleston!!  Also check out Historic Beaufort, SC---just 30 minutes away!

Close proximity to Coligny Square provides a short walk or bike to shopping, restaurants, bars, and other activities.  Enjoy the beach, heated spa, large pool (heated Oct, Nov, Mar, Apr), golfing (23 island golf courses), bicycling (60+ miles of paved paths), or just relaxing on the large balcony overlooking the ocean and pool. In addition to the pool, there is a kiddie pool and large, heated spa.  Restrooms are located next to the pool.

description: *BEACHES ARE OPEN-VILLA W/ POOL, BEACHFRONT RESORT
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by April & Derek5 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in March 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Our two bedroom, two bath Villa is a second floor unit and a 3-5 minute walk to the sandy shores of Hilton Head Island. Our gated resort features numerous amenities: two pools (one of which is the largest beach front pool on the island), 10 lighted tennis courts, fitness center, bike rental, playground, and three restaurants. Reserve your beach vacation today!The spaceSecond floor Villa with beautiful lagoon view from outdoor balcony. Our Villa is fully equipped with everything you need to make you feel like you're at home while at the beach.  Our Villa has been completely remodeled from top to bottom: new stainless steel appliances, kitchen cabinets, granite countertops, new furniture in every room, new bathroom tile and vanities, new carpeting, new fixtures...no expense was spared. Your long-past-due beach retreat awaits you the moment you arrive at our two bedroom, two bathroom Villa that is nestled in the Hilton Head Island Beach & Tennis Resort.  You’ll be charmed by the coastal decor throughout and the close proximity to the beach, pool, restaurants, etc.  The property features an open floor concept, making this unit ideal for families traveling together. With plush furniture and a smart TV, the inviting living room provides the perfect place to gather with your loved ones. Behind the living area is a dining room table that comfortably seats six.  The fully equipped kitchen makes it ideal and convenient for a short or long term stay.  After a fun-filled day on the sandy shores of Hilton Head Island, you’ll be happy to retreat to the cozy master bedroom with a King bed, TV, and full bathroom.  The second spacious bedroom features a queen and twin bed.  Be sure to make use of all the amazing community amenities this property has to offer. Take the kids to the playground, go for a swim in the pool or get a quick workout in at the fitness center. There’s no shortage of fun activities at your disposal when you stay at the Hilton Head Island Beach and Tennis Resort.***Traveling with friends or a larger group?  We also own another two bedroom/two bathroom Tennis Villa in the same resort. Along with a one bedroom/one bathroom oceanfront Ocean Villa.  Check out our other listings below or send us a message with further questions:  https://abnb.me/tndmHtzqo3https://abnb.me/34URNZCqo3

more description: Freshly decorated in coastal decor, this beachfront condo sleeps up to 4 and is located right by Coligny, Hilton Head's chicest neighborhood. Freshly furnished unit includes a spacious king bed and queen sofa sleeper, both fitted with luxurious memory foam mattresses. Just a three minute walk to sandy beaches, and you can catch a glimpse of gentle tides from your own private balcony! The villa is full of amenities including beach chairs, beach umbrella, games and much more.The spaceSEASIDE VILLAS:• Less than 3 minute walk to the beach!• Private pool access • Gated community during the summer months, with on-site security guards, providing peace of mind• Charcoal grilling area with plentiful capacity• Outdoor showers to rinse in after you sunbathe• Restricted parking access to owners and guests only (Fob/code provided)• Laundry and dryer in building (coin-operated)• Elevator in building right near the condoTHE UNIT:• Self check-in with Schlage Smart Lock System (no key required)• Freshly painted in a tasteful sea salt shade• Bountiful amenties including soaps, shampoos, and conditioners included• Full Kitchen, with brand new stainless steel appliances, including: Range, Fridge, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee maker, and Pots & Pans• Newly installed stainless steel bathroom fixtures• Linens and Bath towels providedPRIVATE BALCONY:• Gorgeous balcony (on the shaded side of the building) with vivid ocean views• Sturdy table for enjoying drinks or an afternoon snack• Two cushioned wicker chairs for maximum relaxation• 2 beach-style chairs, 2 lawn-style chairs, beach umbrella, boogie board and cooler providedBEDROOM :• Brand new memory-foam king bed• Plentiful closet space (and hangers) and wooden dresser, giving you more than enough space for your belongings• Mounted flat screen TV with cable and streaming apps (Roku)LIVING ROOM:• Recently purchased 50” Smart Roku TV with access to Spectrum digital cable and all your favorite Smart TV apps• Memory foam Queen sleeper sofa provides for a great night's rest• Comfy armchair makes for a great reading nook• Wooden dinner table and chairs fostering delicious stay-at-home meals• Numerous side tables for drinks, games, snacking, etc.

description: Beach Resort-OceanView Villa-Stylish Total Remodel
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Maria4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 4 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in January 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: FULLY REMODELED OCEAN VIEW VILLALocated in Hilton Head Beach & Tennis Resort, this beautiful 540 Square foot  Villa is perfect for a small family or couple looking for a relaxing and fun getaway. The second floor balcony offers a view of both the ocean and pool, as well as, offering the soothing sounds of the ocean wavesLocated within a gated community and with access to the beach just steps away.  The resort also features  2 private pools,  3 restaurants, bike rentals, a private gym & more!The spaceThis Villa will not disappoint! The location is fantastic and is just steps away from the beach, pool, and ocean side bar & grill.  The second floor balcony, with all new seating, is the perfect place to unwind, sip your morning coffee, or evening wine, and let the cares of the world fade away.We offer a private queen bedroom with it's own TV,  1 set of adorably themed bunks in the hallway with fun LED lighting (best suited for children under12 size 75” X 25”), and a  brand new sofa sleeper.  However, the villa is 540 square feet so it is not large.  Best suited for couples and small families:) The private bathroom has access from the master bedroom and the hall. The kitchen has all new appliances and all the necessary amenities to cook or prepare meals.  The living room features a brand new 65" TV with cable channels.  Free WIFI is also included.  All new furniture, flooring, paint and decor. This Villa is located very conveniently to the restaurants at the resort.  Jamaica Joez offers outdoor seating poolside with magnificent views of the ocean, as well as, a fantastic variety of food and drinks.   Coconutz Sports Bar also has some great outdoor and indoor seating with a beautiful view of the Marsh.  You might even catch a glimpse of the resident gator sunning.  Another dining option is Gatorz Pizza and Wings, which is a local favorite!  There is also an ice cream and slushy stand for an afternoon treat.The bike paths are gorgeous and endless and there are bikes available for renting right at the resort. The tennis, pickle ball courts, playgrounds, cookout areas, and fully remodeled gym ensure that everyone is having a great time, and of course, there is the beach!  We do provide  a few essential beach toys and chairs. Come and soak up the sun and the fun .

description: Beach condo with pool and stunning nature views
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Victoria4 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in March 2019**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Relax at this peaceful and stylish condo right on the beach. This is Hilton Head’s hidden gem with stunning nature views, beautiful mature landscaping, 3 pools, a hot tub, and 3 tennis courts. Your  newly remodeled 2-bedroom condo has lagoon and sound views and a stunning screened-in porch. Features all new LG appliances, quartz countertops, fast Internet, a 65” HD TV in the living room, 55” TVs in each bedroom, and all the beach equipment you’ll need including cart, umbrellas, toys, and more.The spaceThis condo is in the first phase of the development closest to the beach and enjoys the best views of the beautiful interior garden and sound. It has a large open floor plan that is comfortable for lounging and entertaining. Fine art, custom built furniture, and high end finishes are used throughout this new renovation. Enter through the well appointed kitchen featuring quartz countertops, new LG appliances including a French door refrigerator and induction stove, and all the basics you will need for your stay. There are pots, pans, cooking utensils, spices, extra virgin olive oil, whole bean coffee, teas and honey, granola, and more stocked fresh for you. The door off the kitchen holds the laundry closet with a stackable washer and dryer. Laundry pods, dishwashing pods, and dish detergent are provided. Just past the kitchen is the dining table, which comfortably seats 6. Opposite that is a wet bar with a blender stored underneath.The living area follows and has a comfortable sectional, a solid metal coffee table from MoMA, and a 65” 4K FireTV. The private screened-in porch is accessed through sliding doors and features custom-built bench-seating with cushions and a breakfast bar with two high stools. Enjoy stunning views of the lagoon, mature plantings., and the sound. Beach supplies are stored underneath the seating.The owner’s bedroom and en-suite bathroom is opposite the living area. The bedroom features a super comfortable queen size bed -the highly reviewed Zinus 12” Green Tea memory foam mattress - with 400 count cotton bedding and four pillows. A 55” FireTV is wall mounted and both bedside tables have lamps with USB charging ports. A selection of charging cables is provided. Towels and beach towels are on hand as well plus toiletries like Meyers hand soap, toothbrushes and toothpaste, and a three pump dispenser in the shower for organic body wash, shampoo, and conditioner. The owner’s bedroom boasts two huge windows that provide beautiful garden views. The guest room is most suitable for children and features two twin beds -both the well reviewed Zinus 8” Green Tea memory foam mattresses. All bedding is 400 count cotton. This room also has a bean bag chair, 55” FireTV, and features a fun wall light that is touch activated. The guest bath also has towels and all toiletries.

number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in May 2020**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Light and airy with a beachy feel, this 2 bedroom 2 bath sleeps 6 and is located in the Palmetto Dunes resort filled with tons of family friendly activities.  This villa has recently been remodeled with new appliances, flooring and paint.  Grab your bikes and ride to local restaurants and shops.  The beach is a short bike ride away or rent a kayak at the Palmetto Dunes Outfitters and enjoy the 11 mile lagoon.  This villa is well stocked and just waiting for your arrival!The spaceThis beautiful villa has been recently updated and has a modern beachy feel.  When you walk in you are in automatic relaxation mode.  There is a small office area with a desk and printer.  The office has a wood accent wall.  The kitchen has been remodeled with stainless steel appliances, new countertops and backsplash.  The kitchen is well stocked with new dishes, knives and anything you need to enjoy cooking during your stay.  There is also a small island with 2 bar stools for additional seating.  The dining area has a large table that seats 6 and a cool modern chandelier.  The living area is cozy with 2 couches and a T.V. with cable and HBO.  The main area of the condo has shiplap walls to give it a more beachy feel.  The master bedroom has all new bedding and a comfortable king sized bed.  It has an ensuite bathroom with a fully tiled shower with dual shower heads.  The guest bedroom has all new bedding with a queen bed and twin bunk beds.  This villa is located in the beautifully landscaped Saint Andrews Common in the 5 star resort Palmetto Dunes.  It's a short 5 minute bike ride to the beach or a 2 minute drive or take the Dunes Buggy from (April-Sept.) and it will pick you up for free and drop you off right at the beach.  We are also a short walk or bike ride to all of the shops and restaurants at Shelter Cove.Everything in Hilton Head is accessible by bike so I suggest bringing them if you have them.  If not, you can rent bikes at the Hilton Head Outfitters and depending on the length of your stay, they will drop them off and pick them up.  It's a great way to get around the resort!

description: Just steps to the Beach- Beach and Tennis Resort
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Jeremy6 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in December 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Recently updated with new paint, new furniture and new cleaning company.  Bright and sunny condo on the top floor. Perfect get-away for a family of up to 6. Our condo features a full bed, 2 kid bunk beds, new queen sleeper sofa, full kitchen & private balcony. Steps the beach, pool, tiki bar and shaved ice stand.  Additional restaraunts, playground & tennis courts are onsite. Weekly activities in the summer include Pool Dance Party, movie nights, wildlife talks and arts and crafts for the kids.The spaceThis is a cute beach get-a-way with bright decor and all amenities included. Perfectly situated on Folly Beach and just steps to the beach! Just take the boardwalk right over to the sand. Our place is part of a resort, with the largest beachfront pool on Hilton Head.  It also has 3 restaurants, another pool, playground for kids, 10 tennis courts, a fitness center and onsite bike rentals during the season.  Our place is situated in the best of both worlds. The condo has an amazing price ocean view, is mid-island (less crowded beaches); yet only minutes from the action of Hilton Heads main hot spots: Coligny, Sea Pines, Shelter Cove, and Skull Creek. Other great attractions include dolphin tours, golf, Yoga on the beach, kayak and jet ski rentals, bike paths, and the famous Harbour Town Lighthouse. There’s so much more to do on this funky, colorful little island.On the way to the beach, you’ll find a beachfront pool, kiddie pool and plenty of lounge seating. Next to the pool is a Tiki Bar and restaurant as well as a shaved ice stand for kids of all ages. Also, the grounds include tennis courts, a playground, and an amazing fitness center.We recently added a new queen sleeper sofa, new table with additional seating.  We also additional storage items, Blu-ray player with movies and games.  We want to ensure you have everything you need while away from home.The condo is completely furnished, including a fully equipped kitchen with a full-size fridge, microwave, four-burner stove, oven, coffee maker, blender, toaster and all essential cooking ware (pots, pans, etc.).  Also, it includes all dish and flatware (utensils, plates, glasses). The unit is on the third floor. There is an elevator available for you to use along with luggage carts to aid in getting your stuff to the condo. Since our place is on the third floor there is a great view of the ocean from the balcony.The main bedroom has full size bed and has a very comfortable memory foam mattress as well as a TV. It has a large closet with plenty of room for your luggage and clothes.The bunk beds are such a fun experience for kids. It includes a ladder for the kids to climb to the top bunk. We also have Igor’s for the kids to read or put on a puppet show.The living room has a comfortable sofa, with a HD-TV that includes full cable, Blu-ray player and movies for the whole family.  Additionally we recently added games to play in case you get tired of being at the beach.
