more description: This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit.The spaceNewly Renovated One Bedroom Forest Beach Villas | Just a 5-Minute Walk to the Beach*1 Bedroom | 1 Bathroom*Sleeps 4*1 King, 1 Queen Sleeper Sofa*Dining Table with Seating For Four*2 TVs - 58" in LR | 42” in BR | Wi-Fi | Both Keurig & Ground Coffee Makers*5th Floor Villa with Views of the Ocean Over the Tops of the Trees*5 Minute Walk to the Beach | 4 Beach Towels for Guests Use*2 Beach Chairs*Large Walk-In Shower with Glass Doors*New Stackable Washer/Dryer*Keyless Entry*Oscillating Fan*Iron and Ironing Board*Free Covered Parking*Access to the Coligny Complimentary Transportation Golf Cart (seasonal)*Guests have access to Hard Surface Tennis Courts and Spacious Outdoor Pool Open Year-Round*Free Wi-Fi and Two Smart TV’s with Digital Cable in the Living Room502 Forest Beach Villas is unique, cozy and spacious for 580 square feet. A beautifully remodeled top floor unit, this villa is located on the 4th floor via elevator then a few steps up to the 5th floor and provides guests with peek-a-boo views of the Atlantic Ocean from the windows overlooking the parking lot.When entering the villa to the immediate left is a fully equipped kitchen which has new counter tops, tile floors, and plenty of counter space. The dining area, located just outside the kitchen, features a round top table for four and comfortable seating.The spacious living room features a brand-new sleeper sofa and loveseat, perfect for curling up with your favorite book, or peering out at the fantastic sunshine. Off the living room to the right is the master bedroom, with king size bed, Smart TV, and private bath with a new stackable washer and dryer inside, and new walk-in shower with tile and glass doors.Hilton Head beach-oriented rentals such as this one provides guests with everything they need. Guests will certainly enjoy this little piece of paradise nestled between beautiful vegetation, and the Atlantic Ocean. This property is within walking distance to various restaurants and shops at Coligny Plaza with live music, a grocery store, bike rentals, as well as the famous Tiki Hut Outdoor Beach Bar and the newly completed Lowcountry Celebration Park. *3 Night Minimum Stay Required. name: Home in South Beach
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Vacasa South Carolina14 guests ·  · 3 bedrooms ·  · 8 beds ·  · 3 baths
number of guests: 14 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 8 beds · **__** · 3 baths**__**Joined in February 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
The spaceAudubon Pond 22Beautifully remodeled from top to bottom, this three-bedroom Sea Pines Resort home provides privacy and comfort in the heart of the island. A complimentary trolley will whisk you away to the beach and more Sea Pines Resort attractions when you're ready to venture out.

Escape to the lush backyard paradise to take a dip in the pool or unwind in the hot tub. A hammock and several chaise lounges are perfect for sunbathing, or you can grill up tasty meals and dine alfresco at the outdoor tables for six and eight. The main bedroom also offers direct access to a quiet seating area for two on the patio.

Vaulted ceilings with skylights flood this single-level retreat with natural light. Snuggle up on a sectional in the main living area to watch movies on the 70" TV. Cathedral ceilings with exposed beams create an elegant ambience in the second living area, where you'll also find a 55" TV, a table for four, and a desk.

The chef in your group will feel right at home in the kitchen, appointed with brand-new stainless steel appliances and an island with a quartz countertop that doubles as a four-seater breakfast bar. When it's time to eat, a table in the dining area seats ten for festive vacation meals.

WHAT’S NEARBY
As part of the Sea Pines Resort, you'll have access to the beach and dining options at the Sea Pines Beach Club, two miles from your rental. Golfers will appreciate the resort's three courses: Heron Point, Atlantic Dunes, and Harbour Town Links, all of which are about three miles away.

THINGS TO KNOW
There are two queen-size sofa beds in the living area.
The fireplace is non-operational.
This property is managed by Vacasa South Carolina LLC. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.Parking notes: There is paid parking for 6 vehicles. Parking is available for up to six cars in the circular driveway. If you require additional parking, you may purchase a Daily Gate Pass and take the trolley to the stop closest to your rental. Motorcycles are not permitted in the community, and trailers and RVs will be directed to park in off-site lots.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States

number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in May 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Oceanfront building with a side view of the ocean from the balcony! Park your car and walk to everything! This beautiful 2 bed/2 bath beach condo is perfect for your family vacation or romantic getaway! No streets to cross to get to the beach!Prime location.  Gated entry, private, and just a 5-minute walk to all the amenities of Coligny Plaza (70 Shops & Restaurants)!I also provide beach chairs, umbrella, and beach cart for your convenience during your stay!The spaceTastefully decorated  2 bedroom/2 bath Beachwood Place condo is located in the heart of South Forest Beach. Park your car for the duration of your stay because everything you will need is within walking distance!This perfect beach villa has been newly renovated with you in mind, making sure you have all the comforts of home. So sit back, relax, and enjoy your stay!The master bedroom is equipped with a KING size bed and 32'' HDTV for your enjoyment. The guest room boasts 2 twin beds, and also has a 32'' HDTV for your entertainment.The living room has a sleeper sofa, additional seating, and a large 55'' Smart HDTV. You'll want to also enjoy your morning coffee on the cozy balcony seating while taking in the sunrise!The kitchen has new granite counter tops with new stainless steel appliances, a Keurig coffee machine, blender,  and most everything else you'd need to make your family's favorite meals!The unit is located on the 2nd floor and there is an elevator making it easy to access for everyone. I also provide you with a beach wagon to make bringing your gear to the beach a breeze or even your groceries back from the nearby Piggly Wiggly grocery store!Living Area:55'' Smart HDTV Flat-ScreenDining Area for 4Kitchen with granite counter tops and fully equipped kitchenQueen Sleeper SofaPrivate BalconyMaster Bedroom:KING Sized Bed32''  HDTV Flat Screen Guest Bedroom:2 Twin bedsTravel Crib (Graco Pack ‘n Play Playard)32'' HDTV Flat Screen Booster seat (Fisher-Price)Sleeps 6Policies:- No smoking- No pets allowed- No events, parties or large gatherings- Must be at least 25 years old to bookGuest accessEasy keypad entry. I'll provide you with an access code to key-in at entry 48 hours prior to your arrival. No keys to worry about!Other things to noteHard to beat this location. You can walk to pretty much everything. You're at the beach, and you can walk to restaurants, grocery store, shops, hardware store, pizza place, and even to bike rental shops. Relaxed beach town vibe, great for families (that’s how we discovered it!) and for couples.

more description: Welcome to the Island! Relax and enjoy our direct oceanfront, pool front, newly renovated one bedroom, one bathroom, beautiful beach villa. Look out your balcony and see nothing but ocean water! Listen to the waves on your spacious, private balcony, while soaking up the sun during the day or relaxing & star gazing at night. You will enjoy the wonderful accommodations and convenient location very close to the popular Coligny Plaza with spectacular views at Ocean Dunes!The space**Add my listing to your wishlist by clicking the ❤ in the upper-right corner**✦Private gated community✦Beachfront HEATED POOL - Open all year round!✦Onsite Resort Cafe / Tiki Bar & Grille ✦Short 10 minute walk to Coligny Plaza (tons of shopping + restaurants + bars)✦3rd Floor - Breathtaking ocean views✦Some of the best golf courses in the world just a short distance away✦12 miles of pristine beaches✦Large 55-inch flat screen TV✦NETFLIX, Hulu, etc. login capability via SMART TV✦Cable TV with FREE Wifi✦Both Drip and Keurig Coffee machines✦Onsite BBQ charcoal grills & picnic tables✦Custom designed quartz countertops✦Marble walk-in bathroom✦Queen bed, sleeper memory foam sofa bed, bunk beds (on the smaller side mainly meant for children)✦Fully equipped kitchen: stove, oven, full size refrigerator, microwave, toaster, dishwasher, dishes, pots & pans✦Onsite washer & dryer (coin operated)✦Flat screen TV in bedroom✦600 sq. ft✦Luggage carts✦ElevatorPlease no pets / no smokingWHAT IS HILTON HEAD KNOWN FOR?12 miles of pristine Beaches!! Sunsets over the inland Waterway & Marshes, 24 Golf Courses + RBC Heritage Golf Tournament at Sea Pines! 100’s of Restaurants, boating, chartered fishing trips, arts, culture & history, waterfront activities, marinas, nature trails, wildlife, historic Civil War landmarks, coastal nature preserves, golf, kayaking, tennis, pickleball, yoga, scenic biking trails & biking on the beach, paddle boarding, Kite-Surfing, music events, horseback riding, huge Outlet Mall just off-island & more!35 back road miles to Historic Savannah & 2-hour drive from Beautiful Charleston!! Also check out Historic Beaufort, SC---just 30 minutes away!

location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States

number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2.5 baths**__**Joined in March 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: This modern 2 bed 2.5 bath cottage features access to great community amenities including private beach access and the Shipyard beach club. Within the gates of Shipyard, enjoy world renowned golf courses, biking trails, restaurants, bars, spas, and the Sonesta Resort. Dozens of restaurants offering up Hilton Head Island's famous local seafood, craft beer, and the HHI Distillery are a stones throw away.  Shopping and site seeing are a walk or bike-ride away at Coligny Plaza and Celebration ParkThe spaceTHE COTTAGE:*Appointed with luxury amenities including cable TV's in the living area and bedrooms, Roku streaming stick in the living area, free high speed WiFi, fully stocked kitchen, and large outdoor private patio overlooking the Shipyard Golf Course. Victrola record player with albums available for guest use!*The kitchen is fully stocked with everything needed to cook and serve a homemade meal, including condiments, coffee, tea, and even child-safe plastic dinnerware. *The open concept dining area located between the kitchen and living area features a dining room table with room to fit 4-6 people.*The living area features a flatscreen television, access to the patio, and views of the beautiful Shipyard Golf Course. *The master bedroom has a queen sized bed, flat-screen television with cable, and an en suite updated bathroom. *The second bedroom has a queen sized bed, flat-screen television with cable, and an en suite bathroom. *Towels, linens, soaps, shampoos, dishwashing detergent, and laundry detergent are all included and complimentary.THE LOCATION:*Beach access at the Shipyard Beach is a 20-minute walk from our cottage. One beach parking pass and two gate passes are included. Shipyard boasts miles of bike paths, the Van der Meer Tennis Resort, and the Sonesta Resort.*Shipyard Golf Club features 27 holes of the most spectacular golf views imaginable and was rated one of the finest layouts on the Champions Tour. *Hilton Head has been voted the #1 island in the country by Conde Nast Travel for 4 years in a row! There are 250+ restaurants and 24 golf courses on the island. We pack a lot on our beautiful 12 miles long by 5-mile wide piece of paradise. We are looking forward to having you stay with us! Book today!

(Winter Hours November - mid February)● Largest Beachfront Pool on HHI ● 2cd pool by our condo● FREE GYM, TENNIS & PICKLEBALL● 3 Restaurants & 2 Bars ● Beach Bike Rentals in Resort! ● BBQ / Picnic areas● Beach Volleyball ● Basketball● Playground● Racquetball● RV, BOAT & TRAILER PARKING● Helpful Front Desk Concierge!● Free Seasonal Trolley StopROOM BY ROOM FEATURES:BEDS:1 King Bed1 Queen Sofa Bed1 Pack & Play BedOCEAN VIEW LIVING ROOMXXL 65" SmartTV with Cable Prime  & Netflix, etc.!  Custom Leather Couch features comfy Queen Sleeper!MASTER BEDROOM:Rare King Bed Expanded BedroomXXL 65" flat-screen SmartTV FREE Netflix & Cable!(Bring your Passwords to watch Hulu, etc.!), Ceiling Fan & USB portsBATHROOMNewly renovated w/glassed-in custom tile walk-in shower, all new marble-topped vanity, new flooring & more--tons of storage. A/C & Heating in Bathroom - Rare in this resort!KITCHENAll New w/Full-Size Stainless Appliances, Gorgeous Custom Counters &  Backsplash.  Equipped with all customary appliances & cooking equipment.COFFEEWe provide Keurig and drip-style coffee makers, a French Press, pour-over maker, and a coffee bean grinder.  Coffee is such a personal choice—plan to bring your favorite K cups, ground, or whole coffee beans!OCEAN VIEW DININGFull-size High-top Dining Table Seats 4LAUNDRY:Pay as you Go Laundry rooms on floors 2-4PARKING Plenty of parking on both sides of our building.  Parking for one car is included in your reservation.   IMPORTANT:  1 car pass is provided.  There is a resort fee of $25 per car for additional parking passes.  If you need additional parking passes, let us know so we can send an Airbnb invoice & request the additional pass after payment.LUGGAGE RAMP: Located on the southwest end of the building!   HILTON HEAD IS KNOWN FOR:12 miles of pristine Beaches!!!, Sunsets over the inland Waterway & Marshes, 24 Golf Courses + RBC Heritage Golf Tournament at Sea Pines!  100’s of Restaurants (Southern Food & eating on the water!), boating, chartered fishing trips, arts, culture & history, waterfront activities, marinas, nature trails, wildlife, Mitchellville (freed enslaved peoples settlement), historic Civil War landmarks, coastal nature preserves, African-American Gullah-Geechee history, golf, kayaking, tennis, yoga, scenic biking trails & biking on the beach, paddle boarding, Kite-Surfing, music events, horseback riding on the beach, huge Outlet Mall just off-island & more!Visit Old Town Bluffton with its many restaurants & shopping opportunities, including 2 Outlet Malls - just off -island!   Also check out Historic Beaufort, SC ---just 30 minutes away!!35 back road miles to Historic Savannah and a 2-hour drive from Beautiful Charleston!!  Also check out Historic Beaufort, Sc---just 30 minutes away!!

description: Just steps to the Beach- Beach and Tennis Resort
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Jeremy6 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in December 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Recently updated with new paint, new furniture and new cleaning company.  Bright and sunny condo on the top floor. Perfect get-away for a family of up to 6. Our condo features a full bed, 2 kid bunk beds, new queen sleeper sofa, full kitchen & private balcony. Steps the beach, pool, tiki bar and shaved ice stand.  Additional restaraunts, playground & tennis courts are onsite. Weekly activities in the summer include Pool Dance Party, movie nights, wildlife talks and arts and crafts for the kids.The spaceThis is a cute beach get-a-way with bright decor and all amenities included. Perfectly situated on Folly Beach and just steps to the beach! Just take the boardwalk right over to the sand. Our place is part of a resort, with the largest beachfront pool on Hilton Head.  It also has 3 restaurants, another pool, playground for kids, 10 tennis courts, a fitness center and onsite bike rentals during the season.  Our place is situated in the best of both worlds. The condo has an amazing price ocean view, is mid-island (less crowded beaches); yet only minutes from the action of Hilton Heads main hot spots: Coligny, Sea Pines, Shelter Cove, and Skull Creek. Other great attractions include dolphin tours, golf, Yoga on the beach, kayak and jet ski rentals, bike paths, and the famous Harbour Town Lighthouse. There’s so much more to do on this funky, colorful little island.On the way to the beach, you’ll find a beachfront pool, kiddie pool and plenty of lounge seating. Next to the pool is a Tiki Bar and restaurant as well as a shaved ice stand for kids of all ages. Also, the grounds include tennis courts, a playground, and an amazing fitness center.We recently added a new queen sleeper sofa, new table with additional seating.  We also additional storage items, Blu-ray player with movies and games.  We want to ensure you have everything you need while away from home.The condo is completely furnished, including a fully equipped kitchen with a full-size fridge, microwave, four-burner stove, oven, coffee maker, blender, toaster and all essential cooking ware (pots, pans, etc.).  Also, it includes all dish and flatware (utensils, plates, glasses). The unit is on the third floor. There is an elevator available for you to use along with luggage carts to aid in getting your stuff to the condo. Since our place is on the third floor there is a great view of the ocean from the balcony.The main bedroom has full size bed and has a very comfortable memory foam mattress as well as a TV. It has a large closet with plenty of room for your luggage and clothes.The bunk beds are such a fun experience for kids. It includes a ladder for the kids to climb to the top bunk. We also have Igor’s for the kids to read or put on a puppet show.The living room has a comfortable sofa, with a HD-TV that includes full cable, Blu-ray player and movies for the whole family.  Additionally we recently added games to play in case you get tired of being at the beach.

name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by April & Derek5 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in March 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Our two bedroom, two bath Villa is a first floor unit and a three minute walk to the sandy shores of Hilton Head Island. Our gated resort features numerous amenities: two pools (one of which is the largest beach front pool on the island), 10 lighted tennis courts, fitness center, bike rental, playground, and three restaurants. Reserve your beach vacation today!The spaceFirst floor Villa that is fully equipped with everything you need to make you feel like you're at home while at the beach. Your long-past-due beach retreat awaits you the moment you arrive at our two bedroom, two bathroom Villa that is nestled in the Hilton Head Island Beach & Tennis Resort.  You’ll be charmed by the coastal decor throughout and the close proximity to the beach, pool, restaurants, etc. The property features an open floor concept, making this unit ideal for families traveling together. With plush furniture and a large Smart TV, the inviting living room provides the perfect place to gather with your loved ones. Behind the living area is a dining room table that comfortably seats six.  The fully equipped kitchen makes it ideal and convenient for a short or long term stay.  After a fun-filled day on the sandy shores of Hilton Head Island, you’ll be happy to retreat to the cozy master bedroom with a King bed, TV, and full bathroom.  The second spacious bedroom features one queen bed and one twin bed and a TV as well.Be sure to make use of all the amazing community amenities this property has to offer. Take the kids to the playground, go for a swim in the pool or get a quick workout in at the fitness center. There’s no shortage of fun activities at your disposal when you stay at the Hilton Head Island Beach and Tennis Resort.***Traveling with friends or a larger group?  We also own another two bedroom/two bathroom Tennis Villa in the same resort. Along with a one bedroom/one bathroom oceanfront Ocean Villa.  Check out our other listings below or send us a message with further questions:  https://abnb.me/WoMF5rzoo3https://abnb.me/34URNZCqo3

more description: Welcome to our beautifully renovated 1st floor unit in Fiddler's Cove.  Perfect for a tennis, golf, biking or beach holiday! A 5-7 min walk to Folly Field beach via private or public beach access. Use our beach equipment and towels for your day at the beach! Minutes away by car to dozens of Bluffton's and Hilton Head Island's world class golf courses. Keyless entry and complimentary secure wifi! Enjoy 5 star amenities including 2 pools, hot tub, racquetball, pickle ball courts, gym,  and more!The spaceThis villa has a newly renovated fully equipped kitchen with everything you’ll need, including many extras such as crockpot, Keurig coffee maker, blender, plenty of cookware, and well stocked for your home away . White cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and lovely laminate floors. This unit also has a washer and dryer, beach cart, beach chairs, umbrella, toys, and cooler for your quick stroll to the beach via either a private or public access. There are three Smart TV's and wifi for your convenience.Our master bedroom provides a super comfortable queen-sized bed with a new flat screen TV, and a ceramic tiled walk-in shower! Also fully renovated in 2018.Our guest bedroom has a new flat screen tv, and a set of super comfortable twin size beds with a separate, renovated guest bathroom! All bedding provided.Our living room has a beautiful large sofa and two chairs, with a new wall-mounted flat screen smart TV! The dining area includes a wet bar and seating at our table and breakfast bar for six. Sheets for queen bed in master bedroom and 2 twin beds in guest room are included, as well as rollaway. You will have plenty of bath, and hand towels, and wash cloths. Six beach towels also provided in the main closet. The storage box on the patio is also full of items for you to use during your stay. Beach chairs, umbrella, cart, sand toys, cooler, tennis rackets and more! We also have tennis racquets and balls! Our villa is located on the first floor so no lugging groceries, luggage or beach items up and down the stairs!*Primary guests must be 25 years, or older, in age in order to rent this unit.

more description:
The spaceHH Beach & Tennis 321CSunshine and good times are yours when you book this Hilton Head Island Beach & Tennis Resort condo. Offering coastal living at its finest, this one-bedroom retreat features direct beach access from the complex, plus a network of pedestrian trails to explore and world-class golf all within easy reach of home. The resort's pool and tennis courts offer even more on-site fun and leisure.

The brightly lit interior features cheerful, beach-inspired decor and an open layout designed for comfortable group gatherings after each day's adventures. The private balcony makes a perfect perch for morning coffee or afternoon cocktails. The stainless steel kitchen comes well-equipped home cooking convenience with all the major appliances, including a dishwasher for easy cleanup. In the evenings, unwind in the living room while streaming your favorite shows and movies on the smart TV. Additional home essentials include free WiFi and central air-conditioning. Shared laundry facilities are located in the building for additional on-site access.

Experience the best of the beach at HH Beach & Tennis 321C today!

THINGS TO KNOW
This property is managed by Vacasa South Carolina LLC. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 3.Parking notes: There is free parking for  vehicles. Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. more description: Experience the beauty of Hilton Head Island with this great 2 bed, 2 bath condo. It's on the 2nd floor of building 1 in Hilton Head Resort. The resort itself has it all: tennis courts, 2 outdoor pools (closed during the winter months), indoor pool, hot tub (ages 13+), sauna (ages 13+) and gym. Not to mention the boardwalk to the semi-private beach.The spaceSuper clean condo with quality furniture and simple decor. The condo has a fully equipped kitchen and linens are included. Beach chairs, beach toys, cooler and a rolling cart are available as well.

(If you are considering staying here:  Press the “Heart” on the upper right corner to save listing to your FAVORITES!)Listen to the waves as you sip your favorite beverage on the patio.  Enjoy beautiful ocean views from the living/dining/kitchen areas!  Sleep in the expanded bedroom on a comfy KING BED while watching Free Netflix & Prime on the 65" SmartTV! THIS CONDO PROVIDES :● Panoramic Oceanfront View!  ● HGTV featured decorator completed 100% High-end renovation● KING BED (Most units only have a Queen Bed w/ 12" space on each side)● Expanded Bedroom● Two 65" SmartTVs ● FREE:  Netflix & Prime, Fast Wi-Fi, Cable, Long Distance Phone Calls● Multiple COFFEE making options!● Walk-in Shower ● A/C  & Heat in Bathroom - very unusual for this resort!● New Kitchen w/FULL SIZE Stainless Appliances +tons of new cabinets● New, High-Efficiency A/C● Black-Out Sleeping conditions in Bedroom● BEACH EQUIP: boogie boards, beach chairs, umbrella, cooler, noodles● PACK & PLAY BED + HIGH CHAIR  RESORT AMENITIES:  ● 4 Boardwalks for Private Beach Access! ● Oceanfront Tiki Bar & Grille! (Winter Hours November - mid February)● Largest Beachfront Pool on HHI ● 2cd pool by our condo● FREE GYM, TENNIS & PICKLEBALL● 3 Restaurants & 2 Bars ● Beach Bike Rentals in Resort! ● BBQ / Picnic areas● Beach Volleyball ● Basketball● Playground● Racquetball● RV, BOAT & TRAILER PARKING● Helpful Front Desk Concierge!● Free Seasonal Trolley StopROOM BY ROOM FEATURES:BEDS:1 King Bed1 Queen Sofa Bed1 Pack & Play BedOCEAN VIEW LIVING ROOMXXL 65" SmartTV with Cable Prime  & Netflix, etc.!  Custom Leather Couch features comfy Queen Sleeper!MASTER BEDROOM:Rare King Bed Expanded BedroomXXL 65" flat-screen SmartTV FREE Netflix & Cable!(Bring your Passwords to watch Hulu, etc.!), Ceiling Fan & USB portsBATHROOMNewly renovated w/glassed-in custom tile walk-in shower, all new marble-topped vanity, new flooring & more--tons of storage. A/C & Heating in Bathroom - Rare in this resort!KITCHENAll New w/Full-Size Stainless Appliances, Gorgeous Custom Counters &  Backsplash.  Equipped with all customary appliances & cooking equipment.COFFEEWe provide Keurig and drip-style coffee makers, a French Press, pour-over maker, and a coffee bean grinder.  Coffee is such a personal choice—plan to bring your favorite K cups, ground, or whole coffee beans!OCEAN VIEW DININGFull-size High-top Dining Table Seats 4LAUNDRY:Pay as you Go Laundry rooms on floors 2-4PARKING Plenty of parking on both sides of our building.  Parking for one car is included in your reservation.   IMPORTANT:  1 car pass is provided.  There is a resort fee of $25 per car for additional parking passes.  If you need additional parking passes, let us know so we can send an Airbnb invoice & request the additional pass after payment.LUGGAGE RAMP: Located on the southwest end of the building!   HILTON HEAD IS KNOWN FOR:12 miles of pristine Beaches!!!, Sunsets over the inland Waterway & Marshes, 24 Golf Courses + RBC Heritage Golf Tournament at Sea Pines!  100’s of Restaurants (Southern Food & eating on the water!), boating, chartered fishing trips, arts, culture & history, waterfront activities, marinas, nature trails, wildlife, Mitchellville (freed enslaved peoples settlement), historic Civil War landmarks, coastal nature preserves, African-American Gullah-Geechee history, golf, kayaking, tennis, yoga, scenic biking trails & biking on the beach, paddle boarding, Kite-Surfing, music events, horseback riding on the beach, huge Outlet Mall just off-island & more!Visit Old Town Bluffton with its many restaurants & shopping opportunities, including 2 Outlet Malls - just off -island!   Also check out Historic Beaufort, SC ---just 30 minutes away!!35 back road miles to Historic Savannah and a 2-hour drive from Beautiful Charleston!!  Also check out Historic Beaufort, Sc---just 30 minutes away!!

more description: Unwind at this stunning beach condo. The 2 bedroom/2 bath unit was lovingly renovated for luxurious yet charming feel. Beach access is an easy 3 minute walk, just past 2 outdoor pools, 1 indoor pool, hot tub, spa, fitness center and tennis courts. Shops, restaurants and grocery stores are only a few miles away. This beach villa has everything you need for a memorable vacation. The beach is located on The Port Royal Sound, known as locals wild beach with great wildlife viewing.The spaceFast wi-fi, cable + smart TV, in-unit laundry, Keurig. Kid-friendly. Located on the 3rd floor (sorry, no elevator but the plus is no noise from upstairs). All beds have plush toppers, the pull out sofa mattress is memory foam. Butcher block counter tops and wood flooring make the space feel warm and inviting. The complex does not allow pets.****The fitness center is closed for renovation at this time. *****

name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by April & Derek5 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in March 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Our two bedroom, two bath Villa is a second floor unit and a 3-5 minute walk to the sandy shores of Hilton Head Island. Our gated resort features numerous amenities: two pools (one of which is the largest beach front pool on the island), 10 lighted tennis courts, fitness center, bike rental, playground, and three restaurants. Reserve your beach vacation today!The spaceSecond floor Villa with beautiful lagoon view from outdoor balcony. Our Villa is fully equipped with everything you need to make you feel like you're at home while at the beach.  Our Villa has been completely remodeled from top to bottom: new stainless steel appliances, kitchen cabinets, granite countertops, new furniture in every room, new bathroom tile and vanities, new carpeting, new fixtures...no expense was spared. Your long-past-due beach retreat awaits you the moment you arrive at our two bedroom, two bathroom Villa that is nestled in the Hilton Head Island Beach & Tennis Resort.  You’ll be charmed by the coastal decor throughout and the close proximity to the beach, pool, restaurants, etc.  The property features an open floor concept, making this unit ideal for families traveling together. With plush furniture and a smart TV, the inviting living room provides the perfect place to gather with your loved ones. Behind the living area is a dining room table that comfortably seats six.  The fully equipped kitchen makes it ideal and convenient for a short or long term stay.  After a fun-filled day on the sandy shores of Hilton Head Island, you’ll be happy to retreat to the cozy master bedroom with a King bed, TV, and full bathroom.  The second spacious bedroom features a queen and twin bed.  Be sure to make use of all the amazing community amenities this property has to offer. Take the kids to the playground, go for a swim in the pool or get a quick workout in at the fitness center. There’s no shortage of fun activities at your disposal when you stay at the Hilton Head Island Beach and Tennis Resort.***Traveling with friends or a larger group?  We also own another two bedroom/two bathroom Tennis Villa in the same resort. Along with a one bedroom/one bathroom oceanfront Ocean Villa.  Check out our other listings below or send us a message with further questions:  https://abnb.me/tndmHtzqo3https://abnb.me/34URNZCqo3

name: Villa in Hilton Head Island

unit rental details: Entire villa hosted by Vacasa South Carolina6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in October 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
The spaceOcean One 420Perfect for friends and families alike, this fourth-floor villa is the definition of a perfect beach-cation rental! You and your guests can access the beach via the beach path on site - it's just a short walk away. Or you might as well visit the community outdoor pool for a refreshing splash!

Back home, enjoy the privacy of your covered balcony offering incredible nature views and an outdoor dining area for four. The air-conditioned interior hosts an inviting living area with comfortable sofas, a coffee table with a small and beautiful coastal-themed Tic-Tac-Toe, and a large flatscreen TV with cable. The gorgeous wooden table has enough space for up to six people and right next to it is a desk with a desk chair and a printer in case someone needs to work or study from home. The full kitchen is a chef's paradise with modern appliances, including a full-size fridge, stove, oven, coffee maker, dishwasher, and a mini wine cooler. There is a washer/dryer off of the kitchen for added convenience.

This coastal dream of a retreat has two bedrooms and two full bathrooms. The primary bedroom has a flatscreen TV and an en suite bath with a tub/shower combo, while the guest bedroom has access to a small, private balcony, a flatscreen TV, and an en suite bath as well with a standalone shower.

COMPLEX AMENITIES
-Charcoal grill
-Outdoor pool

THINGS TO KNOW
Please note that this is an oceanfront complex. The condo has no ocean views.
Absolutely no smoking in the villa or on the balcony.
This property is managed by Vacasa South Carolina LLC. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 4.Parking notes: There is free parking for 2 vehicles. Complex parking.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. more description: This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit.The spaceNewly Renovated One Bedroom Forest Beach Villas | Just a 5-Minute Walk to the Beach*1 Bedroom | 1 Bathroom*Sleeps 4*1 King, 1 Queen Sleeper Sofa*Dining Table with Seating For Four*2 TVs - 58" in LR | 42” in BR | Wi-Fi | Both Keurig & Ground Coffee Makers*5th Floor Villa with Views of the Ocean Over the Tops of the Trees*5 Minute Walk to the Beach | 4 Beach Towels for Guests Use*2 Beach Chairs*Large Walk-In Shower with Glass Doors*New Stackable Washer/Dryer*Keyless Entry*Oscillating Fan*Iron and Ironing Board*Free Covered Parking*Access to the Coligny Complimentary Transportation Golf Cart (seasonal)*Guests have access to Hard Surface Tennis Courts and Spacious Outdoor Pool Open Year-Round*Free Wi-Fi and Two Smart TV’s with Digital Cable in the Living Room502 Forest Beach Villas is unique, cozy and spacious for 580 square feet. A beautifully remodeled top floor unit, this villa is located on the 4th floor via elevator then a few steps up to the 5th floor and provides guests with peek-a-boo views of the Atlantic Ocean from the windows overlooking the parking lot.When entering the villa to the immediate left is a fully equipped kitchen which has new counter tops, tile floors, and plenty of counter space. The dining area, located just outside the kitchen, features a round top table for four and comfortable seating.The spacious living room features a brand-new sleeper sofa and loveseat, perfect for curling up with your favorite book, or peering out at the fantastic sunshine. Off the living room to the right is the master bedroom, with king size bed, Smart TV, and private bath with a new stackable washer and dryer inside, and new walk-in shower with tile and glass doors.Hilton Head beach-oriented rentals such as this one provides guests with everything they need. Guests will certainly enjoy this little piece of paradise nestled between beautiful vegetation, and the Atlantic Ocean. This property is within walking distance to various restaurants and shops at Coligny Plaza with live music, a grocery store, bike rentals, as well as the famous Tiki Hut Outdoor Beach Bar and the newly completed Lowcountry Celebration Park. *3 Night Minimum Stay Required. Summer Rentals Five Night Minimum.Monthly Rates Available Upon Request

more description: Your going to LOVE 405 North Shore Place and the wonderful new renovations that occurred in May 2020, including new flooring, quartz countertops, stainless-steel appliances, new dining and pendant lighting, fresh paint, new furnishings (including all new king bedroom furniture), coastal art/decorations, and all-new air conditioning!North Shore guests also enjoy a rooftop pool/hot tub and one of the two oceanfront pools located at Seacrest. And be sure to visit PoolBarJims!The spaceWhat a great floor plan!  Walk in to a foyer with a view straight through to the balcony.  The dining area with seating for six is to your left, the kitchen is straight ahead in the middle of the unit and the second bedroom and laundry room are to the right of the entrance.  The fully-equipped kitchen provides ample space and all cookware/utensils for family meal prep and three counter stools for quick meals.  A large living area includes a sleeper sofa and three additional chairs for family gathering and TV viewing.  The balcony is over-sized and includes a dining table for outdoor meals as well as two lounge chairs. The elegant master suite features an en-suite bathroom with separate vanity and tub/shower areas.  And the second bedroom has two full beds and a full bath.  This condo can comfortably handle up to six adults or even a family of eight (since the full beds can each sleep two children).

name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States

number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in October 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
The spaceSeascape Villas 3201There is nothing quite like a vacation to the sunshine, pristine golf courses, and white sand of Hilton Head, so make your way to Seascape Villas 3201 and feel right at home in this island gem. Perched within walking distance from Coligny Beach Plaza, a plethora of restaurants, and shopping galore, you will have no trouble finding endless ways to use each day. Stay close to home and soak up sunshine with the shared pool and private patio overlooking the pond.

Inside, you will find everything needed to relax and slip into the island mindset including high-speed WiFi, tropical decor, and plenty of room for the whole gang to spread out. Before heading out to the beach, the cooks of the group will love hopping into the full kitchen to whip up a tasty breakfast and fresh pot of coffee to start the day on a tasty note. When it is time to settle in for the evening, watch the last colors of the sunset reflecting off of the pond and head inside to stream favorite movies on the flatscreen TV in the living room. You can pack light on this trip as well with the private washer and dryer for guest use.

Don't miss out on this perfect oasis and book your stay today!

THINGS TO KNOW
This property is managed by Vacasa South Carolina LLC No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 1.Parking notes: There is free parking for 1 vehicles. Guests can only have as many parking passes as there are bedrooms.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in January 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Beautiful Cozy 3rd floor 2bed/2bath condo in Treetops.  We have everything you need to enjoy your Island vacation including beach gear!Bonus Loft/game room that our kids love with a Bunk bed. Perfect for a family vacay, or remote work w/High speed WIFI2/3 pools are just steps away from our front entryway or one of our private screened in porches.We are nestled in a quiet wooded community located in the popular Forest Beach/Coligny area. Complimentary cable, Netflix, and coffee are provided.The spaceOur beautiful condo has been recently updated with all new furnishing and tastefully decorated. Great Location! Park your car and walk to beach or ride your bikes to Coligny shopping plaza down the street for souvenirs, a bite to eat, or some ice cream. Both bedrooms have brand new king Nectar Mattresses with a gel memory foam. It's like sleeping on a cloud! Both have access to their own screened in porch! 32" smart tv with cable and Netflix in both bedrooms. The main room features stunning high vaulted ceiling with plenty of light shinning down on the large sectional and dining table. 55" smart tv with cable and complimentary Netflix provided. If you are working remotely we have high speed wifi and a wireless printer provided for you. Go up the beautiful spiral staircase to the loft, where we have a bunk bed with a supersized bag chair with memory foam and a foosball table for your entertainment. *Bassinet and high chair provided if needed. The Kitchen is fully stocked for staying in and cooking your own meals. We have a Tea kettle and a Keurig individual/12-cup carafe drip brewer with complimentary coffee to get you started.  We are on the top floor so you won't have to worry about noisy neighbors.

more description: The perfect vacation escape at this beautiful renovated ocean front villa with beautiful sunrises, ocean views, and waves breaking!The spaceIf you are looking for a true beach vacation getaway directly on the beach of Hilton Head, this is the place for you . Amazing beach and ocean views and sounds of the waves from the living rroom and balcony of this villa. There are beautiful and serene views of the ocean and  incredible sunrises to enjoy right from your balcony.  You are just steps from one of the best sandy beaches on Hilton Head. This villa has a costal feel and beach decor throughout including an open floor plan, It has 1 bedroom and a pullout sofa. Perfect for a small family or 2 couples.  The villa has 1 full bath and a full size kitchen with all of the essentials. There is an elevator close to the villa entrance and a laundry room nearby the unit.Hilton Head Beach and Tennis Resort offers 2 swimming pools including the largest beach front pool on Hilton Head.   There are 8 Tennis Courts and 4 Pickleball Courts for guests enjoyment.  The resort has a playground, basketball courts, picnic areas with charcoal grills, and bike rentals for family fun!!  There are 2 restaurants on site for close by dining or beachside eating. Golf is close by at Port Royal Resort or Palmetto Dunes Resort.  Hilton Head has over 50 miles of bike and walking trails.  Make your vacation at Hilton Head Beach and Tennis Resort one you will want to return to year after year. Guests have full access to 2 pools in the resort, tennis courts and pickle ball courts.   There is a playground, basketball court, volley ball on the beach and bike rentals at the resort, Hilton Head Beach and Tennis Resort is located directly on the beach and close to shopping, golf, tennis and bike rentals.. Some of the best water front restaurants such as Hudson’s Dockside and Fish Camp are a short car ride away.

more description: Welcome to the Island! Relax and enjoy our direct oceanfront, pool front, newly renovated one bedroom, one bathroom, beautiful beach villa. Look out your balcony and see nothing but ocean water! Listen to the waves on your spacious, private balcony, while soaking up the sun during the day or relaxing & star gazing at night. You will enjoy the wonderful accommodations and convenient location very close to the popular Coligny Plaza with spectacular views at Ocean Dunes!The space**Add my listing to your wishlist by clicking the ❤ in the upper-right corner**✦Private gated community✦Beachfront HEATED POOL - Open all year round!✦Onsite Resort Cafe / Tiki Bar & Grille ✦Short 10 minute walk to Coligny Plaza (tons of shopping + restaurants + bars)✦3rd Floor - Breathtaking ocean views✦Some of the best golf courses in the world just a short distance away✦12 miles of pristine beaches✦Large 55-inch flat screen TV✦NETFLIX, Hulu, etc. login capability via SMART TV✦Cable TV with FREE Wifi✦Both Drip and Keurig Coffee machines✦Onsite BBQ charcoal grills & picnic tables✦Custom designed quartz countertops✦Marble walk-in bathroom✦Queen bed, sleeper memory foam sofa bed, bunk beds (on the smaller side mainly meant for children)✦Fully equipped kitchen: stove, oven, full size refrigerator, microwave, toaster, dishwasher, dishes, pots & pans✦Onsite washer & dryer (coin operated)✦Flat screen TV in bedroom✦600 sq. ft✦Luggage carts✦ElevatorPlease no pets / no smokingWHAT IS HILTON HEAD KNOWN FOR?12 miles of pristine Beaches!! Sunsets over the inland Waterway & Marshes, 24 Golf Courses + RBC Heritage Golf Tournament at Sea Pines! 100’s of Restaurants, boating, chartered fishing trips, arts, culture & history, waterfront activities, marinas, nature trails, wildlife, historic Civil War landmarks, coastal nature preserves, golf, kayaking, tennis, pickleball, yoga, scenic biking trails & biking on the beach, paddle boarding, Kite-Surfing, music events, horseback riding, huge Outlet Mall just off-island & more!35 back road miles to Historic Savannah & 2-hour drive from Beautiful Charleston!! Also check out Historic Beaufort, SC---just 30 minutes away!

more description: Your perfect family getaway is awaiting at this newly renovated space in Hilton Head Resort! The beach is a short walk away (~7-8 minutes) across a boardwalk with spectacular lowcountry views. The resort comes complete with 3 pools, 6 tennis courts, a hot tub, a sauna, a workout center and an indoor track. This well maintained villa has a memory foam king bed, two hybrid twins and a pullout queen sofa. With brand new appliances, a full kitchen, and a 70" flatscreen, you'll feel at home!The spaceHILTON HEAD RESORT:• Less than 10 minute walk to the beach!• 3 private pools (2 outdoor and 1 indoor)• Hot tub• Workout center• Secure community with on-site security guards, providing peace of mind• Outdoor showers to rinse in after you sunbathe• Restricted parking access to owners and guests only (entry passes provided)• Laundry and dryer in building• Elevator in building• Indoor trackTHE UNIT:• Self check-in with Schlage Smart Lock System (no key required)• Freshly painted in a tasteful silverpoint shade• Bountiful amenties including soaps, shampoos, and conditioners included• Full Kitchen with brand new stainless steel appliances, including Oven, Fridge, Dishwasher, Microwave, Coffee maker, and Pots & Pans• Newly installed chrome bathroom fixtures• Linens and Bath towels providedBEDROOMS:• Brand new memory-foam king bed (Purchased in 2021)• Two hybrid twin mattresses• Plentiful closet space (and hangers) and wooden dressers, giving you more than enough space• Mounted 55" flat screen TV with cable and streaming appsLIVING ROOM:• Recently purchased 70” LG 4K Smart TV with access to Hargray digital cable and all your favorite Smart TV apps• Queen sleeper sofa provides for extra sleeping room if necessary• Wooden dinner table and chairs fostering delicious stay-at-home meals• Numerous side tables for drinks, games, snacking, etc.

more description: Gated Beachfront Resort w/Golf, Tennis, Pools, Pickleball & Pub!Gorgeous Sunny Villa w/Panoramic Lagoon & Golf Views!Beautiful & Lush Resort w/Huge Old Oaks, dripping in Spanish Moss● Walk & Bike Paths● Close to Coligny● Stylish Villa w/Coastal Décor● Stocked Kitchen● Sunny 1st Floor ● KING BED Master● Walk-in Shower ● 3 XL SmartTVs● FREE WIFI, CABLE & NETFLIX ● Washer & Dryer● Beach Chairs, Umbrella, Boogie Boards & More!● Walk to Golf Club & Pub!●Pool●Gas BBQ●Keyless EntryThe spaceIf you like what you see: Press ❤ on the upper right corner to save our listing so you can easily return to book!Gorgeous 1st floor Villa located in a private neighborhood within a Gated Beachfront Golf & Tennis Resort...has panoramic Lagoon & Golf course views from huge wrap-around porch!Amazing Natural Beauty - Lagoons, Majestic Old Oaks w/Spanish Moss, Palmettos, Wildlife, Lush Landscaping! RESORT AMENITIES:Beach Golf Huge Pool  Free Tennis  Free PickleballPub & Restaurants VILLA OVERVIEW:  Upscale Sunny Villa with Sand & Sea Coastal décor! BEDS:1 King Bed1 Double Bed1 Bunk Bed1 Queen Sofa Bed1 Twin Sofa Bed1 Pack & Play ● LIVING ROOM:65” SmartTV mounted above stone fireplace!Watch free CABLE & NETFLIX!Hulu, Amazon, etc. avail. - just bring your account passwords. 1 Queen Sofa Bed1 Single Sofa Bed1 Pack & Play ● KITCHEN / DINING:Large fully-equipped kitchen; featuring stainless steel appliances!  Dining table seats 6!● COFFEE BAR: We provide a Keurig,  a drip coffee maker,  Pour-Over,  French Press & a Coffee Bean Grinder! ● MASTER  BEDROOM w/ ENSUITE BATHComfortable Coastal style!  -KING BED,Ceiling fanXL 55” flat-screen SmartTV with FREE CABLE & NETFLIX!  Large walk-in closet.● GUEST BEDROOM:1 Double Bed1 Bunk Bed Coastal style full-size bed, plus a fun bunk bed!  Features a large closet, ceiling fan, and large 52” flat-screen SmartTV with FREE NETFLIX!  Hulu, etc (just bring your account passwords). Roomy Closet!● QUEEN SLEEPER + TWIN SLEEPER in living room - plus privacy window shades!●  PACK & PLAY BED & HIGH CHAIR  HINT:  (Many parents place Pack & Play Bed in the roomy Master Walk-in Closet to give their child a quiet & dark space!)● BATHROOMS:MASTER BATH boasts a large glass walk-in shower and a new, elegant vanityGUEST BATH features a tub/shower and a new, elegant vanity● LAUNDRY:Full-size washer/dryer!● PATIOS:Wrap around patio area has a table & plenty of seating, plus a Gas BBQ Grill!  Spot herons, snowy egrets , deer & alligators drifting by in the large lagoon, or watch golfers playing the course!● PARKING:Large FREE parking lot right out front! ● BEACH:Private Beach Access via the boardwalk at the resort’s  Beach Club (has outdoor showers, restrooms, etc.)  We recommend loading the car (Beach Wagon, chairs, umbrella & more provided) and using our Beach Club Parking Pass to park right at the beach club....makes carrying all the needed beach gear a lot easier! ● BEACH EQUIPMENT PROVIDED:Beach wagon, beach chairs, umbrella, boogie boards, ice chest, tennis rackets and balls, etc.!   (6 Beach towels provided as a courtesy—just launder & put away before you leave.)● GOLF:The villa is right on the 27 hole course & walking distance to the Golf Club!  Ask about SPECIALS including golfing at other courses.  Enjoy drinks & dining inside or out at the Golf Pub!!● POOL:Giant pool (private to our neighborhood) across the street.● FREE TENNIS:Play FREE at our private, lighted courts next to the pool—4 rackets & balls provided!● FREE PICKLEBALL:Play at our private, lighted courts next to the pool● RESTAURANTS INSIDE RESORT:Within the resort gates:  Enjoy lunch or dinner at one of many Shipyard choices, from the Brickyard Pub at the golf club to the many indoor-outdoor restaurants at the beachside Sonesta—right next to our Beach!● HILTON HEAD IS KNOWN FOR:  12 miles of pristine Beaches, Sunsets over the inland Waterway & Marshes, 24 Golf Courses + RBC Heritage Golf Tournament at Sea Pines!  100’s of Restaurants (Southern Food & eating on the water!), boating, zipline, chartered fishing trips (Great White encounters!!), arts, culture & history, waterfront activities, marinas, nature trails, wildlife, Mitchellville (freed slave settlement), historic Civil War landmarks, coastal nature preserves, African-American Gullah-Geechee history, golf, kayaking, tennis, yoga, scenic biking trails & biking on the beach!!, paddle boarding, Kite-Surfing, music events, horseback riding on the beach, huge Outlet Mall just off-island & more!!Visit Old Town Bluffton with its many restaurants & shopping opportunities, including 2 Outlet Malls - just off -island!   Also check out Historic Beaufort, SC ---just 30 minutes away!!35 back road miles to Historic Savannah and a 2-hour drive to Beautiful Charleston! ☀ CLEANING ☀    Our Cleaning Service chemical disinfectants, in addition to their regular, thorough cleaning. We also provide Antibacterial Cleaners under each sink & have contactless & keyless check-in using a coded keypad on the outside door!!

The villa is located mid-island, which is just a short drive to all the attractions that Hilton Head has to offer, including many dining options, putt-putt, Harbor Town, shopping, dolphin tours and fishing excursions.The spaceAccommodations includes one king bed in the master and a queen sleeper sofa in the living room. We give a discount for monthly reservations.

more description: Recently updated with new paint, new furniture and new cleaning company.  Bright and sunny condo on the top floor. Perfect get-away for a family of up to 6. Our condo features a full bed, 2 kid bunk beds, new queen sleeper sofa, full kitchen & private balcony. Steps the beach, pool, tiki bar and shaved ice stand.  Additional restaraunts, playground & tennis courts are onsite. Weekly activities in the summer include Pool Dance Party, movie nights, wildlife talks and arts and crafts for the kids.The spaceThis is a cute beach get-a-way with bright decor and all amenities included. Perfectly situated on Folly Beach and just steps to the beach! Just take the boardwalk right over to the sand. Our place is part of a resort, with the largest beachfront pool on Hilton Head.  It also has 3 restaurants, another pool, playground for kids, 10 tennis courts, a fitness center and onsite bike rentals during the season.  Our place is situated in the best of both worlds. The condo has an amazing price ocean view, is mid-island (less crowded beaches); yet only minutes from the action of Hilton Heads main hot spots: Coligny, Sea Pines, Shelter Cove, and Skull Creek. Other great attractions include dolphin tours, golf, Yoga on the beach, kayak and jet ski rentals, bike paths, and the famous Harbour Town Lighthouse. There’s so much more to do on this funky, colorful little island.On the way to the beach, you’ll find a beachfront pool, kiddie pool and plenty of lounge seating. Next to the pool is a Tiki Bar and restaurant as well as a shaved ice stand for kids of all ages. Also, the grounds include tennis courts, a playground, and an amazing fitness center.We recently added a new queen sleeper sofa, new table with additional seating.  We also additional storage items, Blu-ray player with movies and games.  We want to ensure you have everything you need while away from home.The condo is completely furnished, including a fully equipped kitchen with a full-size fridge, microwave, four-burner stove, oven, coffee maker, blender, toaster and all essential cooking ware (pots, pans, etc.).  Also, it includes all dish and flatware (utensils, plates, glasses). The unit is on the third floor. There is an elevator available for you to use along with luggage carts to aid in getting your stuff to the condo. Since our place is on the third floor there is a great view of the ocean from the balcony.The main bedroom has full size bed and has a very comfortable memory foam mattress as well as a TV. It has a large closet with plenty of room for your luggage and clothes.The bunk beds are such a fun experience for kids. It includes a ladder for the kids to climb to the top bunk. We also have Igor’s for the kids to read or put on a puppet show.The living room has a comfortable sofa, with a HD-TV that includes full cable, Blu-ray player and movies for the whole family.  Additionally we recently added games to play in case you get tired of being at the beach.

more description:
The spaceHarbourside 7150Have the vacation of a lifetime staying in this rare, top-level, end-unit with a wrap-around, covered balcony located in the Harbourside complex! With a breathtaking view of the marina, just a short distance to shops and restaurants, and a spacious outdoor patio perfect for dining outdoors and taking in the beautiful surrounding views, this condo has everything you need for a perfect stay on Hilton Head Island. Not to mention, this home features a spacious open kitchen with granite countertops, a gorgeous master bathroom, and a spacious living room and dining area perfect for lounging indoors. Grab any of the books available and snuggle in one of the comfortable sofas after lunch, or head over to the shared pool to take a deliciously refreshing dip.

What's nearby:
Explore some of Hilton Head Island shops and boutiques at the Shelter Cove Plaza, which is only one mile away! You can also enjoy live music, ice cream shops, and a park and playground perfect for family and friends! Not to mention, Singleton Beach is just two and a half miles away. Spend the day soaking up the sun and enjoying the breathtaking Atlantic Ocean! Book this amazing condo today!

Free WiFi
Full kitchen
Central A/C
Private washer & dryer

more description:
The spaceOcean Dunes 208This Hilton Head vacation rental is a nicely renovated one-bedroom villa in South Forest Beach. From the balcony, there is a panoramic view of the ocean and beachfront pool. Entering the villa, the bedroom is on the immediate right with a king bed and a flatscreen TV. Past the bedroom is the renovated bathroom with custom vanity and countertop and a standalone shower.

Experience your own slice of beachfront paradise at this gorgeous ocean-view condo in South Forest Beach - perfect for a girls trip or a romantic getaway. Located in Ocean Dunes, enjoy access to a sparkling heated pool, while all the action on the beach is mere steps away. You'll love being located within walking distance of many shops and restaurants of Coligny Plaza, a short walk up South Forest Beach.

Start vacation days with morning coffee on us while taking in the panoramic view of the ocean and beachfront pool. This thoughtfully upgraded condo features a completely renovated kitchen with all-new appliances and a center island, while the bathroom boasts a beautifully tiled standalone shower. In the evening, kick back and relax on the living room sofa bed while watching favorite TV shows. 

THINGS TO KNOW
This vacation rental is not equipped with a washer/dryer; there are coin-operated facilities located on-site.
During the months of September - May, the complex may be performing varied maintenance work. Effects of this can include but are not limited to, extra noise, reduced parking, and construction zones. We will do our best to make all guests aware, but Vacasa does not always get notified of projects before they start. We apologize for any inconvenience you may experience during your stay.
This property is managed by Vacasa South Carolina LLC. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.Parking notes: There is free parking for 1 vehicles. Parking for one vehicle only. Additional vehicles will need to park elsewhere, at guest's expense. THIS CONDO PROVIDES :● Ocean View from top floor balcony!● HGTV featured decorator completed 100% High-end renovation● KING BED (Most units have Queen Bed w/ 12" space on each side)● Expanded Bedroom● Two 65" SmartTVs ● FREE:  Netflix & Prime, Fast Wi-Fi, Cable & Long Distance Phone Calls● Black-Out Sleeping conditions in Bedroom● Multiple COFFEE making options!● A/C  & Heat in Bathroom - very unusual for this resort!● New Kitchen w/Full Size Stainless Appliances● High-Efficiency A/C● BEACH EQUIP: boogie boards, beach chairs, umbrella, cooler, noodles● Top Floor Unit - No Neighbors above & Best Views!● PACK & PLAY BED + HIGH CHAIR  RESORT AMENITIES: ● 4 Boardwalks for Private Beach Access● Largest Beachfront Pool on HHI   ● Beachfront Tiki Bar & Grille! (Winter Hours ~ November - mid February)● 3 Restaurants & 2 Bars  ● FREE: Gym, Tennis & Pickleball  ● Beach Bike Rentals● BBQ area● Beach Volleyball  ● Basketball● Playground ● Racquetball● 2cd pool ● RV, BOAT & TRAILER PARKING ● Helpful Front Desk Concierge!● Free Island Trolley Stop (Summer) ROOM BY ROOM FEATURES:BEDS:1 King Bed1 Queen Sofa Bed1 Pack & Play Bed● LIVING ROOM 65" SmartTV with Cable, Prime & Netflix, Couch features comfy upgraded Queen Sleeper MASTER BEDROOM:● Rare King Bed ●●EXPANDED BEDROOM - most units have a queen bed with only 12" on each side between wall & bed. ●Ceiling fan●65" SmartTV w/Netflix & Cable! ●USB ports●Ceiling Fan ● BATHROOM:100% renovated w/glassed-in custom tile Shower, + Handheld Sprayer, all-new Marble vanity, Custom Tile Flooring & more--tons of storage.  A/C & Heat in bathroom- unusual for this resort!● KITCHEN:All-New, Fully Stocked w/ Full-Size Stainless Appliances, Gorgeous Stone Counters & Marble Backsplash!● DINING:Full-size Dining Table Seats 4 Ocean View Balcony Table seats 4● COFFEE:We provide Keurig and drip-style coffee makers, a French Press, and a coffee bean grinder.  Coffee is such a personal choice—plan to bring your favorite K cups, ground, or whole coffee beans!● EXTRASFREE CABLE, PRIME & NETFLIXFAST & FREE WIFIFREE Local & Long Distance CallsPACK & PLAY & HIGH CHAIR● BALCONY Wide Ocean & Pool ViewsSeating for 4● BEACH EQUIP PROVIDED: Boogie boards, 4 beach chairs, big umbrella, ice chest & pool noodles!  ● LAUNDRY●In Building Laundry.  Clean sheets & towels are provided at check-in-----if you'd like to do laundry during your stay, the front office has laundry cards for purchase.● PARKING Plenty of parking on both sides of our building.  Parking for one car is included in your reservation.   IMPORTANT:  1 car pass is provided.  There is a resort fee of $25 per car for additional parking passes.  If you need additional parking passes, let us know the additional Driver's Name & Dates so we can send an Airbnb invoice & request the additional pass after payment.● ELEVATOR, LUGGAGE RAMP & TROLLEYS IN BUILDING  HILTON HEAD IS KNOWN FOR:12 miles of pristine Beaches!!!, Sunsets over the inland Waterway & Marshes, 24 Golf Courses + RBC Heritage Golf Tournament at Sea Pines!  100’s of Restaurants (Southern Food & eating on the water!), boating, chartered fishing trips, arts, culture & history, waterfront activities, marinas, nature trails, wildlife, Mitchellville (freed slave settlement), historic Civil War landmarks, coastal nature preserves, African-American Gullah-Geechee history, golf, kayaking, tennis, yoga, scenic biking trails & biking on the beach, paddle boarding, Kite-Surfing, music events, horseback riding on the beach, huge Outlet Mall just off-island & more!!Visit Old Town Bluffton with its many restaurants & shopping opportunities, including 2 Outlet Malls - just off -island!   Also check out Historic Beaufort, SC ---just 30 minutes away!! 35 back road miles to Historic Savannah and a 2-hour drive from Beautiful Charleston!!  Also check out Historic Beaufort, Sc---just 30 minutes away!

more description:
The spaceBreakers 131Bright, beachy, and oh so adorable, this fantastic island condo will have you slipping into coastal relaxation in no time. When you step foot inside, you will be greeted by a long hallway that passes by the spacious bedroom, a full bathroom, and a private laundry area. As you make your way into the main living area, this gem is flooded with natural light coming through the sliding glass door leading to the balcony. Plus, everyone will love gathering at the dining table for a homecooked meal prepared in the full kitchen. When days heat up, the shared pool will be calling your name, so be sure to bring along all of your favorite bathing suits and some sunscreen. Not to mention, the beach is mere steps away as well as all of the hustle and bustle of Coligny Beach Park, so you will have no lack of fun activities to choose from. Regardless of whether you visit for the immaculate golf courses, white sand, or sweet sunshine, Hilton Head Island is ready to welcome you with open arms. 

Things to Know
Snowbird-friendly

description: Short walk to beach,  Coligny/Celebration Park!
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Kathryn4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in September 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to Vitamin Sea! A gorgeous, newly renovated and decorated villa in the IDEAL location for couples visiting Hilton Head Island.  Park your car for the duration of your trip. Roll out of bed and be on the beach to see the incredible sunset in 3 mins!  Walk to Coligny and Celebration Park in 5 mins! Bike to Sea Pines, Harbour Town, the local brewery and too many restaurants to list. Xanadu is a gated complex and extremely quiet and safe.  Come see what South Forest Beach has to offer!The spacePrivate, clean, quiet and safe  condo in the heart of all the activity.  Close enough to the beach to walk there in just a few minutes but far enough away to give you relaxation and quiet away from others when desired. You will have the entire unit to yourself.  Xanadu Villas offers tennis/pickleball courts and an outdoor pool for your enjoyment.  It offers direct and quick access to the beach via the beach path right across the road. You can rent a bike at Island Bike Rentals, also conveniently located right at the end of the Xanadu driveway, and bike all over the island on the paved bike trails. After a busy day on the beach, biking or at the shops, enjoy coming back to a secure and tranquil villa to enjoy a cocktail on the balcony overlooking the lagoon and pool or sit by the pool and relax.  Our goal is to make everything easy for you so that you can focus on your vacation.  We have beach chairs, cooler, umbrella and sand toys right in the villa for your use.  We have multiple places for you to hang your wet towels and then sit back and relax.  After a long flight or drive, you will be able to drive right up to Xanadu and gain immediate access via lockbox and key code. No need to worry about having to find and drive to an additional location to pick up keys or car passes.  It is all right at Xanadu awaiting your arrival.While this villa is new to us - and you - we are not new to this site.  Please visit our other property to see our reviews.  We have continually been named Super Hosts for our five star customer service. Feel free to visit us in Florida at:  Mickey's Vacation Villa, Clermont Florida hosted by Kate and Kevin.Please let me know if you have any additional questions on this property.  We look forward to hosting you!

more description: The spaceIsland Club 6401Imagine basking in oceanfront views from your fourth-floor balcony every morning. With three flatscreen TVs, nearby beach access, shared pools and hot tub, this Island Club villa is the ideal getaway choice for your next vacation.This well-manicured resort property is half a mile from the Folly Field Beach Park, which you can walk to or rent a bike to ride. Walkways weave through the verdant landscape of the complex, offering direct access to the beach and the resort's sundeck. Within the complex, you'll find nine tennis courts, fishing lagoons, a fitness center, and basketball courts, as well as a picnic area with lawn games, a children's playground, and multiple shared pools.This two-bedroom condo features an open galley kitchen with upgraded counters and modern appliances, as well as free WiFi and a private washer/dryer. The living room is complete with sliding glass doors that lead to a wide patio. The master bedroom has a king bed, private bathroom with a walk-in shower, and direct access to the patio. The second bedroom contains two twin beds.Thanks to the sub-tropical climate and a bustling resort community, the Island Club is open all year long and available for relaxing beach getaways. Don't delay in securing your rental today!ISLAND CLUB AMENITIESSeasonal, shared pools in the center of the complex (early spring through November)Seasonal, shared hot tub (early spring through November - no children under 10)Island Club Tennis Center with tennis and pickleball courtsExercise roomMultiple picnic areas with shared charcoal and gas grillsFive private beach access points with rinse-off showersBusiness centers in the RotundaLawn games providedOn-site bicycle rentals availablePlayground for younger visitors13-acre catch and release, stocked lagoonTHINGS TO KNOWA sofa bed is included.Elevators in the buildings.This property is managed by Vacasa Vacation Rentals of Hilton Head Island LLC.The Island Club Management will close the lap pool and kiddie pool on the last Friday night in October. The hot tub will stay open and heated until the Friday night after Thanksgiving. The kiddie pool, lap pool, and hot tub are scheduled to reopen on the 2nd or 3rd Saturday of March, barring any maintenance issues.The heaters for both the lap and kiddie pools will stay on during the spring until the weather changes. The heaters will be turned back on in the fall, depending on the weather. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 4.Parking notes: There is free parking for 1 vehicles. Only 1 vehicle is allowed. Parking pass required for vehicle. No assigned parking. Gated entrance. No street parking.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in March 2019**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to our newly remodeled 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo. Everything in the condo is newly purchased, clean and in perfect condition. The beds and sheets all are brand new and comfortable. We are located at Hilton Head Resort with private board walk directly to the beach. Resort amenities include 2 outdoor pools, 1 indoor heated pool, indoor hot tub, indoor kid pool, gym, tennis/ pickle-ball courts, and two onsite food/drink bars (family friendly).The spaceOur focus in the renovations was to make staying in our condo feel like your own private hotel suite - only a bit more comfortable. This unit has two bedrooms and two bathrooms. The master bedroom has a brand NEW KING BED with a full bathroom attached. The guest room has two brand new full beds. The second bathroom has a standing shower and is attached to the main living room. Both rooms have a full sized closet with space for bags and hanging clothes. There is not a washer and dryer in the unit, but each building has multiple washer/dryer facilities. The living room has an incredible new couch that is deep seated and comfortable. All 6 guests will be able to sit on couch comfortably.  Living room has a smart TV with access to cable and smart apps like: netflix, hulu, Disney+, and much more. You will have access to great high speed wifi. The condo is equipped with a full kitchen that includes most everything you need to cook. (Pots, pans, cookie sheets, blender, toaster, coffee maker, and more.) We also provide a few extras for beach use: 4 beach chairs, beach wagon, and umbrella. We installed an electronic lock that makes self-checkin a breeze. The resort has a twenty four hours gated entrance. EASY CHECK IN. Great for late arriving guests. Whether you're staying for two nights or for one month we will set you up with a comfortable, convenient, and relaxing stay.

more description: Relax at this peaceful and stylish condo right on the beach. This is Hilton Head’s hidden gem with stunning nature views, beautiful mature landscaping, 3 pools, a hot tub, and 3 tennis courts. Your  newly remodeled 2-bedroom condo has lagoon and sound views and a stunning screened-in porch. Features all new LG appliances, quartz countertops, fast Internet, a 65” HD TV in the living room, 55” TVs in each bedroom, and all the beach equipment you’ll need including cart, umbrellas, toys, and more.The spaceThis condo is in the first phase of the development closest to the beach and enjoys the best views of the beautiful interior garden and sound. It has a large open floor plan that is comfortable for lounging and entertaining. Fine art, custom built furniture, and high end finishes are used throughout this new renovation. Enter through the well appointed kitchen featuring quartz countertops, new LG appliances including a French door refrigerator and induction stove, and all the basics you will need for your stay. There are pots, pans, cooking utensils, spices, extra virgin olive oil, whole bean coffee, teas and honey, granola, and more stocked fresh for you. The door off the kitchen holds the laundry closet with a stackable washer and dryer. Laundry pods, dishwashing pods, and dish detergent are provided. Just past the kitchen is the dining table, which comfortably seats 6. Opposite that is a wet bar with a blender stored underneath.The living area follows and has a comfortable sectional, a solid metal coffee table from MoMA, and a 65” 4K FireTV. The private screened-in porch is accessed through sliding doors and features custom-built bench-seating with cushions and a breakfast bar with two high stools. Enjoy stunning views of the lagoon, mature plantings., and the sound. Beach supplies are stored underneath the seating.The owner’s bedroom and en-suite bathroom is opposite the living area. The bedroom features a super comfortable queen size bed -the highly reviewed Zinus 12” Green Tea memory foam mattress - with 400 count cotton bedding and four pillows. A 55” FireTV is wall mounted and both bedside tables have lamps with USB charging ports. A selection of charging cables is provided. Towels and beach towels are on hand as well plus toiletries like Meyers hand soap, toothbrushes and toothpaste, and a three pump dispenser in the shower for organic body wash, shampoo, and conditioner. The owner’s bedroom boasts two huge windows that provide beautiful garden views. The guest room is most suitable for children and features two twin beds -both the well reviewed Zinus 8” Green Tea memory foam mattresses. All bedding is 400 count cotton. This room also has a bean bag chair, 55” FireTV, and features a fun wall light that is touch activated. The guest bath also has towels and all toiletries.
