description: Two Huge Oceanfront Pools With Pool Bar Jim’s
name: Apartment in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Melissa And Brian6 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 4 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in April 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Our beautifully renovated SeaCrest condo lists as a one-bedroom but feels and functions as a two-bedroom thanks to the extra large bunk beds that are tucked away in a nook without intruding on the living space and the inclusion of a second full bath.  Families with four children, or even six adults will enjoy a very comfortable vacation here.Plus, SeaCrest is perhaps the finest oceanfront resort in ultra-desirable Coligny Circle area with two large oceanfront pools and poolside bar/grill.The spaceLocated on the 2nd floor, our 1160 sq ft. SeaCrest condo has undergone a complete renovation that is nothing short of spectacular.  Most notably a kitchen transformation with updated quartz countertops and new refrigerator and oven/stove, the master en-suite bathroom with the addition of a large tiled shower to compliment the large soaking tub plus dual vanities.  And the complete renovation of the second full bathroom with marble flooring and tiled shower.  You will love it!Our villa is an end unit, which offers additional square footage as well as more windows.  A balcony off the living room offers a peek-a-boo ocean view along with tropical landscaped shrubs and palm trees that surround a side parking area.   From the front entrance of the villa, there is a master bedroom on the left decorated in a soothing color scheme. There is a king bed, 42 inch flat screen TV, and a dresser. A closet provides storage for your belongings and extra bedding. The spacious private master bath provides a large soaking tub, large dual-sink vanity and tiled shower.. The second full bath offers a shower and is conveniently located near the living area.Entering the living area guests will note the large dining area and large bunk beds that are cleverly tucked away in a nook area so as to not impede on the living space. Guests will feel inspired to whip up a gourmet meal in the newly updated kitchen. Features include quartz counter tops, and a breakfast bar with 4 tall counter chairs. Serve a special family dinner in the dining area featuring  a wood dining table and six chairs.   It will certainly be easy for a large family of 6 to relax in the tastefully decorated living room. There is a new queen-sized sleeper sofa and two comfortable chairs for TV viewing or family gathering.

more description: The spaceWindsor Court North 4209This spacious and beautifully decorated second-floor condo combines breathtaking oceanfront views among the palm trees and an oceanfront pool and hot tub in the Windsor Court North resort to provide one of the finest vacation destinations on Hilton Head Island.The beach is within reach along the resort's private boardwalk, and the nearby Hilton Head Outfitters & Bike Rentals makes it easy to spend time bicycling around the island. Dining options in the area include The Dunes House and Alexander’s Restaurant and Wine Bar, so you’re sure to have enjoyable meals an easy walk away. The oceanfront pool is complete with bathrooms and heating during the colder months, and it includes a hot tub and zero-entry children’s pool to keep the kids happy and having fun.The living area includes airy furnishings like couches and comfortable chairs, and the balcony - with oceanfront views - includes comfy outdoor chairs and tables. The living area also houses a giant 55-inch flatscreen TV with a DVD player. The kitchen contains stone countertops, a breakfast bar, and plenty of cabinet space to fit your goods, the dishware, and the cookware that comes with the home. The spaceHH Beach & Tennis 320ADiscover true island living when you make this Hilton Head Island Beach & Tennis Resort condo your home base for a coastal getaway. Enjoy prime access to the best of the island, with the Folly Fields Beach, pedestrian trails, and world-class golf within minutes from home. The resort's pool and tennis courts offer even more on-site fun and leisure!

The bright, updated interior features a stylish open layout designed for comfortable group gatherings after each day's adventures. The private balcony makes a perfect perch for morning coffee or afternoon cocktails. The kitchen boasts a suite of stainless steel appliances for at-home meal planning convenience, including a dishwasher for easy cleanup. Enjoy some casual downtime in the living room while streaming your favorite shows and movies on the smart TV. Additional home essentials include free WiFi and central air-conditioning. Shared laundry facilities are located in the building for additional on-site access.

Treat yourself to island living at HH Beach & Tennis 320A today!

more description:
The spaceForest Beach Villas 312Indulge in a memorable island getaway and make this newly remodeled condo home for a while here on Hilton Head Island. Wake up in your brand new bed, brew coffee in your choice of regular or Keurig coffeemaker, and enjoy the salty air of the beautiful Atlantic Ocean from the balcony while starting your day in paradise. When days heat up, soak up some sunshine by the sparkling shared pool or simply walk to the warm sand to listen to the tide. When days come to a close, there will be no better end to the day than a movie night on the flatscreen TV or a favorite cocktail on the balcony as the stars come out! 

What's nearby:
Hilton Head Island is a natural paradise and this home is in the perfect location to explore the island. With Coligny Plaza just steps away, and the rest of the South End within biking distance, you can park your car and never need to use it until you have to drive home! After a long day at the beach, walk across the street to Coligny Plaza, where you can experience all of the nightlife in "Hilton Head's Downtown." Get dinner at one of the wonderful restaurants, or go shopping for everything from souvenirs to designer handbags and more.

Things to know:
High-speed WiFi
Beach access
Shared pool

more description: The spaceIsland Club 2504With ocean views from three rooms, four flatscreen TVs, and beach access just steps away, this Hilton Head condo is a peaceful getaway for you and your family! Located in the Island Club community, you'll have numerous recreational opportunities, including nine different tennis courts, multiple pools, and a fitness center. Those in a calmer mood can relax by the fishing lagoon or take a dip in the hot tub.Hilton Head's balmy climate makes this villa a perfect year-round destination. A fifth-floor location provides a feeling of seclusion, while still making it easy to access the resort's pools, fitness center, and tennis courts. For those who wish to explore, the shops, galleries, and cafes of Hilton Head Island are only a short drive away, and festivals are hosted frequently across the island.Inside, you'll find a comfortable living area with ample seating, cable TV, and access to the patio, which overlooks the beach and sparkling Atlantic Ocean. Fix yourself a snack in the fully equipped kitchen, which features granite countertops, modern appliances, and custom cabinets, then wind down the night with a movie or by planning the next day's adventures with the free WiFi.When you want to get away from it all, do it in style with this spectacular condo rental. Book your dates today!ISLAND CLUB AMENITIESSeasonal, shared pools in the center of the complex (early spring through November)Seasonal, shared hot tub (early spring through November - no children under 10)Island Club Tennis Center with tennis and pickleball courtsExercise roomMultiple picnic areas with shared charcoal and gas grillsFive private beach access points with rinse-off showersBusiness centers in the RotundaLawn games providedOn-site bicycle rentals availablePlayground for younger visitors13-acre catch and release, stocked lagoonTHINGS TO KNOWA sofa bed is included.Elevators in the buildings.This property is managed by Vacasa Vacation Rentals of Hilton Head Island LLC.The Island Club Management will close the lap pool and kiddie pool on the last Friday night in October. The hot tub will stay open and heated until the Friday night after Thanksgiving. The kiddie pool, lap pool, and hot tub are scheduled to reopen on the 2nd or 3rd Saturday of March, barring any maintenance issues.The heaters for both the lap and kiddie pools will stay on during the spring until the weather changes. The heaters will be turned back on in the fall, depending on the weather. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 5.Parking notes: There is free parking for 1 vehicles. Only 1 vehicle is allowed. Parking pass required for vehicle. No assigned parking. Gated entrance. more description: Newly renovated with ocean and pool views!The spaceThis newly purchased ocean view property in Barrington Arms has been completely renovated. New flooring, paint, furniture, appliances, bathrooms, kitchen and all new furniture including the mattress and sleeper sofa!Come experience the expansive ocean/beach views from the private balcony of one of this professionally decorated spacious one bedroom villa. The oceanfront villa offers a relaxing comfortable space with plush surroundings, full kitchen, and master bedroom with large walk-in shower. The outdoor amenities include a private beachside pavilion, large pool, hot tub, and grill/entertainment ideal setting for your next Hilton Head Island family vacation.The Leamington Community  is close to the bike path that will take you quickly to all the other amenities in Palmetto Dunes. This elevated first floor ocean view villa is a great choice for your next Hilton Head Island vacation. The kitchen has granite countertops, custom cabinets, ground coffee maker and keurig machine and bar seating for 2. The dining area has seating for four. The living room is furnished with a queen sleeper sofa, two club chairs, a 42”Smart TV/DVD. From the living room there is a slider to balcony with ocean views and seating for 4.The master bedroom has a king bed, Smart TV and private bath with large walk-in shower.Board games are provided for children and adults!Luggage carts are available in the covered garage parking area. Bikes can be rented and delivered to the covered garage parking area where the bike racks are found. Parking is free and available in front of the building or under the building where the elevator is also located to take you to the first floor. This 960 square foot condo is a wonderful choice for you next Hilton Head Island vacation.Pets are not allowed.*Pool is heated seasonally, hot tub is heated year round.

description: Jim's Chic Direct Oceanfront 2BR Villa
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Jim6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in April 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Renovated 4th floor villa with a breathtaking, unobstructed ocean view from the living room and master bedroom. Two bedroom suites, each with separate baths. New tile floors throughout. Fully appointed kitchen - granite countertops, updated cabinets, and stainless steel appliances. Walk to all of the amazing shops & restaurants of Coligny Plaza and the brand-new Celebration Park.  Jim Says: “I personally stay in each of my units to ensure they are maintained to my highest level of expectations.”The space409 Shorewood is a 2 bedroom, 2 bath, 4th floor villa, offering spectacular direct oceanfront views. You can watch the sunrise from your balcony, which is shared between the living room and the master bedroom. Beautifully decorated, the living room offers a queen sized sleeper sofa, and a 52 inch flat panel TV with HDTV featuring Blu-Ray DVD. There are new wood and tile floors throughout. The kitchen has updated cabinets, counter tops, Kuerig and stainless steel appliances. The kitchen, loaded with the essentials, also has amazing views of the ocean. It is no surprise to spot a pod of dolphins from the villa window!The master bedroom offers a king bed with a private bath with a walk-in shower w/grab bars. There is a wall-mounted 32 inch flat panel TV with HDTV and Blu-Ray DVD. Guests have access to a sliding glass door leading to the balcony with an unobstructed view of the ocean and beach.The second bedroom offers 2 twin beds with a 27 inch flat panel TV. The second bathroom is located in the hall just outside the bedroom with a combination bathtub/shower also with grab bars. Towels, linens, and bath soap/shampoo are provided. There is no smoking in the unit. Pets are not permitted.The Shorewood Complex is located in the highly desirable Forest Beach area and is within walking distance to Coligny Plaza which offers dozens of shops and restaurants.  There is a large oceanfront swimming pool with zero-entry and a water feature for kids to play. Other amenities include a children’s pool, a hot tub, an outdoor shower, and a private beach walk.

more description:
The spaceStones Throw 39 A stone's throw from everything is what you'll be at this shady beach retreat. Steps from pristine beaches and minutes from world-class golf and Hilton Head attractions, this two-bedroom villa is sure to please. Located in the Stone's Throw community of Folly Field Beach, you'll also enjoy access to a variety of onsite amenities including an outdoor pool, community grill/picnic areas, and direct beach access paths.

The two-story interior features a split-level design with upstairs bedroom spaces and communal living areas on the ground floor. Fully updated throughout, this brightly-lit space is rich with modern design and amenities. Private, furnished patios off the front and back of the home offer ample opportunity for summertime cookouts, al fresco dining, and five-o'clock cocktails.

The kitchen features a sleek array of stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, for whipping up at-home meals with ease. There's indoor dining for four or you can take meals out front to the four-seater patio table with an umbrella. Make the most of blue skies and sunshine with a barbecue out on the back patio using the private gas grill.

The living room is the perfect place to unwind after a day of sun and fun. Relax under the cool central AC while streaming your favorite shows and movies on the smart TV.

Things to know
Free high-speed WiFi - perfect for Zoom calls, remote work/schooling, streaming media  
Snowbirds welcome
Dog-friendly
The pool is open seasonally.
There are two beach chairs, an umbrella, beach toys, and a wagon available for guest use in the front storage closet.

This beautiful 2 bed/2 bath beach condo is perfect for your family vacation or romantic getaway! No streets to cross to get to the beach!Prime location.  Gated entry, private, and just a 5-minute walk to all the amenities of Coligny Plaza (70 Shops & Restaurants)!I also provide beach chairs, umbrella, and beach cart for your convenience during your stay!The spaceTastefully decorated  2 bedroom/2 bath Beachwood Place condo is located in the heart of South Forest Beach. Park your car for the duration of your stay because everything you will need is within walking distance!This perfect beach villa has been newly renovated with you in mind, making sure you have all the comforts of home. So sit back, relax, and enjoy your stay!The master bedroom is equipped with a KING size bed and 32'' HDTV for your enjoyment. The guest room boasts 2 twin beds, and also has a 32'' HDTV for your entertainment.The living room has a sleeper sofa, additional seating, and a large 55'' Smart HDTV. You'll want to also enjoy your morning coffee on the cozy balcony seating while taking in the sunrise!The kitchen has new granite counter tops with new stainless steel appliances, a Keurig coffee machine, blender,  and most everything else you'd need to make your family's favorite meals!The unit is located on the 2nd floor and there is an elevator making it easy to access for everyone. I also provide you with a beach wagon to make bringing your gear to the beach a breeze or even your groceries back from the nearby Piggly Wiggly grocery store!Living Area:55'' Smart HDTV Flat-ScreenDining Area for 4Kitchen with granite counter tops and fully equipped kitchenQueen Sleeper SofaPrivate BalconyMaster Bedroom:KING Sized Bed32''  HDTV Flat Screen Guest Bedroom:2 Twin bedsTravel Crib (Graco Pack ‘n Play Playard)32'' HDTV Flat Screen Booster seat (Fisher-Price)Sleeps 6Policies:- No smoking- No pets allowed- No events, parties or large gatherings- Must be at least 25 years old to bookGuest accessEasy keypad entry. I'll provide you with an access code to key-in at entry 48 hours prior to your arrival. No keys to worry about!Other things to noteHard to beat this location. You can walk to pretty much everything. You're at the beach, and you can walk to restaurants, grocery store, shops, hardware store, pizza place, and even to bike rental shops. Relaxed beach town vibe, great for families (that’s how we discovered it!) and for couples.

number of guests: 8 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 6 beds · **__** · 2.5 baths**__**Joined in May 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to your perfect family getaway on Hilton Head Island! This vibrant 3BR, 2.5BA luxurious villa is professionally decorated, accented with inviting, colorful coastal decor throughout. The villa offers a fully-remodeled kitchen, a spacious and comfortable living area with plenty of ways to relax and unwind. Outside, there is a large, private patio with a gas grill, an outdoor dining set and fast access to five community swimming pools and the beach. Snowbirds and long-term guests welcomeThe spaceThis vacation rental is right in the heart of the beautiful, world-class Palmetto Dunes resort, a gated community situated mid-island within a mile of dining, shopping, and a host of marina activities available at Shelter Cove. You'll have direct access to three world-class golf courses (for a fee), an award-winning tennis center, and an 11-mile interconnected lagoon system for canoeing and kayaking. And when you want to hit the beach, this condo is a short walk from some of Hilton Head's best beaches.

name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Dawn4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in August 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Pineapple paradise is a completely remodeled ground floor condo located in the South Forest Beach area. It is fresh and clean and ready for some sandy feet. The beach is across the street and Coligny is a 10-15 minute walk, where you will find dining, shopping and ice cream. Everything you need for a wonderful vacation is right here..all that’s missing is you.The spacePineapple Paradise is a completely remodeled 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom floor unit and is the perfect headquarters for your retreat to Hilton Head Island. This condo offers a fully equipped kitchen with seating for four. The living area is outfitted with a queen memory foam sleeper sofa for a good night’s sleep. If the weather is not permitting pop in a dvd or stream a show from your Netflix account to the smart DVD player.With everything there is to do on Hilton Head Island, you’ll undoubtedly wear yourself out by bedtime. That’s when your large master bedroom, with a comfortable queen bed, will look like a little piece of heaven. Need to unwind? The bedroom offers a combination TV/DVD player for late night viewing or you could kick your feet up on the recliner and read a book. By morning you will feel right at home on your covered patio, sipping a cup of coffee, surrounded by lush foliage.We also provide the linens and some starter supplies, such as a roll of toilet paper in the bathroom, a roll of paper towels and a couple of garbage bags.ONLY 1 PARKING PASS allowed per booking. If you bring more than one vehicle you will be responsible for finding parking for that vehicle. Pineapple Paradise delivers a Hilton Head Island vacation everyone in your group will remember fondly for years to come. Book your vacation today! We know you’ll love everything Hilton Head has to offer.

description: Dog-friendly condo with pool access, fast WiFi, washer/dryer, and central AC
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Vacasa South Carolina6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in October 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
The spaceSt. Andrews Common 1780Step into a cheerfully decorated, second-floor condo dressed in an upscale coastal style, equipped with everything you need to have a wonderful vacation. Skylight windows and cathedral ceilings welcome you into a spacious dining room containing a farmhouse-inspired wooden table. An extensive wrap-around balcony will make for spectacular views of the surrounding nature. A bonus nook and enclosed balcony are perfect for cozy chats. The comfortable living room features a comfy oversized couch, a smart TV, a cozy bench seat, and plenty of other seating, while the full kitchen, complete with granite countertops, is close enough to keep the refreshments coming. Two sets of French doors lead to a spacious wrap-around porch with views of the lush natural landscaping. A smaller, screened-in porch is perfect for a morning coffee or some peace and quiet. The private washer and dryer will ensure everyone looks their best during your stay, so you can afford to pack light for your trip. Central air conditioning will keep everyone cool and comfortable. Each bedroom is designed for comfort, with the main bedroom featuring a private balcony entrance and en suite bathroom. The open-air loft bedroom is perfect for guests who want their own space to play or relax. Whether you're relaxing from a day at the beach or a day on the links, you're sure to find peace at this sunlit hideaway.

This home is steps away from the on-site pool area (open April - September). It is a scenic one-mile walk to a beautiful sand beach and the Dunes House beachfront restaurant, where you can order a cocktail, grab a bite to eat, and enjoy the beach. On the way to the beach, you will pass the quaint and fun Palmetto Dunes General Store, bicycle rentals, tennis courts, and pickleball courts. Palmetto Dunes features miles of white sandy beach, 11 miles of lagoons, three world-class golf courses, and more. If you don't want to walk or bike, you can take advantage of the complimentary Dunes Buggy shuttle service in the summer season. After a day at the beach or on the links, you're sure to relax and unwind at this sunlit hideaway.

RESORT AMENITIES
Pool
3 Golf Courses
Tennis Courts
Pickleball Courts
Biking and Walking Trails

THINGS TO KNOW
This property is managed by Vacasa South Carolina LLC.1 dog(s)  are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 2.Parking notes: There is free parking for 2 vehicles. On-site communal parking is available for guests.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2.5 baths**__**Joined in October 2013**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Renovated spacious 2 Bedroom/2.5 bath condo(1280 sq ft). We are located just 2 blocks from the nearest beach (5 min walk) &  1/2 mile from Coligny Plaza where you can choose from over 20 restaurants & a variety of shops.  Courtside Villas has 2 onsite pools. Rental includes 1 hr of court time a day at Vandermeer Tennis Center. All 3 beds have brand new hybrid mattresses.The spaceFully equipped kitchen with basic spices; both Keurig and regular coffee maker (filters included), griddle, crock pot, hand mixer and a blender.  Large pantry for grocery storage.  Full size washer and dryer.   Open floor plan - kitchen flows into dining room and living room.  Great space for hanging out with the family. We also have board games, puzzles and books for you to enjoy. 1/2 bath is conveniently located off the dining room.  Two large bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms are located upstairs for extra privacy.  We even have a Pack-N-Play for little ones. Master bath has been totally remodeled with large walk in shower. Office desk is located in the 2nd bedroom - perfect for working from home. New flooring throughout the entire unit.  Please note that the unit is on the second floor.  Please see pictures to see the outside of the unit.  Climbing steps is required.  No elevators on-site.You are provided with a house starter pack which includes a bar of soap for each bathroom, 1 roll of paper towels & toilet paper for each bathroom, a few trash bags, and dishwasher detergent.  If you are staying more than several days you may need to purchase more supplies as there is no housekeeping to bring you additional items.  We do provide beach chairs for you to use but DO NOT provide beach towels.Please note that there are other units in the complex that are vacation rentals. Our unit is usually quiet but with that being said there is a potential for noise from other vacationers.There is a strict NO PETS and NO SMOKING policy in Courtside Villas. In addition to the NO PETS policy in our complex, the owner is allergic to dogs.  Additional cleaning fee of $500 will apply if violated.

name: Home in Hilton Head Island

number of guests: 10 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 5 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in March 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Magnolia & Maple has recently been updated and upgraded! New features include a work station with hi-speed internet,  surround sound in the living room and updated décor.  This  3 BR, 2 BA home sits on a quite street and offers the opportunity to relax by the private pool, walk or bike the 8/10 of a mile to PD's famous beaches, or get some exercise with tennis, golf, or pickleball.  Close to Shelter Cove shopping and dining.  HHI is a pedestrian and bike friendly area with plenty to do.The spaceWonderfully appointed home on Robert Trent golf course with private pool (available to be heated) on quiet street in beautiful Palmetto Dunes.  Fully furnished and equipped for up to 10 people, Magnolia & Maple is ready for your vacation. Tennis and pickleball are available at the sports center, along with golf at all three courses in Palmetto Dunes.  Bikes, kayaks and more can be rented nearby at Outfitters.  Welcoming front porch leads into a bright foyer. Around the fireplace, you will find a large family room with vaulted ceilings, flat widescreen TV with surround sound, and plenty of room to lounge.  A desk with high speed internet is available in case work interferes with your vacation time.  Off the family room is a Carolina room with generous seating and views of the pool, backyard and golf course. One side of the home has two bedrooms, one with two twin beds and sliding glass doors leading to backyard. The other has two full beds and a library.  Both have walk-in closets and extra twin mattresses for additional sleeping. Shared remodeled bath sits conveniently close to the  bedrooms. The other side of home has the primary bedroom, kitchen and dining.  The primary suite sports a king bed, walk-in closet, and sliding glass doors to the backyard.  Enjoy a rain shower in  the remodeled en-suite bathroom then step into a fresh terry bathrobe made available during your stay.   The kitchen is remodeled with granite countertops, new cabinets and stainless steel appliances. Completely equipped with all you need. Choose your coffee preference:  drip coffee maker,  Keurig and espresso machine are all options.  Dishes, silverware, mixing and serving ware as well as pots, pans and cooking utensils are all available.  Small appliances include crockpot, blender, toaster and electric griddle.  Full laundry right off the kitchen. There is a grill on the back  patio;  grill tools are in the kitchen.  The  dining room has seating for 8 and a full wet bar with bar tools, glassware and entertaining tools.  Every bedroom has a flat screen TV. Primary bedroom has a smart TV. Twin bedroom has an xBox.  Wireless internet and basic cable provided. Large backyard looks out onto the golf course.  A short walk or bike ride takes you to the Shelter Cove Towne Center with many restaurants and shops as well as grocery. During summer months watch the fireworks show at Shelter Cove from the backyard. Short bike ride to the immaculate private  beach. Enjoy entertainment at beachfront Dunes House. Enjoy all the Island has to offer at Magnolia & Maple!****Please note, complex charges a fee per car for gate access depending on length of stay ($25 for 3 - 8 days). Private pool can be heated for an additional charge.*****

more description: Walk to the BEACH! This newly remodeled 2 bedroom/2 bathroom villa is located in a gated community with 24 hour security & private access to one of the most beautiful beaches in all of HHI! Our condo, located in Building 1, is the closest building to the beach. Walk 400 yards via our boardwalk, over the marsh to a beautiful, uncrowded beach! Coco's Restaurant is located at the end of the boardwalk. Included are 6 tennis courts, 2 outdoor pools/1 indoor, 1 hot tub, track & weight room. Free WIFI!The spaceCome! See what awaits you at Hilton Head! Our condo, named for the tracks left on the shore by Hilton Heads Loggerhead turtles, is located in the heart of Hilton Head. We are right next door to Palmetto Dunes and the Robert Trent Jones Golf Course. Just down the block are the new shops and restaurants of Shelter Cove. All of these places can be accessed by car or bicycle. The bike path starts right outside the main gate of the resort. A little further down the road are some of the most beautiful places the low country has to offer! Enjoy a day trip to Savannah, GA (about an hours drive) or get lost in the quaint towns of Bluffton or Beaufort! For those needing access to Paris Island, we are approximately one hour away). Please note that the outdoor pool and snack bar are closed during the months of November through February, however the indoor pool is open year round!

description: Bright & Newly Updated 2 Story Condo- Forest Beach
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Megan6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 4 beds ·  · 2.5 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 2.5 baths**__**Joined in June 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Colorfully and freshly updated 1400 sq. Ft. two story condo with vaulted ceilings, all new furniture, decorations & household items.. This 2 Bedroom 2.5 bathroom condo is in the heart of Forest Beach. It is half a mile to the beach with a shaded biking path that takes you directly to the Alder Lane beach access!The spaceOur condo is a second story unit that can be accessed by stairs or elevator. The unit has two floors with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms on the first floor. The second floor has all the living spaces as well as a half bath, balcony overlooking Cordillo Parkway and a forest preserve, and high vaulted ceilings. The Master bedroom has a King bed and ensuite bathroom with TV. The spare room has 1 queen bed and 1 full bed with TV. The living room has a pull out couch as well. The dining room seats 6, and the kitchen is fully stocked with dishes, Keurig, and ninja blender. Stackable Washer and Dryer off kitchen for use!There are stairs up to the condo, and the condo is two story. Our complex offers bike racks, tennis courts, and three large pools for renters to use! The pools are open April 1-October 1 and are not heated We also provide board games, tennis rackets, beach wagon, outdoor rinse off, cooler, beach chairs and beach toys for you to use! We also know how hard  it is to travel with kids, so we have provided a pack n' play, baby gate, booster seat, umbrella stroller, plastic dishes, and baskets of toys!  We provide a start pack of dishwasher soap, toilet paper, paper towels, hand soap, tide, and garbage bags. We do NOT provide beach towels, so please bring those with! In our parking lot (right next to the condo) there is a walking/biking path that takes you directly across the street from the beach access. From our condo to the beach is .5 miles! It is about a 10-15 minute walk or very quick 5 minute bike ride. The path is also quiet and scenic so easy walk. We have a wagon at our condo to take to the beach if you do walk to make it easier!Two free parking spaces available during your stay, if booking at least 48 hours in advance.Per condo regulations, a maximum of 4 adults are allowed during any given stay. Children are permitted in addition to the four adults, but must be under 18 years old. Please contact us if you have any questions regarding this regulation.In extremely hot summer days the AC may be only able to cool down to 20 degrees below the outside temp. Example if the temp outside is 95, the AC may not be able to maintain cooler than 75. We do have fans in every room of the condo to help!

description: Sea Pines  Deer Island Tree House with Ocean Views
name: Bungalow in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire bungalow hosted by Meredith6 guests ·  · 3 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2.5 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2.5 baths**__**Joined in October 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Enjoy Hilton Head Island in this designer decorated sealoft on Deer Island in Sea Pines Plantation. Classy coastal chic touches throughout this  2 Bedroom, 2  Bath sealoft are complemented by floor to ceiling windows that extend views of Calibogue Sound and the abundance of wildlife adorning the natural landscape. Relax  or dine al fresco on the expansive decks and patios. Within a 3 minute walk,  many fine shoppes, restaurants and entertainment  await you in Harbour Town.The space2033 DEER ISLAND | HARBOUR TOWN | Hilton Head IslandImmerse yourself in wooded views and rustic tranquility in this architecturally dazzling sealoft villa, just a short bike ride away from the shopping, dining and excitement of Harbour Town.Bedrooms: 2Baths: 2Sleeps: 6Square Footage: 950 sq. ft.Area: Harbour TownProximity to Beach: Ride To BeachBeds: 2 QUEEN, 1 SLEEPERParking Space Capacity: 2Dog Friendly: NoExpansive multi-level deck with gas grill.  Pool and Beach Access in Sea Pines Plantation. Walk to Harbour Town. Your Hilton Head Island escape to enjoy the beaches, bike ride for miles, golf and play tennis or to simply relax should have this cozy, elegant home as your nest. Indoor Living with floor to ceiling windows, 4 Flat Screen Smart TV's and cable,  comfortable living room upstairs, with an additional sitting area/office area on the first floor. We offer Free Wi-Fi and a Bose Blue Tooth Wireless Speaker. All linens/towels/kitchen towels are provided. Trash bags, toilet paper, paper towels, hand soap, laundry and dish detergents and a first aid kit are provided.Sleeping Options: Master Bedroom with King Bed, Second Bedroom with  two Twins (can be converted to a king upon request), Sleeper Sofa in Living Room and Third Bedroom (downstairs via a separate entrance) has a queen bed with a sitting area and office/game table space. Please make note the third bedroom downstairs has a separate entrance with a Half Bath.The outdoor Oasis offers a private wrap around deck  with outdoor dining area to seat six with a gas grill and several lounge areas. The Kitchen is fully equipped and boosts stainless steel appliances, marble counter tops, dishwasher, ice maker, Keurig and  regular drip coffee makers, blender and all the cooking basics and dishware you may need. 8 Beach Towels and Chairs (mix of low folding chairs and high collapsible chairs), rolling beach cart and cooler are provided as an added convenience. Umbrellas and boogie boards are for rent by the Lifeguards.Parking for two vehicles available with in spaces provided with a Sea Pines Plantation Pass fee required per vehicle for admittance onto the Plantation. The Sea Pines Beach Club is 2 miles from the sealoft and may be accessed by free seasonal trolley, bike or car. The pool access is in South Beach of Sea Pines, 4 miles from the sealoft and is accessible for $15/day or $75/week.Entry to the sealoft is keyless.The sealoft is accessible by stairs only and therefore may not  be suitable for those who have difficulty using stairs.House Rules-No Smoking-No Pets-No events, parties, or large gatherings-Must be 21 years old to book and Photo ID may be required.Security Cameras- This home is equipped with an exterior camera for your protection and security.Location DetailsBeaches: Coligny Beach Park (4.8 miles), Singleton Beach (8.4 miles), Burkes Beach (8.5 miles), Dreiseen Beach Park (8.7 miles), Folly Beach Park (9.2 miles) and Fish Haul Beach Park (12.2 miles)Island Attractions: Harbour Town Lighthouse (0.4 miles), Stoney Baynard Ruins (1.4 miles), Shelter Cove Community Park (6.9 miles), Coastal Discovery Museum (9.0 miles)Golf: Harbour Town Golf Links (0.5 miles), Robert Trent Jones Oceanfront Course (7.2 miles), The Heritage Golf Collection on Hilton Head Island (9.8 miles), Golden Bear Golf Club at Indigo Run (12.0 miles)Shopping: Village at Wexford (4.3 miles), Coligny Plaza Shopping Center (4.7 miles), Shelter Cove Town Center (7.0 miles), Main Street Village (9.8 miles)Airports: Hilton Head Island Airport (10.6 miles), Savannah/Hilton Head International Airport (47.8 miles)

more description:
The spaceBreakers 131Bright, beachy, and oh so adorable, this fantastic island condo will have you slipping into coastal relaxation in no time. When you step foot inside, you will be greeted by a long hallway that passes by the spacious bedroom, a full bathroom, and a private laundry area. As you make your way into the main living area, this gem is flooded with natural light coming through the sliding glass door leading to the balcony. Plus, everyone will love gathering at the dining table for a homecooked meal prepared in the full kitchen. When days heat up, the shared pool will be calling your name, so be sure to bring along all of your favorite bathing suits and some sunscreen. Not to mention, the beach is mere steps away as well as all of the hustle and bustle of Coligny Beach Park, so you will have no lack of fun activities to choose from. Regardless of whether you visit for the immaculate golf courses, white sand, or sweet sunshine, Hilton Head Island is ready to welcome you with open arms. 

Things to Know
Snowbird-friendly

more description: Beachfront Building w/Wide Ocean View!All New Designer 100% Renovation w/KING BED●CONDO:Expanded BedroomTwo 65" SmartTVsFREE: Netflix, Amazon Prime, WIFI, Cable, Phone CallsHGTV Featured Decorator!New 100% RenovationKING BEDLuxe Coastal InteriorCoffee BarBeach Chairs, Umbrella, Boogie Boards , Ice ChestKeyless Entry●RESORT:Oceanfront Pool w/Tiki Bar & Grille3 Restaurants & 2 BarsFREE: Tennis, Gym, Pickleball & More!Bike RentalsConcierge24 Hour SecuritySummer Trolley StopThe spaceIf you are interested in booking: Press ❤ on the upper right corner to save this listing to your FAVORITES! All New Designer 100% Renovation!  3rd floor condo with Wide Ocean View!  Beachfront building located in an amenity-packed gated resort!  THIS CONDO PROVIDES :● Ocean View from top floor balcony!● HGTV featured decorator completed 100% High-end renovation● KING BED (Most units have Queen Bed w/ 12" space on each side)● Expanded Bedroom● Two 65" SmartTVs ● FREE:  Netflix & Prime, Fast Wi-Fi, Cable & Long Distance Phone Calls● Black-Out Sleeping conditions in Bedroom● Multiple COFFEE making options!● A/C  & Heat in Bathroom - very unusual for this resort!● New Kitchen w/Full Size Stainless Appliances● High-Efficiency A/C● BEACH EQUIP: boogie boards, beach chairs, umbrella, cooler, noodles● Top Floor Unit - No Neighbors above & Best Views!● PACK & PLAY BED + HIGH CHAIR  RESORT AMENITIES: ● 4 Boardwalks for Private Beach Access● Largest Beachfront Pool on HHI   ● Beachfront Tiki Bar & Grille! (Winter Hours ~ November - mid February)● 3 Restaurants & 2 Bars  ● FREE: Gym, Tennis & Pickleball  ● Beach Bike Rentals● BBQ area● Beach Volleyball  ● Basketball● Playground ● Racquetball● 2cd pool ● RV, BOAT & TRAILER PARKING ● Helpful Front Desk Concierge!● Free Island Trolley Stop (Summer) ROOM BY ROOM FEATURES:BEDS:1 King Bed1 Queen Sofa Bed1 Pack & Play Bed● LIVING ROOM 65" SmartTV with Cable, Prime & Netflix, Couch features comfy upgraded Queen Sleeper MASTER BEDROOM:● Rare King Bed ●●EXPANDED BEDROOM - most units have a queen bed with only 12" on each side between wall & bed. ●Ceiling fan●65" SmartTV w/Netflix & Cable! ●USB ports●Ceiling Fan ● BATHROOM:100% renovated w/glassed-in custom tile Shower, + Handheld Sprayer, all-new Marble vanity, Custom Tile Flooring & more--tons of storage.  A/C & Heat in bathroom- unusual for this resort!● KITCHEN:All-New, Fully Stocked w/ Full-Size Stainless Appliances, Gorgeous Stone Counters & Marble Backsplash!● DINING:Full-size Dining Table Seats 4 Ocean View Balcony Table seats 4● COFFEE:We provide Keurig and drip-style coffee makers, a French Press, and a coffee bean grinder.  Coffee is such a personal choice—plan to bring your favorite K cups, ground, or whole coffee beans!● EXTRASFREE CABLE, PRIME & NETFLIXFAST & FREE WIFIFREE Local & Long Distance CallsPACK & PLAY & HIGH CHAIR● BALCONY Wide Ocean & Pool ViewsSeating for 4● BEACH EQUIP PROVIDED: Boogie boards, 4 beach chairs, big umbrella, ice chest & pool noodles!  ● LAUNDRY●In Building Laundry.  Clean sheets & towels are provided at check-in-----if you'd like to do laundry during your stay, the front office has laundry cards for purchase.● PARKING Plenty of parking on both sides of our building.  Parking for one car is included in your reservation.   IMPORTANT:  1 car pass is provided.  There is a resort fee of $25 per car for additional parking passes.  If you need additional parking passes, let us know the additional Driver's Name & Dates so we can send an Airbnb invoice & request the additional pass after payment.● ELEVATOR, LUGGAGE RAMP & TROLLEYS IN BUILDING  HILTON HEAD IS KNOWN FOR:12 miles of pristine Beaches!!!, Sunsets over the inland Waterway & Marshes, 24 Golf Courses + RBC Heritage Golf Tournament at Sea Pines!  100’s of Restaurants (Southern Food & eating on the water!), boating, chartered fishing trips, arts, culture & history, waterfront activities, marinas, nature trails, wildlife, Mitchellville (freed slave settlement), historic Civil War landmarks, coastal nature preserves, African-American Gullah-Geechee history, golf, kayaking, tennis, yoga, scenic biking trails & biking on the beach, paddle boarding, Kite-Surfing, music events, horseback riding on the beach, huge Outlet Mall just off-island & more!!Visit Old Town Bluffton with its many restaurants & shopping opportunities, including 2 Outlet Malls - just off -island!   Also check out Historic Beaufort, SC ---just 30 minutes away!! 35 back road miles to Historic Savannah and a 2-hour drive from Beautiful Charleston!! description: Palmetto Dunes House: Private Pool, Beach, Golf
name: Home in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Robert10 guests ·  · 3 bedrooms ·  · 5 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 10 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 5 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in March 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Magnolia & Maple has recently been updated and upgraded! New features include a work station with hi-speed internet,  surround sound in the living room and updated décor.  This  3 BR, 2 BA home sits on a quite street and offers the opportunity to relax by the private pool, walk or bike the 8/10 of a mile to PD's famous beaches, or get some exercise with tennis, golf, or pickleball.  Close to Shelter Cove shopping and dining.  HHI is a pedestrian and bike friendly area with plenty to do.The spaceWonderfully appointed home on Robert Trent golf course with private pool (available to be heated) on quiet street in beautiful Palmetto Dunes.  Fully furnished and equipped for up to 10 people, Magnolia & Maple is ready for your vacation. Tennis and pickleball are available at the sports center, along with golf at all three courses in Palmetto Dunes.  Bikes, kayaks and more can be rented nearby at Outfitters.  Welcoming front porch leads into a bright foyer. Around the fireplace, you will find a large family room with vaulted ceilings, flat widescreen TV with surround sound, and plenty of room to lounge.  A desk with high speed internet is available in case work interferes with your vacation time.  Off the family room is a Carolina room with generous seating and views of the pool, backyard and golf course. One side of the home has two bedrooms, one with two twin beds and sliding glass doors leading to backyard. The other has two full beds and a library.  Both have walk-in closets and extra twin mattresses for additional sleeping. Shared remodeled bath sits conveniently close to the  bedrooms. The other side of home has the primary bedroom, kitchen and dining.  The primary suite sports a king bed, walk-in closet, and sliding glass doors to the backyard.  Enjoy a rain shower in  the remodeled en-suite bathroom then step into a fresh terry bathrobe made available during your stay.   The kitchen is remodeled with granite countertops, new cabinets and stainless steel appliances. Completely equipped with all you need. Choose your coffee preference:  drip coffee maker,  Keurig and espresso machine are all options.  Dishes, silverware, mixing and serving ware as well as pots, pans and cooking utensils are all available.  Small appliances include crockpot, blender, toaster and electric griddle.  Full laundry right off the kitchen. There is a grill on the back  patio;  grill tools are in the kitchen.  The  dining room has seating for 8 and a full wet bar with bar tools, glassware and entertaining tools.  Every bedroom has a flat screen TV. Primary bedroom has a smart TV. Twin bedroom has an xBox.  Wireless internet and basic cable provided. Large backyard looks out onto the golf course.  A short walk or bike ride takes you to the Shelter Cove Towne Center with many restaurants and shops as well as grocery. During summer months watch the fireworks show at Shelter Cove from the backyard. Short bike ride to the immaculate private  beach. Enjoy entertainment at beachfront Dunes House. Enjoy all the Island has to offer at Magnolia & Maple!****Please note, complex charges a fee per car for gate access depending on length of stay ($25 for 3 - 8 days). Private pool can be heated for an additional charge.*****

description: Oceanview condo at Port Royal with pools, hot tub, tennis, & beach access
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Vacasa South Carolina5 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in October 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
The spaceSpa on Port Royal Sound 1221Nestled in The Spa on Port Royal Sound, this updated condo boasts a secluded, gated setting with private access to one of the quietest beaches on the island. Spend sun-kissed days on the soft sand or take in sweeping vistas of the Atlantic from the elevated boardwalk. After a fun-filled day by the ocean or exploring the area, the patio is the ideal place to unwind and features views of the lagoon and sea in the distance. Kick back on the comfy seating and watch favorite shows on the TV in the open living area. Whip up brunch in the well-equipped kitchen, detailed with granite countertops and new stainless steel appliances. 

Located mid-island away from the crowds, this getaway is nestled between two historic parks - Fish Haul Park and Mitchelville Park. In addition to the fabulous on-site amenities, find public beaches, 20 golf courses, excellent restaurants, movie theaters, and shopping nearby.

SPA ON PORT ROYAL SOUND AMENITIES
- Indoor heated pool with an ADA compliant lift
- Indoor hot tub
- Two outdoor pools
- Fitness room
- Tennis courts
- Sauna
- Shuffleboard
- Basketball court
- Grilling areas
- Playground
- Private beach access

THINGS TO KNOW
Streaming is available with own account logins.
This property is managed by Vacasa South Carolina LLC. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 2.Parking notes: There is free parking for 2 vehicles. Guests will be required to purchase parking passes in cash upon arrival; it is $20 for the first vehicle and $5 for the second with a maximum of two vehicles. Security camera details: Cameras in Common AreaDamage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.

description: BRAND NEW:  WALK TO THE BEACH!
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Beth6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 4 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in July 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: This completely renovated, 2-bedroom, 2-bath (one-level) condo is tucked away in Hilton Head Resort, a family-oriented gated community with 24-hour security.  The condo has plenty of amenities ~ such as indoor/outdoor pools, sauna, spa, fitness/business center, tennis/pickleball/badminton courts and a private boardwalk to our spacious beach.The spaceLIVING AREA:  Make yourself at home in the open living area which consists of a queen-size sleeper sofa, loveseat, armchair and a 50" smart flatscreen TV.  KITCHEN & DINING:  The appealing kitchen is fully equipped with cooking basics, stainless steel dishwasher, microwave, electric range, Keurig/drip coffee maker, toaster and blender.A large dining room table seats 8 and is perfect for family meals, playing games, putting together puzzles, and even homeschooling/work.  (Games/puzzles/books are there for your use).  BEDROOMS & BATHROOMS:  This condo sleeps up to 8 comfortably (max of six adults).  Retreat to the master suite where you'll find a queen-sized bed with a 43" smart flatscreen TV.  The en suite bathroom has a walk-in tiled shower.The second bedroom is home to a charming bunk bed with a twin on the top, full mattress in the middle, and twin trundle underneath that pulls out.  A 40" flatscreen TV is furnished in here.  (The stairs also serve as drawer space--kids will LOVE it!).  The guest bathroom is a tiled tub/shower combination.*****  WE ONLY USE BLEACHED, WHITE LINENS!!!! *****OUTDOOR AREA:  Relax on the balcony that overlooks 4 lighted tennis courts, which are open from 7am-11pm.  For your convenience, we have a keyless entry.  ADDITIONAL INFO:Guest amenities include complimentary Wi-Fi and Cable TV.  Card-operated washers/dryers are available steps away from the condo on the same floor.  Unassigned parking is available for 2 vehicles in the outdoor lots/under the building.  The condo is equipped with a beach cart, beach chairs, beach umbrella, boogie boards, an insulated cooler and beach toys so that you can have fun at the beach!  You only need to bring your beach towels and sunscreen!  Speaking of the beach, we have a 300-yard boardwalk to a private beach (complimentary shuttle), beachside cabana, two outdoor swimming pools, one indoor pool/one kiddie pool, jogging track, fitness center, spa/sauna, hot tub, tennis/pickleball/badminton courts on the resort.  The indoor pools are ideal for rainy days!  For those who prefer to dine outdoors, there are picnic tables and grills outside of the condo."Coco's On The Beach" is a well-known, ocean-front bar and grill at the end of the boardwalk.  Coco's provides food, snacks and refreshing drinks as well as beach volleyball and restrooms.  "Island Grill and Deli" is located beside the outdoor pool in Building One.  They not only serve burgers, pizza, salads, sandwiches, french fries and ice cream--they also have groceries and souvenirs.  Ping-pong and pool tables are located here also.  LOCATION:  Hilton Head Resort is conveniently located close to beaches, parks, golf courses, restaurants, shopping and the airport.  We're next to the Robert Trent Golf Course, which is in Palmetto Dunes.  Rent bikes and jump on the paved bike path at our entrance--it goes from one end of the island to the other.  Yes, 108 miles of paved shared-use paths!RESORT POLICIES:  No smoking indoors; no petsReady to create some fun memories?  Book today and enjoy our lovely, refreshing and comfortable vacation home!

description: Two Huge Oceanfront Pools With Pool Bar Jim’s
name: Apartment in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Melissa And Brian6 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 4 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in April 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Our beautifully renovated SeaCrest condo lists as a one-bedroom but feels and functions as a two-bedroom thanks to the extra large bunk beds that are tucked away in a nook without intruding on the living space and the inclusion of a second full bath.  Families with four children, or even six adults will enjoy a very comfortable vacation here.Plus, SeaCrest is perhaps the finest oceanfront resort in ultra-desirable Coligny Circle area with two large oceanfront pools and poolside bar/grill.The spaceLocated on the 2nd floor, our 1160 sq ft. SeaCrest condo has undergone a complete renovation that is nothing short of spectacular.  Most notably a kitchen transformation with updated quartz countertops and new refrigerator and oven/stove, the master en-suite bathroom with the addition of a large tiled shower to compliment the large soaking tub plus dual vanities.  And the complete renovation of the second full bathroom with marble flooring and tiled shower.  You will love it!Our villa is an end unit, which offers additional square footage as well as more windows.  A balcony off the living room offers a peek-a-boo ocean view along with tropical landscaped shrubs and palm trees that surround a side parking area.   From the front entrance of the villa, there is a master bedroom on the left decorated in a soothing color scheme. There is a king bed, 42 inch flat screen TV, and a dresser. A closet provides storage for your belongings and extra bedding. The spacious private master bath provides a large soaking tub, large dual-sink vanity and tiled shower.. The second full bath offers a shower and is conveniently located near the living area.Entering the living area guests will note the large dining area and large bunk beds that are cleverly tucked away in a nook area so as to not impede on the living space. Guests will feel inspired to whip up a gourmet meal in the newly updated kitchen. Features include quartz counter tops, and a breakfast bar with 4 tall counter chairs. Serve a special family dinner in the dining area featuring  a wood dining table and six chairs.   It will certainly be easy for a large family of 6 to relax in the tastefully decorated living room. There is a new queen-sized sleeper sofa and two comfortable chairs for TV viewing or family gathering.

more description:
The spaceOcean Dunes 208This Hilton Head vacation rental is a nicely renovated one-bedroom villa in South Forest Beach. From the balcony, there is a panoramic view of the ocean and beachfront pool. Entering the villa, the bedroom is on the immediate right with a king bed and a flatscreen TV. Past the bedroom is the renovated bathroom with custom vanity and countertop and a standalone shower.

Experience your own slice of beachfront paradise at this gorgeous ocean-view condo in South Forest Beach - perfect for a girls trip or a romantic getaway. Located in Ocean Dunes, enjoy access to a sparkling heated pool, while all the action on the beach is mere steps away. You'll love being located within walking distance of many shops and restaurants of Coligny Plaza, a short walk up South Forest Beach.

Start vacation days with morning coffee on us while taking in the panoramic view of the ocean and beachfront pool. This thoughtfully upgraded condo features a completely renovated kitchen with all-new appliances and a center island, while the bathroom boasts a beautifully tiled standalone shower. In the evening, kick back and relax on the living room sofa bed while watching favorite TV shows. 

THINGS TO KNOW
This vacation rental is not equipped with a washer/dryer; there are coin-operated facilities located on-site.
During the months of September - May, the complex may be performing varied maintenance work. Effects of this can include but are not limited to, extra noise, reduced parking, and construction zones. We will do our best to make all guests aware, but Vacasa does not always get notified of projects before they start. We apologize for any inconvenience you may experience during your stay.
This property is managed by Vacasa South Carolina LLC. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.Parking notes: There is free parking for 1 vehicles. Parking for one vehicle only. Additional vehicles will need to park elsewhere, at guest's expense. number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in October 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
The spaceSt. Andrews Common 1780Step into a cheerfully decorated, second-floor condo dressed in an upscale coastal style, equipped with everything you need to have a wonderful vacation. Skylight windows and cathedral ceilings welcome you into a spacious dining room containing a farmhouse-inspired wooden table. An extensive wrap-around balcony will make for spectacular views of the surrounding nature. A bonus nook and enclosed balcony are perfect for cozy chats. The comfortable living room features a comfy oversized couch, a smart TV, a cozy bench seat, and plenty of other seating, while the full kitchen, complete with granite countertops, is close enough to keep the refreshments coming. Two sets of French doors lead to a spacious wrap-around porch with views of the lush natural landscaping. A smaller, screened-in porch is perfect for a morning coffee or some peace and quiet. The private washer and dryer will ensure everyone looks their best during your stay, so you can afford to pack light for your trip. Central air conditioning will keep everyone cool and comfortable. Each bedroom is designed for comfort, with the main bedroom featuring a private balcony entrance and en suite bathroom. The open-air loft bedroom is perfect for guests who want their own space to play or relax. Whether you're relaxing from a day at the beach or a day on the links, you're sure to find peace at this sunlit hideaway.

This home is steps away from the on-site pool area (open April - September). It is a scenic one-mile walk to a beautiful sand beach and the Dunes House beachfront restaurant, where you can order a cocktail, grab a bite to eat, and enjoy the beach. On the way to the beach, you will pass the quaint and fun Palmetto Dunes General Store, bicycle rentals, tennis courts, and pickleball courts. Palmetto Dunes features miles of white sandy beach, 11 miles of lagoons, three world-class golf courses, and more. If you don't want to walk or bike, you can take advantage of the complimentary Dunes Buggy shuttle service in the summer season. After a day at the beach or on the links, you're sure to relax and unwind at this sunlit hideaway.

more description:
The spaceColonnade Club 169Enjoy sun-kissed mornings on the private deck when you choose this bright and cheery condo as your home base on the island. Complete with golf course views and a completely renovated interior, this spacious getaway is the best bet for year-round relaxation and fun. Located in the Colonnade Club, find everything you need within a quick drive. Spend blissful days between the sparkling coastline and the community’s shared pool and hot tub. 

Try your luck at fishing at the resort’s lagoon or ride bikes on the network of trails. Inside the condo, find a living area with plenty of room to get cozy and watch your favorite movie or sports event on the flat-screen TV. The full kitchen has all you need to create your favorite meals, complete with all stainless steel appliances. Designed with your comfort in mind, this vacation rental offers dual suites, each with its own bathroom and a flat-screen TV. 

THINGS TO KNOW
This property is managed by Vacasa South Carolina LLC. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.Parking notes: There is free parking for 2 vehicles. City/town permit number:30856

The spaceStoney Creek 296Spend afternoons relaxing on this two-story condo's patio that boasts a gas grill and dining table - the perfect combination for at-home barbecues. Both of the bedrooms feature a convenient balcony to breathe in the fresh air. Sprawl out in the living area with a vacation read or gather your group for a movie on the smart TV. Indulge your inner chef in the modern kitchen, outfitted with stainless steel appliances. An adjacent dining table offers the ideal spot for family dinners and board game nights. More fun awaits for the whole family at the community's outdoor pool.

Play a morning round at Harbour Town Golf Links. Afterwards, pack your beach bag and head to Coligny Beach Park, which boasts miles of sandy stretches.

The spaceSea Side Villas 252Serenity by the sea awaits at this one-bedroom condo at Sea Side Villas! Centrally located steps from Coligny Beach Park and Plaza, this complex boasts an on-site pool, grill areas, a sun deck, and direct beach access. A new shower house located on the beach path offers a convenient place to rinse off sandy feet and beach gear. Enjoy morning coffee and sunset cocktails from your own private balcony.

This breezy one-bedroom condo features coastal decor and all the essentials of home including a full-size kitchen everything you need to whip up some snacks for the beach or a visit to the shared pool. After a day at the beach, unwind in the living room with your favorite shows or a family movie on the wall-mounted smart TV. Modern must-haves include mini-split AC units and free WiFi.

SEA SIDE VILLAS AMENITIES
Outdoor pool

more description: Beautiful, bright and open fully renovated from top to bottom vacation villa, just steps from Port Royal Sound! Enjoy our coastal retreat with designer touches! The spaceQueens Grant 573Lounge by one of the on-site pools, hit the beach less than a mile away, or play 18 on one of three world-class golf courses - there's no end to your options at this Queens Grant Villas condo.

This two-bedroom condo is designed for modern comfort and has a vaulted ceiling, breezy coastal decor, and updated amenities. Prepare at-home meals easily in the sleek, updated kitchen and then dine together or play board games at the table for six. The living area is furnished with comfortable sofas, a smart TV ready for streaming shows or movies, and a sliding door to the ground-floor patio where you can relax with morning coffee or your favorite happy hour beverage. An upstairs study makes a perfect location for a daytime office or reading room.

QUEENS GRANT AMENITIES
- Five outdoor pools (open April through October)
- On-call buggy
- Bike trails connecting the entire resort
- Access to an 11-mile interconnected lagoon system for canoeing and kayaking

number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in September 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Sleeper sofa in living room and new queen bed in bedroom. Enjoy Amazing ocean and beach views from your balcony. This is the 3rd unit from the ocean on the 3rd floor and honestly the view beats the direct oceanfront views because of the panoramic effect. Sea Side Villas is minutes away from the very popular Coligny Beach Park area where you can enjoy the many restaurants and shops. Also very close to the new Lowcountry Celebration Park where they have festivals and events.The spaceThe bedroom has a queen bed, closet and TV. The bunk bed in the hallway is primarily for a smaller child (please let me know if you are planning to use this) and the living area has a sleeper sofa. The living/kitchen area is open and the kitchen is fully stocked (pots, pans, cooking sheets, serving and eating utensils, grilling tools, dishware, glassware, tupperware, etc...) so you can enjoy meals without having to go out to eat all the time. A Keurig and a standard drip coffee maker are provided as well as a Ninja blender, a slow cooker, toaster and microwave. You are provided with fluffy bath towels, hand towels, wash cloths and beach towels as well as paper products. The elevator is located near the pool and we also have luggage carts for your use. Also provided for your convenience are 4 beach chairs, rolling and bag cooler, boogie boards and two adult beach cruiser bicycles. The bikes are located under the building on the ocean side. The beach shower/rinse off area is located under the building adjacent to the bike racks.

more description:
The spaceTanglewood 502Family-friendly fun and unbeatable convenience abound at this newly renovated Tanglewood condo. Beach days, shopping and dining at Coligny Plaza and community entertainment at Lowcountry Celebration Park are all just steps away from this inviting coastal escape. Enjoy views of the sparkling on-site pool from your own private deck and kick back on the living room sectional to stream your favorite shows and movies on the smart TV. The full kitchen boasts all-new counters and a gleaming suite of updated stainless steel appliances for efficiently handling home cooking. There's even a dishwasher included for stress-free cleanup. Additional perks include six foldable beach chairs and a wagon for hauling gear. Home essentials include central air-conditioning, free WiFi, and a private washer/dryer.

THINGS TO KNOW
Streaming services are available with guests’ own account(s).
Smoking and vaping are not permitted.
This property is managed by Vacasa Vacation Rentals of Hilton Head Island LLC. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 1.Parking notes: There is free parking for 1 vehicles. Guest parking available Security camera details: Camera located on front porch facing front door.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. more description:
Have the vacation of your dreams by staying in this stylish 2BR 2.5Bath beach villa situated just a short walk away from Forest Beach. Escape the big-city crowds, enjoy the gorgeous natural ambiance from the patio, and explore Hilton Head Island, its stunning attractions, and more than 12 miles of sandy beaches!

✔ 2 Comfortable Bedroom
✔ Open Design Living
✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen
✔ Private Patio
✔ Smart TVs
✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi
✔ Community Amenities (Pool, Parking)

Learn more below!The spacePlease take a tour through this charming oasis to familiarize yourself with all the comforts and amenities it offers. The best place to start is the inviting living area. The home's heartbeat features the entertaining living room leading into the fully equipped kitchen and the adjacent dining area. Natural sunlight accents the tastefully picked furniture and light wooden floors to reinforce the pleasant style.

You can quickly change your settings by stepping out on the private patio overlooking the courtyard. It offers an inviting environment for a morning coffee before heading out to the beach or a shopping spree in Coligny Plaza. 

Contemporary design and comforts are present in two bedrooms that will have you sleeping like royalty.

★ LIVING ROOM ★
The home's focal point is an ideal setting for a family gathering. Sit back, relax and decide if you will watch a movie, read a good book, or discuss what you will do next on the picturesque Hilton Head Island.

✔ Comfortable Sofa with Pillows 
✔ 55" HDTV with Amazon Prime, Apple TV, Disney+, HBO Max, Hulu, Netflix, Cable
✔ Comfy Sofa Chairs
✔ Coffee Table
✔ Reading Lamp
✔ Access to the Patio

★ KITCHEN & DINING ★
The fully equipped kitchen comprises of ample cabinetry, spacious countertops, and state-of-the-art appliances that allow for the effortless and fun preparation of your favorite meals.

✔ Microwave
✔ Stove
✔ Oven
✔ Toaster
✔ Coffee Makers (Drip & Keurig)
✔ Refrigerator/Freezer
✔ Dishwasher
✔ Sink - Hot & Cold Water
✔ Trays
✔ Glasses
✔ Silverware
✔ Pots & Pans

Gather 'round the designer dining table next to the Marilyn Monroe triptych and enjoy a tasty homemade meal.

✔ Artsy Dining Table with Seating for 6

★ SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS – 2 BEDROOMS★
Two comfortable bedrooms make you feel like you are sleeping on clouds while providing maximum convenience through added amenities.

♛ Primary Bedroom: Queen-Size Bed
♛ Guest Bedroom: Queen-Size Day Bed + Twin Trundle

All bedrooms offer a similar set of amenities:

✔ Ensuite Bathrooms
✔ HDTVs
✔ Premium Pillows, Linens, and Sheets
✔ Closets with Hangers and Shelves
✔ Night Stands with Reading Lamps

★ BATHROOMS ★
Both bedrooms offer direct access to their ensuite bathrooms, while the half bath is accessible from the living area for maximum convenience. All are stocked with essential toiletries, so you don't need to overpack for your trip. 

✔ Bathtub with a Shower
✔ Vanity
✔ Mirror
✔ Toilet
✔ Towels
✔ Hair Dryers
✔ Essential Toiletries

★ PATIO ★
Enjoy the tranquil ambiance by stepping out on the charming patio from the living room, offering a private outdoor setting where you can relax and have a cup of coffee or your favorite cocktail.

If you'd like to enjoy an al fresco meal, you can do so in the outdoor dining area in front of the front door. Please note that this area is shared with all other villa apartments.

✔ Private Patio (Seating Area with Table and Chairs)
✔ Shared Front Patio (Outdoor Dining Area with Seating for 4)

Spend a memorable vacation in this lovely home where modern amenities and luxury décor mix with the highest comforts.

more description: Elegant resort style villa, 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, fully furnished villa. A short ten minute walk to South Beach (5 Minute Bike Ride). Three Lovely Pools from April to September, and a Tennis Court on the property. Down the street from Coligny Plaza with many excellent shops, movies, grocery and restaurants. A short walk to Celebration Park. Large screened in tile veranda for sipping your morning coffee, clean, comfortable, and peaceful setting overlooking the lush landscaping. Close to bike trails!The spaceI love the Ocean Charm villa at The Treetops compound because it is a home away from home for guests. It is so close to all the tourist activities, yet so far away from all the noise, stress and crowds. When you walk into the Treetops compound there is peace and quiet. The garden setting is beautiful. Most residents own their units and are also in love with this peaceful setting. The Ocean Charm Villa offers everything..... close proximity to the tourist areas, beaches, shopping, restaurants, yet is so tranquil and peaceful. It's as if you own your own little part of paradise during your stay. It is your home away from home!

name: Condo in Hilton Head Island

unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Jena4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in February 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Enjoy our beautifully updated SeaSide Villas condo, just 70 yards from being on the beach!  Seaside Villas is a gated community that is a short walk to Coligny Plaza restaurants, shopping and entertainment.  The Tiki Bar and Jim’s Pool Bar are also both within walking distance.The spaceThe bedroom includes a comfortable queen bed, plenty of closet space, and a tv with cable.  The couch is a sofa sleeper, and we have a pack n play available for your use (bring your own sheet).  Views of the ocean are visible from the balcony, which includes a table for outdoor dining and more comfortable outdoor furniture for relaxing.  Relax at the onsite pool or spend the afternoon working poolside with the provided wifi.  The fully stocked kitchen includes both a drip coffee pot and Keurig, a toaster, a blender, a waffle iron and a crock pot.  It also provides plates, utensils, coffee mugs and wine glasses. We provide 2 beach chairs, 4 beach towels, a beach umbrella, and a cart to pull it all for relaxing at the beach!  There is also a cooler provided for your use.  The unit is perfectly located to allow you to spend a morning on the bike trails, the afternoon at the beach, and the evening enjoying entertainment at Coligny Plaza.  A starter set of bathroom and kitchen amenities are provided, including toilet paper, shampoo, paper towels, dish soap and laundry detergent.

more description: The spaceBreakers 330An ocean view, a shared pool, and a short walk to the beach make this Breakers condo the right spot for an unforgettable vacation.Wake up to the roar of waves and a view of the white sands of North Forest Beach at this oceanfront property. If you’re up for shopping and sampling the local cuisines, try the Coligny Plaza across the street. Take in a few rounds at the Shipyard Golf Club, or visit one of Hilton Head's many annual festivals. On the property, lounge in the chairs by the shared pool while the kids splash around the children's pool.The open floor plan of this villa includes a well-equipped kitchen, a large living area with sliding doors, and an oceanview balcony offering spectacular views. There is a master bedroom and a smaller guest bedroom with comfortable sleeping arrangements. The hallway bathroom contains a single vanity and a tub/shower combination. All of the areas in this villa have free WiFi, and a private washer/dryer lets you keep your clothes fresh and clean.Reservations for this condo go fast, so don't delay in selecting the date for your next getaway!This property is managed by Vacasa South Carolina LLC. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 3.Parking notes: There is free parking for 1 vehicles. Breakers complex limits parking to 1 car per unit. No street parking.
