more description: Offered by owner /manager. This bright, airy, family and pet friendly Queens Grant villa, is perfectly located towards the entrance of Hilton Head Island's Palmetto Dunes. Nested just off of one of 3 Hilton Head's world class golf courses "Robert Trent golf course". Take a dip in one of 5  complex's pools only steps away from the large entertaining deck, equipped with a barbecue grill, loungers and plenty outdoor seating to just sit back and relax. Just a short walk to the resorts beach!The space1988 square feet of home away from home! The master bedroom on the first level has a king size bed with an on-suite master bathroom  and sliding doors leading to a large entertainment deck, bedrooms 2 and 3 upstairs each have one twin and one queen size beds with a Jack and Jill style bathroom. The first floor also offers convenient half bathroom. Enjoy all that Hilton Head Island has to offer right around the corner from the Palmetto Dunes Tennis Center and convenient store. From golfing, zip lining, horseback riding, fishing and safe biking paths to kayaking/canoeing miles of the beautiful lagoon system.  Visit Shelter Cove Marina's waterfront which hosts fine dining, shopping boutiques, outdoor adult and kid’s entertainment, water sports, seasonal fireworks, and  great views.

more description: Under new management! We are here to make this the best stay you have had on Hilton Head Island. Bring the whole family to this great home with lots of room for fun. The main level features an open floor plan with the living area, dining areas, and kitchen transitioning into an impressive great room illuminated by three-story windows offering views of the Fazio Golf Course as well as your private heated pool. The well-equipped, full kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances and a large island.The spaceNearby, you'll find miles of white sand beach, three world-class golf courses, and an award-winning tennis center. Canoe or kayak through the intricate 11-mile lagoon system, indulge in local shopping, or dine at many local restaurants. At the heart of Palmetto Dunes is Shelter Cove Marina, a waterfront neighborhood that hosts some of the best island cuisine, boutiques, art galleries, water sports, and weekly (seasonal) waterfront fireworks displays.

number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in May 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Gorgeous remodel!THIRD NIGHT FREE is offered DEC-FEB for CONSECUTIVE nights only Message me & I'll send the rate adjustment as a special offer or book 3 NTS & and I will immediately adjust the rateOCEAN BEACHFRONT RESORT 3 MIN WALK to beachfrontBeachfront poolTropical bike paths throughout island offer amazing viewsKing Bed w/ kid size bunks (not twin size) in the same room. A non-locking door separates the living room sleeping area from the King Bed & bunks Max 4 ADULTS/2 kidsThe spaceOur stays are different than hotel stays. Our condo offers extra comforts. The following is a 1 or 2 minute read and provides important information so that you are prepared for your stay: BATH AMENITIES We provide the following:1. Hotel size shampoo, conditioner, and shower gel and/or soap2. Hand soap3. Extra roll of toilet paper  KITCHEN SUPPLIES1. 1 small sized dish soap2. 1 scrub pad3. 2 dishwasher pods4. 1 roll paper towel5. 3 trash bags. This is only enough for a 1- or 2-night stay, please bring extra toilet paper, bathroom and kitchen essentials if needed.We have a single serve KUERIG. Bring your personal coffee supplies.We DO NOT Supply beach towels, chairs, umbrellas or toys. We can provide rental information.One parking pass is included with cleaning fee. Extra passes are $25 each and you’ll need to let me know ahead of time if needed.Our guests are an extraordinary part of the Airbnb Community, and they help us by being GREEN, CLEAN and SUPREME guests! This allows us to continue to offer a great stay at a good value.  Be a GREEN GUESTGreen guests conserve water by reusing towels. Each guest is provided with a set of towels.  If needed there is a pay laundry on the first and second floors. Cards can be purchased at the guest services building when you check in. Be a CLEAN GUEST You pay a cleaning fee that covers sanitization and refreshing after each stay.  While on vacation we don't want to ask much of you.  To keep with our high standards of sanitization and make a smooth transition to our next guest, please take a few minutes prior to departure to do the following:1. Place dirty towels in the tub and unused towels on bedroom shelf.  Why am I being asked to do this?Less laundry= less water usage= a greener environment2. Leave used beds unmade3. Load and start dishwasherWhy am I being asked to do this? If you start the dishwasher before the cleaner arrives, we are assured they are finished drying and fully disinfected prior to the next guest arrival4. Remove all trash and place in garbage bins located in the parking lotWhy am I being asked to do this?We have found this method keeps the condo smelling its freshest for the next guest  Be a SUPREME GUEST Our guests are supreme. They are each equally important to us and demonstrate great qualities and character.Thank you for booking our place! We’re here to help before and during your stay. description: 3rd Floor 100% Remodeled Condo- Ocean Views
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Ryan6 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 4 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in May 2020**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: My wife and I fell in love with Hilton Head when we visited, and we said we need to be down here more.  But while we are not visiting we are happy to share our renovated condo with you! Third floor condo (love not having anyone above you) that opens to the pool in the front and the ocean in the back.Bunk beds for the kids or a pull out bed in the living room for optimal space.A 2 minute walk or 1 minute run to the beach or Coligny,  depending on your excitement level!!The spaceThe Villa is located in Seaside, an oceanfront gated complex.  The villa is roughly 520 sq ft, and has been fully renovated.  There is a queen bed in the bedroom, a new queen sofa sleeper in the living room, and bunk beds perfect for kids in the hall.  The balcony has ocean views and breezes.  Our villa is on the top floor and the front door opens to the pool area vs a hallway.We have made every effort to not skip over the smallest of details to make your stay as carefree as possible.  From the beach chairs, sand toys, and wagon to help you get to and from the beach, along with a guestbook that will help you navigate the best places to eat locally.  If you are looking to work remotely, we have paid extra to make sure we have a very strong Wifi connection.  You can run NFLX and 2 laptops at the same time easily.    Looking for long term stay?  The kitchen is fully furnished with dishes, cookware, and silverware.  Covid has been hard on all of us these past two years.  We make sure that our cleaning crew is very thorough after each stay.

description: Renovated 2 Bedroom On The Beach
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Wesley6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in September 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Newly Renovated- 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath in the highly desired Building 2 with serene garden setting & sun deck. Desired because it is located equally between Outdoor Pool, Indoor Pool & Boardwalk. Gated community, mid island next to Palmetto  Dunes.The spaceBook By The Week (7 or more nights) for weekly discount of 10% Off the nightly rate. Come stay at the wonderful beach front Hilton Head Resort! We Purchased Our 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath Villa  in September 2015. It has been renovated, redecorated, and it is waiting for you. This unit is located in the highly desired building 2. Building 2 Offers a serene garden setting and sundeck. Building 2 is desired because of its central location to the beach and resort amenities. This villa is just a short walk to the beach using the private boardwalk that crosses the scenic saltwater marsh. Walk To Beach Is Less Than 10 minutes. Enjoy the abundant wildlife along the way or catch the complimentary shuttle service at the boardwalk. -ABOUT THE VillaThis villa was renovated in Oct 2015. New furniture, new sleeper sofa, new paint, and new decor. This villa is on the 4th floor (no noise from above) with 2 bedrooms and 2 baths. It has 1 queen bed in the master, 2 twin beds in the second bedroom, and a sleeper sofa in the den. Bedrooms and den have flat screen tv's and a DVD player in the den. The kitchen is stocked with all the essentials including a blender for your beach day drinks. The unit is also stocked with beach gear including a wagon, umbrella, 4 lounge chairs, and an assortment of beach toys. The front patio overlooks the garden and is a great place to enjoy morning coffee or after dinner drinks. There are elevators in each building as well as laundry facilities on each floor. -ABOUT THE RESORTHilton Head Resort is a gated community with a 24 hour guardhouse located mid island next to Palmetto Dunes. The resort consist of 4 buildings each with their own unique courtyard feature. Building 1 Offers an outdoor pool with a bar, cafe, and general store. Building 2 offers a serene garden setting with a sundeck, great for relaxing in peace. Building 3 is enclosed with an indoor pool, kids pool, hot tub, sauna, gym, and indoor running track. Building 4 offers 4 tennis courts. There is a second outdoor pool between building 3 and 4. The resort offers its own private boardwalk to the gorgeous beach. Next to the beach sits a sand volleyball court and COCO'S on the Beach. COCO'S is your very own beach bar and grill. Come visit us in paradise!*The Resort Does Not Allow Pets.

description: Cozy in Coligny
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Joy And Jill5 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 3 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in April 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to the Cozy in Coligny condo!  Located at The Breakers, a highly desirable beachfront property, you are only steps away from the pool and beach.  You will be in the heart of award-winning Coligny Beach – park your car and leave it!  You can spend the day playing in the sun and sand then walk across the street to Coligny Plaza – home to the beloved Piggly Wiggly grocery store and 60+ shops, restaurants, entertainment, tour information, beach equipment, and bike rentals.The spaceThe condo features a small kitchen, one bedroom with queen-sized bed, a small bunk perfect for a child, a sleeper sofa in the living room and one bathroom with a shower/tub combo.  Enjoy some time on the covered balcony that overlooks the pool area and has a view of the ocean.  This condo is perfect for those who want to be steps away from the beach, pool, restaurants and shops.The Breakers condos are cozy at 520 sq feet, but everything you need for a fun, relaxing vacation is here for you.  The space will accommodate 2 adults or a family of 4 comfortably.  Bedroom: 1 queen bed with a new mattress, high quality bedding (down alternative all-weather duvet).  32-inch smart TV and small closet to store your things.The small bunk bed is perfect for a child and outfitted with a fun space and high-quality bedding.Bathroom: Tub/shower combo, sink, and 10x makeup mirror.  Shampoo, conditioner, body wash and lotion provided.Kitchen: Full-sized refrigerator and dishwasher, Cuisinart toaster oven, two-burner stove, and Keurig coffee machine.  Cookware, bakeware, and utensils provided.  Seating at the counter for 2 on comfortable bar stools, and a small dining table (seats up to 4).Living room: sleeper sofa with new mattress, 58-inch smart TV and wifi.  Large sliding Pella door provides a cool breeze and sounds of the ocean.  Central heating and air-conditioning.Beach chairs, umbrella, small cooler, and wagon ready to easily transport all your beach goodies.  Other amenities include a booster seat for the dining table, iron, compact ironing board, hair dryer, shampoo, conditioner, body wash and lotion provided.  Washer/dryer available in the unit.We now have a sturdy, fold-away desk and monitor we can setup for your stay (upon request), if you are currently working remotely and need a change of scenery.

name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Vacasa South Carolina7 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 7 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in October 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
The spaceVillage House 208Find a wonderful sense of modern elegance at this two-bedroom condo in Village House of Hilton Head Island, beautifully situated up among the treetops in a lush Lowcountry setting.

This light-filled condo sits on the second floor of Village House (with an elevator available), a complex which provides access to the outdoor pool at the Beckenham/Devonshire complex across the road. In this lovely spot, you'll be a third of a mile from the playground and picnic areas at Islanders Beach Park, three-quarters of a mile from Folly Field Beach Park, and in the midst of great restaurants, scenic bike paths, and world-class golf courses.

Whether you spend your days golfing or beachcombing, you'll come home in the afternoons to a shaded balcony where you can sip cold glasses of sweet tea and dine alfresco at golden hour.

Inside, the living space is polished and refined, with central air, high-speed WiFi, and an understated palette of whites, creams, and taupes running throughout. Enjoy stainless steel appliances in the well-equipped kitchen, a spacious dining room table, and a bright living room where you can play board games and screen movies in the evenings. Of the two bedrooms, each has its own bathroom and TV, with the guest room offering a great desk nook for working from home.

COMMUNITY AMENITIES
-Outdoor swimming pool

THINGS TO KNOW
This property is managed by Vacasa Vacation Rentals of Hilton Head Island, LLC. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 2.Parking notes: There is free parking for 2 vehicles. Please park anywhere in the open-air community lot. Parking is not assigned. The covered garage area is for owners only. Please do not park in the garage area as your vehicle will be towed.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.

description: Hilton Head Resort - Steps to the beach!
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Michael6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in June 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: New to the rental market! Hilton Head Resort Condo-Walk to the beach!The spaceNestled in Hilton Head Resort, this two bedroom, two bath condo has amenitites galore! Come gaze at the ecological marsh while strolling along the beach boardwalk. You will be in awe of the beautiful white sanded beach! There you can enjoy Coco’s Cabana which offers food and your favorite drinks as well as beach volleyball and access to restrooms.  A beach shuttle is ready and waiting offering easy access to the beach!  If you are looking for a vacation that offers endless entertainment, then this is it! Hilton Head Resort is a gated community with 24 hour security. There are six tennis courts, a badminton court, two outdoor pools, an indoor heated pool, a kiddie pool, a hot tub, a sauna, an exercise room, a game room, a walking track, a sundeck, an onsite store, a deli, a grilling area, and a picnic area. What more could you ask for!This spacious condo is located on the fourth floor and over looks the indoor pool area. The living room features a new queen sleeper sectional sofa, a Smart TV, a blu-ray player, games, and reading materials. WI-FI and cable are included! You will find everything you need to prepare meals in the fully functional kitchen. Stainless steel appliances, a Keurig coffee maker, and numerous utensils are ready and waiting for you to use. You will find that the brand new dining table seats a family of six comfortably. As you enter the large master bedroom, you will feel at ease on the king size sterns and foster luxury mattress and upscale bedding. A flat screen television and an ensuite bathroom make this master bedroom a retreat!  The guest bedroom features a sterns and foster luxury mattress and a flat screen television. Bath towels are included; however, beach towels are not provided. Beach chairs, a beach umbrella, a boogie board, a skim board, sand toys, an iron, an iron board, and a hair dryer are provided for your convenience. Come enjoy the beautiful bike paths all throughout Hilton Head. You will find that Hilton Head Resort is close to everything! Many golf courses, including Robert Trent Jones Palmetto Dunes Ocean Golf Course, are just a short drive and Shelter Cove is minutes away! Come tour the amazing lighthouses or indulge in endless shopping!Traveling with family or friends! Check out condo 3412! Same building, same floor, and only two doors down!  Contact the host for the link!

more description: Welcome to Governor's Quarters- your Luxury Hilton Head GetawayStay low country in this stately designed home. Newly remodeled & fully equipped for your golfer’s retreat or family/friends' coastal vacation. 5 minutes from SeaPines Beach Club and 6 mins from the Harbourtown Golf Links.Located in famous Sea Pines Plantation. Enter the gates of resort living offering trolley rides to local restaurants, premium golf courses, pool access, HarbourTown Lighthouse, & most importantly- the beach!The spaceCustom charcuterie board, wine/beer, fresh flowers, or private chef accommodations are available upon request. Perfect for special occasions upon arrival or for an after-round or beach snack. Guests have full owner's access to the heated Harbourtown pool! (Private backyard pool/spa with cabanas coming in 2024).Handmade Saltillo tiles lay the floor, vaulted ceilings canopy each room, designer fabrics & appliances throughout, with tongue and groove paneling wrapping the walls. A chef’s kitchen opens into the living room with an electric fireplace for cozy nights in. A functional layout boasting 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms- featuring two ensuites located on the main ground floor, and two bedrooms upstairs with a bath. Bedrooms:The bedrooms feature comfortable luxury-style bedding with pillow-toppers on every bed. Bedroom #1-Downstairs Master wing featuring a King bed, ensuite bathroom,  and access to a private patio through a sliding glass door. Bedroom #2- 2nd downstairs bedroom featuring a Queen bed and ensuite bathroom. Bedroom #3- Located upstairs and features a Queen bed. Bedroom #4- Located upstairs with two XL Twin beds. Bathrooms:Each bathroom features oversized plush bath towels, washcloths, makeup cloths, plant-based cleansers, and a hairdryer.Bathroom#1-Located in Master Wing. Custom curbless tile shower with an oversized rain head and double vanity. Bathroom #2- Attached to the 2nd downstairs bedroom and off of the kitchen. Custom marble tile and fixtures Bathroom #3- Located between the two upstairs bedrooms. Custom floor tiling with a bathtub/shower and double vanity. Living Room:The living room offers a Samsung "The Frame" Smart TV, YouTube TV for cable, Premium Spotify for music, a cloud-like couch, reading materials, fun board games, and an electric fireplace to create a cozy at-home ambiance with an option with or without heat. Kitchen:Offers a fully equipped chef's kitchen to make homemade meals with state-of-the-art Samsung appliances, LeCreuset pots/pans/kitchenware,  complimentary organic coffee, teas, spices, and Triple Reverse Osmosis filtered water off the sink. Backyard:Large front and backyard. Over 1,200 sq ft of paved back patio with a fire pit to gather around on cooler nights, an outdoor (hot and cold water) rain-head shower, an outdoor grilling area, and plenty of room for kids and dogs to run and roam. Beach Equipment: 4 Huffy Beach Cruiser Bikes are located at the house free of charge. There is a $100 refundable deposit. After the deposit is paid, the lock code will be provided. To get your deposit returned, simply provide a picture of the bikes locked up before check-out.4 Tommy Bahama backpack beach chairs are also available. Additional beach equipment can be rented from the Beach Club in Sea Pines.

description: Year-Round Heated Oceanfront Pool!
name: Apartment in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Melissa And Brian4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 4 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in April 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: New Featured Amenity at Ocean Dunes- HEATED POOL! Ours is an Ultra-Deluxe one-bedroom Ocean Dunes villa.  Newly renovated down to the studs and completely updated.  Everything is new! First floor convenience with spectacular views (especially sunrise), of the best beach on Hilton Head Island and just a short walk to Coligny Circle.The spaceLocated in the heart of South Forest Beach, our Ocean Dunes DIRECT OCEANFRONT villa was recently renovated down to the studs.  BRAND NEW EVERYTHING! Even the pool is brand new! Guests will appreciate the genuine wood flooring, updated kitchen with granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances, pocket-door in bedroom to create a more spacious feel, and a useful hallway closet that includes a washer/dryer... the only in-room washer/dryer in the entire complex!  Perfect for a romantic getaway, friend bonding trip or a small family vacation.  Our one-bedroom offers 538 square feet of pure coastal bliss! Come and smell the salty ocean air and enjoy the breezes through the palm trees from our direct ocean front balcony. Ocean Dunes is located in the South Forest Beach area directly nestled in between the Marriott Grande Ocean ($550 per night) & Hilton Ocean Oak ($50,000 timeshare/$700 per night).  You will enjoy the same fantastic ocean front location and access to some hotel amenities (like the ocean front tiki bars), for less than half the cost of staying at either of these resorts. Ocean Dunes provides a tranquil ocean front experience.  Just steps outside of the door, we boast our own private pool with direct beach access and private beach cabana bathrooms. Coligny Plaza and the public beach are located a few blocks down within easy walking distance. The plaza offers unique shopping, casual or fine dining, as well as great live entertainment. Sea Pines infamous Harbour Town and South Beach make for a great bike ride or short drive.   Golfers will enjoy dozens of nearby challenging public championship golf courses. Bed linens, bath towels, extra pillows and blankets, plus a small supply of toiletries are supplied as well. We offer a comfortable queen bed in the master suite with a queen sofa sleeper in the living room. Flat screen TV’s in both living and bedroom with digital cable and free Wi-fi. The living room opens onto a balcony/deck overlooking 2 pools with direct ocean views. The kitchen is fully equipped with oven, range, microwave, dishwasher and refrigerator/freezer and stocked with everything you will need for meal prep. This villa is conveniently located on the 1st floor with minimal steps up to the front door.  There is a ramp as well as elevators.  Ocean Dunes also provides luggage carts for unloading and loading your personal belongings.  (Note: even though we are on the first floor we are elevated high enough to provide ocean views from the generous balcony).This villa is smoke-free (including balcony) and pet-free.  We appreciate your consideration.  Enjoy your stay!

Beautiful landscaped grounds with 2 outdoor pools, one indoor pool, spa, dry sauna and gym. Grills and picnic areas on premises, also located beach front, recently installed playground, tennis and basketball courts on site. Laundry room with washer/dryer, iron and ironing board.Beach front balcony with 2 person glider, built in table top with 2 chairs, outdoor ceiling fan.Beach chairs, beach towels, umbrella and cooler are provided.

description: Luxurious home with private pool, central AC, & high-speed WiFi - Walk to Beach
name: Home in Hilton Head
location: Hilton Head, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Vacasa South Carolina16 guests ·  · 5 bedrooms ·  · 12 beds ·  · 5.5 baths
number of guests: 16 guests · **__** · 5 bedrooms · **__** · 12 beds · **__** · 5.5 baths**__**Joined in January 2019**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: The spaceSurf Scoter*Please read our important pool heat information to help you have the best vacation possible!*This property has a pool and spa that can be heated between Labor Day and Memorial Day for an additional fee of $95/night for a minimum of 3 nights. Both the spa and pool share the same heater. In order for the spa to be heated, the pool must be heated as well. When isolating the spa to heat to a higher temperature the pool will be not be heating. It is important to turn off the spa when finished. At least seven days' notice must be given for heat to be turned on. If the outside temperature is colder than 55 degrees, the pool will not be able to maintain a warmer temperature. If the pool or spa does not reach your desired temperature but is still warming, refunds will not be given. Surf Scoter offers luxury vacation rental at it's finest! This stunning multi-level home, located just four houses from the beach, has been remodeled throughout with an abundance of custom features. With over 5,000-square-feet of living space, this home offers the space you need to relax both privately and with family and friends. There are multiple spaces to entertain, dine, and play. A desk workspace provides a space for guests to complete remote work or schooling. The bedrooms each have their own attached bath and enjoy good separation to eliminate any noise and privacy concerns. The new pool, spa, outside bar, and private beach path make this home the one your family will love.The first level of this home features a large family room with flatscreen television that is open to the large dining room with seating for eight. The custom kitchen offers a gas range, stainless steel appliances, double ovens, two subzero refrigerators, additional fridge drawers, wine fridge, under counter ice maker, granite countertops, bar sink, and large walk-in pantry for extra storage. Up a few steps, you will find the spacious main suite with  a flatscreen TV, and a large main bathroom. The next level offers two additional main bedrooms. The first offers a a new bath (as of 2019) with double vanity and a walk-in shower. The other offers a queen bed and a new en-suite bath. The top level of the home features a bunk room with a large attached bathroom with double vanity, walk-in shower and separate water closet.The backyard space is newly constructed (as of 2019) and has everything you need to enjoy and relax. The glass-tiled pool has a built-in vacuuming system to keep the water clean and clear. A granite bar with an under-counter ice maker, beverage fridge, and kegerator that holds two kegs to make the backyard a vacationer's dream. The outdoor shower, landscaping, and lighting all add to the ambiance. The pierced brick wall and palm trees afford privacy and atmosphere. The home and backyard have been wired with surround sound and play your choice of music from the internet or your own playlist from your phone. There is also a foot shower next to the private beach path and a keg (newly installed as of 2019) outside as well!Surf Scoter is located in Atlantic Pointe, a private community within Sea Pines. Beach access is limited by the locked gated entrance at the end of the private beach path, ensuring a much less crowded stretch of beach. In addition to the private pool and spa, guests of Surf Scoter will enjoy access to the Atlantic Pointe community pool and tennis court, conveniently located just steps away from the home. The Sea Pines Beach Club is an easy mile walk down the beach. South Beach is an easy bike ride away. This home gives you the opportunity to park your car on arrival and walk or bike to bars, restaurants, and activities all week! Things to KnowFree high-speed WiFiFull kitchen with a dishwasherPrivate poolGated entranceCentral air conditioning*One hour of free tennis per day is available with this rental in 2021 Please note that the fireplace is not for guest use*Guests will need to contact Rollers directly if they would like beer to be provided for the kegA sofabed provides an extra sleeping spacePlease be aware that the Plantations and Condominium Complexes do not allow trailers, motor homes, motorcycles, and/or recreational vehicles and rooftop cargo (i.e. kayaks, canoes, etc.) other than car top carriers*Pool heat is available between Labor Day and Memorial Day. There is a three night minimum when booking pool heat. This is a propane system and only has one heater for both the pool and spa. Pool heat must be on in order to use the spa. Advanced notice is required, as this is  scheduled with the pool service. The heat is $119 per night, plus tax.This property is managed by Vacasa South Carolina LLC. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.Parking notes: There is paid parking for 5 vehicles. Parking is limited to the driveway - parking passes are required. There is a gated entrance. No street or landscape parking is permitted.3 day notification is required in order to heat the pool and pool spa. A fee of USD95 per day must be paid prior to check-in. Guests can contact Vacasa after booking to purchase pool and pool spa heat for your stay.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.

more description: The spaceIsland Club 2502Soak up the beautiful views of the Atlantic Ocean from the balcony of this comfortable Hilton Head vacation rental! Boasting exquisitely landscaped grounds with a fitness center, seasonally heated pools, hot tub, and a children's playground, this beachfront condo has everything you need to keep you and your family active on vacation.Located in the Island Club community, in the Folly Field neighborhood of Hilton Head, this villa is just a short drive away from the island's many restaurants and shops. Closer to home, you can play basketball on one of the courts, do some fishing at the lagoon, or challenge a friend to a game of tennis. A large lap pool is also available if you want to cool off or get some aquatic exercise in!This fifth-floor rental has recently been renovated, evident by the granite countertops and stainless-steel appliances in the open kitchen. Relax in the cozy living room with a book or a movie, or sip a cold drink out on the deck. The master bedroom has a king bed, flatscreen TV, and private bathroom with walk-in shower, and a twin and queen bed are in the second bedroom. All areas have free WiFi.This Island Club condo makes for a perfect getaway any time of year, so book your reservation today!ISLAND CLUB AMENITIESSeasonal, shared pools in the center of the complex (early spring through November)Seasonal, shared hot tub (early spring through November - no children under 10)Island Club Tennis Center with tennis and pickleball courtsExercise roomMultiple picnic areas with shared charcoal and gas grillsFive private beach access points with rinse-off showersBusiness centers in the RotundaLawn games providedOn-site bicycle rentals availablePlayground for younger visitors13-acre catch and release, stocked lagoonTHINGS TO KNOWA sofa bed is included.Elevators in the buildings.This property is managed by Vacasa Vacation Rentals of Hilton Head Island LLC.The Island Club Management will close the lap pool and kiddie pool on the last Friday night in October. The hot tub will stay open and heated until the Friday night after Thanksgiving. The kiddie pool, lap pool, and hot tub are scheduled to reopen on the 2nd or 3rd Saturday of March, barring any maintenance issues.The heaters for both the lap and kiddie pools will stay on during the spring until the weather changes. The heaters will be turned back on in the fall, depending on the weather. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 5.Parking notes: There is free parking for 1 vehicles. Only 1 vehicle is allowed. Parking pass required for vehicle. No assigned parking. Gated entrance. location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States

number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in April 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: NEW $60K RENO! This 2nd floor villa has a breathtaking unobstructed ocean view from the living room and master bedroom. Two bedroom suites (new mattresses and ceiling fans), with separate newly renovated baths.  Beautiful maple hardwood & tile floors throughout. Fully appointed kitchen boasts granite countertops, maple cabinets, and stainless steel appliances.  New Washer/Dryer.  Jim Says: "I personally stay in each of my units to ensure they are maintained to my highest level of expectations."The spaceThis 2nd floor villa has a breathtaking unobstructed ocean view from the living room and master bedroom. Villa is newly renovated and stunningly appointed. Two bedroom suites, beautiful maple hardwood & tile floors throughout. Fully appointed kitchen boasts granite countertops, maple cabinets, and stainless steel appliances. Two bathrooms, one for each suite. Ample storage space. Onsite pool, hot tub, kids pool.208 Shorewood offers luxury and comfort with unobstructed views of the Atlantic Ocean! As you walk in the front door, you’re greeted with breathtaking ocean views, an open floor plan, maple hardwood flooring, and all new furnishings. The gourmet kitchen features granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and maple cabinets. Enjoy the amazing scenery while you cook, entertain, and browse the free WiFi! The dining area offers seating for four with an additional two stools at the kitchen bar. The living area features a comfortable sofa and two chairs, a large flatscreen TV, floor-to-ceiling windows, and access to the private balcony through a sliding door.Located in the heart of Forest Beach, this popular vacation complex sits directly on the Atlantic Ocean and keeps guests coming back year after year. The centrally located oceanfront saline pool includes a baby pool, hot tubs, and bathrooms.  The pool area is closed from December 1 - February 28.  The pool area will be closed from October 18, 2021 through October 31, 2021 for maintenance and repairs.Shorewood also has a private security gate at the main entrance, which requires an access code (to be provided).You can park your car for the duration of your stay and walk, ride bikes, or take local buses (in season) practically anywhere you would want to go. Parking Notes: Parking pass required for each vehicle. No assigned parking.Shorewood Villas is within easy walking distance of great shops, dining, and entertainment at Coligny Plaza as well as the new Celebration Park.  Jim Says: "This is the best location on the Island for visiting tourists."

more description: This beautiful home is nestled on a cul-de-sac street in Hilton Head Plantation and offers a private back yard sanctuary in which to truly enjoy low country life. The home features a game room and living room with ample seating, both with large televisions for your entertainment needs. The kitchen is fully equipped, and the formal dining area offers seating for eight. Additional amenities include Wi-Fi, gas grill, beach chairs, a private pool (unable to be heated), and hot tub.The spaceCoastal Town Cottage features a game room and living room with ample seating, both with large televisions for your entertainment needs. The kitchen is fully equipped with cookware, accessories, appliances and extensive counter-top space - including an island and breakfast bar. A formal dining area offers seating for eight. Bedroom one offers a king bed, bedrooms two and three both offer a queen bed in each room. There is also a full bed in the loft space and a full sleeper sofa as an extra sleeping option. All bedrooms are equipped with 42" televisions.Additional amenities include wireless internet, laundry room, pool table, game tables, gas grill, a private pool (unable to be heated), and hot tub.

name: Condo in Hilton Head Island

number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 2.5 baths**__**Joined in November 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
Have the vacation of your dreams by staying in this stylish 2BR 2.5Bath beach villa situated just a short walk away from Forest Beach. Escape the big-city crowds, enjoy the gorgeous natural ambiance from the patio, and explore Hilton Head Island, its stunning attractions, and more than 12 miles of sandy beaches!

✔ 2 Comfortable Bedroom
✔ Open Design Living
✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen
✔ Private Patio
✔ Smart TVs
✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi
✔ Community Amenities (Pool, Parking)

Learn more below!The spacePlease take a tour through this charming oasis to familiarize yourself with all the comforts and amenities it offers. The best place to start is the inviting living area. The home's heartbeat features the entertaining living room leading into the fully equipped kitchen and the adjacent dining area. Natural sunlight accents the tastefully picked furniture and light wooden floors to reinforce the pleasant style.

You can quickly change your settings by stepping out on the private patio overlooking the courtyard. It offers an inviting environment for a morning coffee before heading out to the beach or a shopping spree in Coligny Plaza. 

Contemporary design and comforts are present in two bedrooms that will have you sleeping like royalty.

★ LIVING ROOM ★
The home's focal point is an ideal setting for a family gathering. Sit back, relax and decide if you will watch a movie, read a good book, or discuss what you will do next on the picturesque Hilton Head Island.

✔ Comfortable Sofa with Pillows 
✔ 55" HDTV with Amazon Prime, Apple TV, Disney+, HBO Max, Hulu, Netflix, Cable
✔ Comfy Sofa Chairs
✔ Coffee Table
✔ Reading Lamp
✔ Access to the Patio

★ KITCHEN & DINING ★
The fully equipped kitchen comprises of ample cabinetry, spacious countertops, and state-of-the-art appliances that allow for the effortless and fun preparation of your favorite meals.

✔ Microwave
✔ Stove
✔ Oven
✔ Toaster
✔ Coffee Makers (Drip & Keurig)
✔ Refrigerator/Freezer
✔ Dishwasher
✔ Sink - Hot & Cold Water
✔ Trays
✔ Glasses
✔ Silverware
✔ Pots & Pans

Gather 'round the designer dining table next to the Marilyn Monroe triptych and enjoy a tasty homemade meal.

✔ Artsy Dining Table with Seating for 6

★ SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS – 2 BEDROOMS★
Two comfortable bedrooms make you feel like you are sleeping on clouds while providing maximum convenience through added amenities.

♛ Primary Bedroom: Queen-Size Bed
♛ Guest Bedroom: Queen-Size Day Bed + Twin Trundle

All bedrooms offer a similar set of amenities:

✔ Ensuite Bathrooms
✔ HDTVs
✔ Premium Pillows, Linens, and Sheets
✔ Closets with Hangers and Shelves
✔ Night Stands with Reading Lamps

★ BATHROOMS ★
Both bedrooms offer direct access to their ensuite bathrooms, while the half bath is accessible from the living area for maximum convenience. All are stocked with essential toiletries, so you don't need to overpack for your trip. 

✔ Bathtub with a Shower
✔ Vanity
✔ Mirror
✔ Toilet
✔ Towels
✔ Hair Dryers
✔ Essential Toiletries

★ PATIO ★
Enjoy the tranquil ambiance by stepping out on the charming patio from the living room, offering a private outdoor setting where you can relax and have a cup of coffee or your favorite cocktail.

If you'd like to enjoy an al fresco meal, you can do so in the outdoor dining area in front of the front door. Please note that this area is shared with all other villa apartments.

✔ Private Patio (Seating Area with Table and Chairs)
✔ Shared Front Patio (Outdoor Dining Area with Seating for 4)

Spend a memorable vacation in this lovely home where modern amenities and luxury décor mix with the highest comforts.

more description: Newly renovated with ocean and pool views!The spaceThis newly purchased ocean view property in Barrington Arms has been completely renovated. New flooring, paint, furniture, appliances, bathrooms, kitchen and all new furniture including the mattress and sleeper sofa!Come experience the expansive ocean/beach views from the private balcony of one of this professionally decorated spacious one bedroom villa. The oceanfront villa offers a relaxing comfortable space with plush surroundings, full kitchen, and master bedroom with large walk-in shower. The outdoor amenities include a private beachside pavilion, large pool, hot tub, and grill/entertainment ideal setting for your next Hilton Head Island family vacation.The Leamington Community  is close to the bike path that will take you quickly to all the other amenities in Palmetto Dunes. This elevated first floor ocean view villa is a great choice for your next Hilton Head Island vacation. The kitchen has granite countertops, custom cabinets, ground coffee maker and keurig machine and bar seating for 2. The dining area has seating for four. The living room is furnished with a queen sleeper sofa, two club chairs, a 42”Smart TV/DVD. From the living room there is a slider to balcony with ocean views and seating for 4.The master bedroom has a king bed, Smart TV and private bath with large walk-in shower.Board games are provided for children and adults!Luggage carts are available in the covered garage parking area. Bikes can be rented and delivered to the covered garage parking area where the bike racks are found. Parking is free and available in front of the building or under the building where the elevator is also located to take you to the first floor. This 960 square foot condo is a wonderful choice for you next Hilton Head Island vacation.Pets are not allowed.*Pool is heated seasonally, hot tub is heated year round.

description: Cozy yet spacious, well lit & 4 min walk to beach
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Liya4 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in June 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: It started with a simple task of finding a place  which we could call our little piece of paradise, a comfortable and convenient home away from home.  As we crossed the bike path, which runs adjacent to the property, and entered through the gate of ‘Fiddlers Cove’ and we moved past the club house, the tennis/pickle ball courts, lush shaded wooded groves and lagoon, we knew we had found something special.    We are honored and privileged to share our piece of paradise with you. Welcome to 18E.The space**Newly Updated flooring - April 2021** The last thing you want to do on your vacation is worry about a lost key.  This villa has a keyless lock on the front door so guests only have to remember the code and not worry about a key thats lost or find a place to put keys away.Guests can expect a Washer and dryer (detergent provided - starter kit) , Towels, Napkins, Soap, Shampoo, Conditioner, lotion, toilet paper, paper towels, dish towels and dishwasher detergent, laundry hamper,  iron and ironing board.  There are extra pillows and a box fan to use if needed.  Free wi-fi throughout the house.  In the kitchen, guests can find a small toaster oven, brand new coffee maker that uses any k-cup pod or ground coffee beans, tea kettle, salt and pepper shakers and baking trays.You can now leave your house  lighter without having to carry the following things:  Beach umbrella, 4 beach chairs, a beach wagon, boogie board and a little plastic beach toys.  These things can be found in the patio storage.We also provide grilling tools that can be used in the outdoor grills found throughout the property.Recently added : Pedestal fans in the bedrooms, French press coffee maker, electric water kettle, hair dryer  and 2 beach towels.  The master bedroom now has cable connection too yay!Finally, Fiddler’s Cove does not permit pets in the community. Monthly Rates:  Monthly Rate $1200/Month for November, December, January, February.  September and March Monthly rate $1200/Month only when combined with another month stay.

description: Hilton Head Resort - Steps to the beach!
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Michael6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in June 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: New to the rental market! Hilton Head Resort Condo-Walk to the beach!The spaceNestled in Hilton Head Resort, this two bedroom, two bath condo has amenitites galore! Come gaze at the ecological marsh while strolling along the beach boardwalk. You will be in awe of the beautiful white sanded beach! There you can enjoy Coco’s Cabana which offers food and your favorite drinks as well as beach volleyball and access to restrooms.  A beach shuttle is ready and waiting offering easy access to the beach!  If you are looking for a vacation that offers endless entertainment, then this is it! Hilton Head Resort is a gated community with 24 hour security. There are six tennis courts, a badminton court, two outdoor pools, an indoor heated pool, a kiddie pool, a hot tub, a sauna, an exercise room, a game room, a walking track, a sundeck, an onsite store, a deli, a grilling area, and a picnic area. What more could you ask for!This spacious condo is located on the fourth floor and over looks the indoor pool area. The living room features a new queen sleeper sectional sofa, a Smart TV, a blu-ray player, games, and reading materials. WI-FI and cable are included! You will find everything you need to prepare meals in the fully functional kitchen. Stainless steel appliances, a Keurig coffee maker, and numerous utensils are ready and waiting for you to use. You will find that the brand new dining table seats a family of six comfortably. As you enter the large master bedroom, you will feel at ease on the king size sterns and foster luxury mattress and upscale bedding. A flat screen television and an ensuite bathroom make this master bedroom a retreat!  The guest bedroom features a sterns and foster luxury mattress and a flat screen television. Bath towels are included; however, beach towels are not provided. Beach chairs, a beach umbrella, a boogie board, a skim board, sand toys, an iron, an iron board, and a hair dryer are provided for your convenience. Come enjoy the beautiful bike paths all throughout Hilton Head. You will find that Hilton Head Resort is close to everything! Many golf courses, including Robert Trent Jones Palmetto Dunes Ocean Golf Course, are just a short drive and Shelter Cove is minutes away! Come tour the amazing lighthouses or indulge in endless shopping!Traveling with family or friends! Check out condo 3412! Same building, same floor, and only two doors down!  Contact the host for the link!

number of guests: 7 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in October 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
The spaceVillage House 208Find a wonderful sense of modern elegance at this two-bedroom condo in Village House of Hilton Head Island, beautifully situated up among the treetops in a lush Lowcountry setting.

This light-filled condo sits on the second floor of Village House (with an elevator available), a complex which provides access to the outdoor pool at the Beckenham/Devonshire complex across the road. In this lovely spot, you'll be a third of a mile from the playground and picnic areas at Islanders Beach Park, three-quarters of a mile from Folly Field Beach Park, and in the midst of great restaurants, scenic bike paths, and world-class golf courses.

Whether you spend your days golfing or beachcombing, you'll come home in the afternoons to a shaded balcony where you can sip cold glasses of sweet tea and dine alfresco at golden hour.

Inside, the living space is polished and refined, with central air, high-speed WiFi, and an understated palette of whites, creams, and taupes running throughout. Enjoy stainless steel appliances in the well-equipped kitchen, a spacious dining room table, and a bright living room where you can play board games and screen movies in the evenings. Of the two bedrooms, each has its own bathroom and TV, with the guest room offering a great desk nook for working from home.

COMMUNITY AMENITIES
-Outdoor swimming pool

THINGS TO KNOW
This property is managed by Vacasa Vacation Rentals of Hilton Head Island, LLC. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 2.Parking notes: There is free parking for 2 vehicles. Please park anywhere in the open-air community lot. Parking is not assigned. The covered garage area is for owners only. Please do not park in the garage area as your vehicle will be towed.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.

description: 3BD/2BA beach villa w/ W/D at Hilton Head Resort!
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Maurice & Marilyn8 guests ·  · 3 bedrooms ·  · 6 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 8 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 6 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in July 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Spacious 3BD/2BA Oceanside Condo in Hilton Head Resort! Located in building 1- closest building to the beach, is steps to the pool and a short walk to the beach over our picturesque private boardwalk. Our Gated community has fantastic amenities-2 outdoor pools, indoor heated pool for rainy days, baby pool, tennis courts, & Beach bar. Close to Kroger’s supermarket, Whole Foods, & Shelter Cove marina, shops & restaurants. Next door to Palmetto Dunes. Great for families, golf outing or girls trip!The spaceWe are located in highly desired Building 1 in the Hilton Head Resort.  Hilton Head Resort is a gated Oceanside condo community with a 24 hour guard house located mid island and close to everything. Building 1 is the closest building to the beach and it houses our main pool.  We are on the first floor, one floor up from ground floor, and literally a one minute walk to the pool and a 5-7 minute walk to our beautiful beach over the picturesque boardwalk.  No streets to cross to get to our beautiful beach. It doesn’t get any better than this~great location, comfortable villa and close to beach!! -Our villa is fully furnished.  Decorated and styled with a beachy flair, this 1200 sq ft villa is light and bright with all the conveniences of home. Located all on one level, no stairs inside villa. New flooring installed in the entire villa December 2020. -Master bedroom has a King size bed, dresser, flat screen TV, closet and a master bath with tub & shower. -2nd bedroom has Queen bed with flat screen TV-3rd bedroom has a new twin over twin bunk plus new Queen bed to sleep 4 comfortably. Flat screen TV, dresser & closet too.  ***NOTE***Top bunk recommended for children only due to weight restrictions. -Villa sleeps 8 comfortably, with queen sofa bed for additional sleeping arrangements.  Must bring your own linens for sofa bed. -Main bath is right across the 2nd & 3rd bedrooms with step in shower. Small capacity washer/dryer combo inside the villa and resort laundry available for larger loads. -Full kitchen with all essentials-Brand new stainless appliances, new pots and pans, new utensils, new dishes, new glasses & mugs etc to prepare meals.  Drip and Keurig coffee maker and toaster, toaster oven, slow cooker, electric hand mixer, baking pans, & blender included.  Counter seating sits 4 comfortably for quick bites to eat and our spacious dining room for meals to be enjoyed.-Cable TV and free WiFi included. New 50” TV in Living room & Master BR-We provide 4 beach chairs,  boogie boards, kids shovels and buckets and a beach cart for your use!  We do not supply umbrellas as they constantly break due to the wind.-We supply fresh sheets and bath towels, with a “starter kit” of toilet paper, roll of paper towels, soap and dishwashing soap. -Traveling with extended family? Ask us about our other Villas at the resort!  We own another villa in this same building down the hall. -You are allowed up to 3 parking spots at the resort -No pets or animals allowed. No exceptions. -2 Night Minimum Stay.  4 night min during spring and 5 night min during summer season. -Check-ins are 24/7 service. Our front security gate is always manned so if you arrive very late-no worries! -Convenient location for PARRIS Island Marine Base activities. RESORT AMENTIESWith so many amenities, you never have to leave the resort!  Guests have access to all 4 buildings and amenities which include:-Building 1- Main pool, bar/grill for light fare and cocktails and mini convenience store. Bathrooms are by the pool.-Building 2- Sun deck, a badminton court in the interior courtyard and a serene fountain with gardens for those that want to enjoy some quiet time.-Building 3-Indoor Pool, kiddie pool, hot tub, sauna, exercise room, and running track and bathrooms/showers.  Amenities in Building 3 are opened year round. -Building 4-Newly resurfaced lighted tennis courts and a 2nd outdoor pool.-The resort has its own private boardwalk to our gorgeous beach,  our own Coco's bar and grill located right on the beach to get drinks while your on the beach, and a volley ball area. Coco’s also has bathrooms. -Bring your Bikes or rent them (we have places for you to rent from and can be stored right at the resort). -Pool bar/grill and Coco’s beach bar and grill are opened seasonally from March-October. -Seasonal Golf cart shuttle that runs regularly from March-September to the beach.  -Grills and picnic tables are available to use by building 4, just bring you charcoal and supplies.

more description: You will LOVE your stay at "SANDY FEET RETREAT"....now under new ownership with many improvements to the condo!  Enjoy all that Hilton Head has to offer with close proximity to shopping, restaurants, grocery stores, and activities!  Hilton Head Resort is just steps away from the beach via our private boardwalk and is conveniently located near many golf courses. The Resort offers so many amenities including 3 pools, a hot tub, sauna, kiddie pool, tennis courts, badminton court, and fitness centerThe spaceOur condo is equipped to make your vacation as enjoyable as possible! Located in Building 2, this 2 BR/2BA condo accommodates up to 6 guests.  NO SMOKING/VAPING......designated areas are located exterior of buildings.NO PETSNO PARTIESMust be age 25 or over to rent this unit.LIVING ROOM - Free secure wi-fi provided along with cable TV.  Board games, cards, books available for your use.KITCHEN - Very well equipped to include dishes, flatware, blender, hand mixer, coffee maker (Kcup and drip), toaster, crock pot, cooking utensils, wine glasses, tea pot, microwave, pots, baking pans, cookie sheets.  Starter supply of dishwasher, liquid detergent, and paper towels.DINING AREA - Table accommodates six people.MAIN BEDROOM - A brand-new king-size memory foam mattress will keep you comfy!  Plenty of dresser and closet space for clothes. Roku TV for entertainment.  Drying rack included to hang those beach towels.  Ensuite bathroom.   Iron and ironing board in closet.SECONDARY BEDROOM - Two bunk beds for a total of four beds.   Must be 6 years or older and weight limit of 165 lbs to occupy top bunks.  Cute chest with four baskets to separate everyone's clothing.  Pack n Play in the closet, but you will need to bring your own linens for it.  Closet in this room includes a LOT of beach accessories, including a wagon to transport it all!BATHROOMS - Both are full bathrooms and include a starter supply of toilet paper, soap, shampoo, conditioner.   2 bath towels, 1 hand towel, and 1 washcloth provided per person.  Beach towels not provided.

more description: Beach & Golf: 7 min stroll to the beach views of the Golf course.Hickory Cove villa 2 Bedrooms + Loft, 3 Baths, (Sleeps 6-8)Beautiful Villa on the 18th tee of the Robert Trent Jones Golf Course in Palmetto Dunes.This Villa is perfect for golfers, families and short term home office.Everything is less than 10 min walk:The BeachRobert Trent Jones golf coursePalmetto Dunes Tennis CenterThe General Store The Dunes HouseThe spaceWelcome to our home away from home in Hickory Cove. The Villa is updated and well-maintained. You will enjoy the light and cheerful colors and the fully equipped kitchen. This 2 bedroom and 3 full bath villa overlooks the 18th tee of the Robert Trent Jones Golf Course. The beach is a 7 minute walk away and the pool is right across the Hickory Cove driveway from the villa. The floor plan of this villa is perfect for couples traveling together, families, and families traveling with grandparents or nannies. The first floor master bedroom has a king bed and private full bath. It also opens out to the first floor deck. The 2nd floor bedroom has 1 queen and 1 single bed, a private full bath with tub, and a balcony/deck. There is also a loft area equipped with a single bed. The 3rd full bath is off the living room area. The villa has WiFi and a 37 inch HD flat screen TV in the living room. The villa has a casual, beachy feel. Perfect for your stay in Hilton Head.Hickory Cove is located in the private, gated community of Palmetto Dunes. While staying at Hickory Cove, you are within walking distance to the beach, the 11-mile lagoon system, the General Store, golf, tennis, the villa community pool, restaurants, and bike and kayak rentals. Palmetto Dunes has extensive walking and biking paths.

number of guests: 16 guests · **__** · 5 bedrooms · **__** · 12 beds · **__** · 5.5 baths**__**Joined in January 2019**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: The spaceSurf Scoter*Please read our important pool heat information to help you have the best vacation possible!*This property has a pool and spa that can be heated between Labor Day and Memorial Day for an additional fee of $95/night for a minimum of 3 nights. Both the spa and pool share the same heater. In order for the spa to be heated, the pool must be heated as well. When isolating the spa to heat to a higher temperature the pool will be not be heating. It is important to turn off the spa when finished. At least seven days' notice must be given for heat to be turned on. If the outside temperature is colder than 55 degrees, the pool will not be able to maintain a warmer temperature. If the pool or spa does not reach your desired temperature but is still warming, refunds will not be given. Surf Scoter offers luxury vacation rental at it's finest! This stunning multi-level home, located just four houses from the beach, has been remodeled throughout with an abundance of custom features. With over 5,000-square-feet of living space, this home offers the space you need to relax both privately and with family and friends. There are multiple spaces to entertain, dine, and play. A desk workspace provides a space for guests to complete remote work or schooling. The bedrooms each have their own attached bath and enjoy good separation to eliminate any noise and privacy concerns. The new pool, spa, outside bar, and private beach path make this home the one your family will love.The first level of this home features a large family room with flatscreen television that is open to the large dining room with seating for eight. The custom kitchen offers a gas range, stainless steel appliances, double ovens, two subzero refrigerators, additional fridge drawers, wine fridge, under counter ice maker, granite countertops, bar sink, and large walk-in pantry for extra storage. Up a few steps, you will find the spacious main suite with  a flatscreen TV, and a large main bathroom. The next level offers two additional main bedrooms. The first offers a a new bath (as of 2019) with double vanity and a walk-in shower. The other offers a queen bed and a new en-suite bath. The top level of the home features a bunk room with a large attached bathroom with double vanity, walk-in shower and separate water closet.The backyard space is newly constructed (as of 2019) and has everything you need to enjoy and relax. The glass-tiled pool has a built-in vacuuming system to keep the water clean and clear. A granite bar with an under-counter ice maker, beverage fridge, and kegerator that holds two kegs to make the backyard a vacationer's dream. The outdoor shower, landscaping, and lighting all add to the ambiance. The pierced brick wall and palm trees afford privacy and atmosphere. The home and backyard have been wired with surround sound and play your choice of music from the internet or your own playlist from your phone. There is also a foot shower next to the private beach path and a keg (newly installed as of 2019) outside as well!Surf Scoter is located in Atlantic Pointe, a private community within Sea Pines. Beach access is limited by the locked gated entrance at the end of the private beach path, ensuring a much less crowded stretch of beach. In addition to the private pool and spa, guests of Surf Scoter will enjoy access to the Atlantic Pointe community pool and tennis court, conveniently located just steps away from the home. The Sea Pines Beach Club is an easy mile walk down the beach. South Beach is an easy bike ride away. This home gives you the opportunity to park your car on arrival and walk or bike to bars, restaurants, and activities all week! Things to KnowFree high-speed WiFiFull kitchen with a dishwasherPrivate poolGated entranceCentral air conditioning*One hour of free tennis per day is available with this rental in 2021 Please note that the fireplace is not for guest use*Guests will need to contact Rollers directly if they would like beer to be provided for the kegA sofabed provides an extra sleeping spacePlease be aware that the Plantations and Condominium Complexes do not allow trailers, motor homes, motorcycles, and/or recreational vehicles and rooftop cargo (i.e. kayaks, canoes, etc.) other than car top carriers*Pool heat is available between Labor Day and Memorial Day. There is a three night minimum when booking pool heat. This is a propane system and only has one heater for both the pool and spa. Pool heat must be on in order to use the spa. Advanced notice is required, as this is  scheduled with the pool service. The heat is $119 per night, plus tax.This property is managed by Vacasa South Carolina LLC. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.Parking notes: There is paid parking for 5 vehicles. Parking is limited to the driveway - parking passes are required. There is a gated entrance. No street or landscape parking is permitted.3 day notification is required in order to heat the pool and pool spa. A fee of USD95 per day must be paid prior to check-in. Guests can contact Vacasa after booking to purchase pool and pool spa heat for your stay.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.

more description: Your group will enjoy walking or biking to everything Coligny has to offer when staying at this recently renovated condo. The complex boasts two elevators, an outdoor pool, tennis/pickle ball courts, as well as an indoor pool and hot tub. The open concept condo has a well stocked kitchen, gorgeous dining area, laundry and pantry, and living room with flat screen TV and a queen pullout sofa. The bedroom has a King size bed, flat screen TV and en-suite with double vanity. Enjoy a private balcony!The spaceOcean Walk has two elevators, an outdoor pool, tennis and pickle ball courts, and is one of only three condo complexes on the island with an indoor pool and hot tub. It is a five minute walk to the ocean and only .6 miles to Coligny Circle. Our condo is completely renovated and you will find every comfort of home. We have fast WiFi, a full compliment of network cable, Disney, Netflix Hulu and Amazon Prime Video. You’ll find a very well stocked kitchen, washer and dryer, games and cards, a beach wagon with chairs, a cooler bag and an assortment of beach toys for the kids. There is a pack and play, a hair dryer, a fabric steamer and many other amenities we have provided to make sure your visit is a pleasant one. Comfortable beds will ensure you are well rested to enjoy your time on Hilton Head Island!

more description: The spaceIsland Club 2504With ocean views from three rooms, four flatscreen TVs, and beach access just steps away, this Hilton Head condo is a peaceful getaway for you and your family! Located in the Island Club community, you'll have numerous recreational opportunities, including nine different tennis courts, multiple pools, and a fitness center. Those in a calmer mood can relax by the fishing lagoon or take a dip in the hot tub.Hilton Head's balmy climate makes this villa a perfect year-round destination. A fifth-floor location provides a feeling of seclusion, while still making it easy to access the resort's pools, fitness center, and tennis courts. For those who wish to explore, the shops, galleries, and cafes of Hilton Head Island are only a short drive away, and festivals are hosted frequently across the island.Inside, you'll find a comfortable living area with ample seating, cable TV, and access to the patio, which overlooks the beach and sparkling Atlantic Ocean. Fix yourself a snack in the fully equipped kitchen, which features granite countertops, modern appliances, and custom cabinets, then wind down the night with a movie or by planning the next day's adventures with the free WiFi.When you want to get away from it all, do it in style with this spectacular condo rental. Book your dates today!ISLAND CLUB AMENITIESSeasonal, shared pools in the center of the complex (early spring through November)Seasonal, shared hot tub (early spring through November - no children under 10)Island Club Tennis Center with tennis and pickleball courtsExercise roomMultiple picnic areas with shared charcoal and gas grillsFive private beach access points with rinse-off showersBusiness centers in the RotundaLawn games providedOn-site bicycle rentals availablePlayground for younger visitors13-acre catch and release, stocked lagoonTHINGS TO KNOWA sofa bed is included.Elevators in the buildings.This property is managed by Vacasa Vacation Rentals of Hilton Head Island LLC.The Island Club Management will close the lap pool and kiddie pool on the last Friday night in October. The hot tub will stay open and heated until the Friday night after Thanksgiving. The kiddie pool, lap pool, and hot tub are scheduled to reopen on the 2nd or 3rd Saturday of March, barring any maintenance issues.The heaters for both the lap and kiddie pools will stay on during the spring until the weather changes. The heaters will be turned back on in the fall, depending on the weather. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 5.Parking notes: There is free parking for 1 vehicles. Only 1 vehicle is allowed. Parking pass required for vehicle. No assigned parking. Gated entrance. No street parking.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. description: HHR - Beach Villa (Heated Indoor Pool & Hot Tub)
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Dave6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 5 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 5 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in December 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Enjoy all the comforts of home in our 2 bed + 2 bath condo, while relaxing just steps away from the beach. Hilton Head Resort has direct access to the beach and is conveniently located near several golf courses, shops, restaurants and grocery stores. Enjoy onsite amenities like indoor and outdoor swimming pools, hot tubs, tennis courts, grills and deli. Take in the scenery as you cross the marsh via our private boardwalk to the beach and stop by the tiki-hut for a refreshing beverage and snack.The spaceCome stay at the wonderful beach front Hilton Head Resort in the heart of Hilton Head Island! Our cozy top floor condo has been fully renovated and is equipped with everything you need to make your vacation as enjoyable as possible. Whether you want to relax and watch a movie or cook a gourmet meal in the kitchen, our condo has everything you need.----- PARKING -----Due to parking limitations, there is a 2 vehicle limit per stay. Commercial vehicles, trailers and RVs are not allowed on the property. Only cars are permitted to park in the covered parking spots located underneath the buildings. Trucks, SUVs and Vans are not permitted to park in the covered spots due to low ceiling height.----- AMENITIES -----Our condo is stocked with all of the necessities of home. No need to bring bed linens, sheets, towels, blankets, soap, shampoo, lotion, dishwasher soap, or laundry detergent. We have you covered :)- Our kitchen offers high end pots and pans along with dishes, glasses and silverware for the whole family. We also provide baking dishes, 2 blenders, toaster and a coffee maker.- The living room and bedrooms are equipped with flat screen televisions with cable.- There is also an Apple TV available for streaming and a DVD player and small library of movies for those rainy days. - There are 2 tennis rackets for your use.----- THE BEACH -----The beach can be accessed via a 510 yard beautiful and private boardwalk (stroller, wheelchair, beach cart friendly). The boardwalk crosses the marsh and several creeks. Take in the beauty and nature on your way to the beach. On the other end, you are greeted by COCO's bar and grill, where you can enjoy cold drinks and hot food before heading down to walk the beach and dip your toes in the ocean. We have 2 beach chairs for you to use during your visit. Feel free to use the beach cart to take everything you need. Don't feel like walking, there is a free golf cart shuttle that will run you from one end of the boardwalk to the other. The schedule is posted at both ends of the boardwalk.----- POOLS AND FACILITIES-----Feel free to use any of our three on property swimming pools during your visit. Our condo is in the building with the indoor pool and hot tub for those rainy days or when you just don't want to walk too far. Our building also has a steam room, sauna, game room, running track, vending machines, and gym.- There are elevators in each building.- The laundry facilities are located across from the elevators on each floor. The washers and dryers take credit cards and can be monitored via the "CSCPay Mobile" App available on iOS and Android. ** The outdoor pools will be open as of April 1, 2022. The indoor pool in Building 3 and hot tubs are open year round! The pool deck area at building 1 and sun deck in the middle of building 2 are also open. **----- ABOUT THE RESORT -----Hilton Head Resort is a gated community with a 24 hour guardhouse located mid island next to Palmetto Dunes. The resort consist of 4 buildings each with their own unique courtyard feature. Building 1 Offers an outdoor pool with a bar, cafe, and general store. Building 2 offers a serene garden setting with a sundeck, great for relaxing in peace. Building 3 is enclosed with an indoor pool, kids pool, hot tub, sauna, gym, and indoor running track. Building 4 offers 4 tennis courts, 2 of which are lined for pickleball. There is a second outdoor pool between building 3 and 4. The resort offers its own private boardwalk to the gorgeous beach. Next to the beach sits a sand volleyball court and COCO'S on the Beach. COCO'S is your very own beach bar and grill. Come visit us in paradise!Unfortunately Hilton Head Resort does not allow pets. Sorry, resort rule!There is no smoking allowed inside the villa. There are designated smoking areas outside, around the property.Please be aware that Hilton Head Resort prohibits drones, skateboards, hover boards and roller blades anywhere on the property. Also, while bicycles are allowed on property, guests are not permitted to ride them on the boardwalk to the beach during the busy season or bring them into the villa. However, there are bike racks around the property where you can keep them secure.All fines incurred due to violations on resort property will be passed along to guests.

The spaceOcean Walk Villas 504This coastal paradise is the perfect home base for your next sabbatical. Sporting indoor and outdoor pools, as well as tennis courts, you'll be having fun whether you're here or out exploring. The numerous beaches nearby ensure you'll feel the sand between your toes whenever you like. There are also several golf courses, parks, and restaurants all just a short drive away, meaning there is always something new to try. 

Back at your vacation getaway, the bright, welcoming interior will help you wind down for the day. Relax in front of the TV or catch up on some reading while basking on the balcony and enjoying the breezy weather. The full kitchen has everything you need to make something as large as a meal or as simple as a cup of coffee. When nighttime approaches, the central air conditioning will keep you cool even in the summer months and prepare you for tomorrow's activities.

more description: Our sweet little nest is the perfect place to relax and unwind. The neighborhood is completely safe and our place is very private. Should you need anything during your stay, we'll make sure you receive attention as soon as possible.Enjoy your stay!!The spaceOur carriage house is fully equipped with everything you may need for your stay. If you don't feel like eating out we have a full-sized refrigerator, cooktop, microwave/convection oven, coffee maker, teapot, blender, toaster, pots and pans, dishes silverware, etc... New full-sized washer and dryer. The king bed has a new memory foam mattress (cover pad cleaned regularly), new flooring (no carpet)., well-lit exterior. It's centrally located for easy access to Hilton Head, beaches, outlet malls, Old Town Bluffton, Beaufort or Savannah, 2 airports. All are within 5 to 30 minutes away.Unfortunately, guests are not allowed to use the pool per our community rules.Loads of restaurants and shopping in the area!
