more description: Under new management! We are here to make this the best stay you have had on Hilton Head Island. Bring the whole family to this great home with lots of room for fun. The main level features an open floor plan with the living area, dining areas, and kitchen transitioning into an impressive great room illuminated by three-story windows offering views of the Fazio Golf Course as well as your private heated pool. The well-equipped, full kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances and a large island.The spaceNearby, you'll find miles of white sand beach, three world-class golf courses, and an award-winning tennis center. Canoe or kayak through the intricate 11-mile lagoon system, indulge in local shopping, or dine at many local restaurants. At the heart of Palmetto Dunes is Shelter Cove Marina, a waterfront neighborhood that hosts some of the best island cuisine, boutiques, art galleries, water sports, and weekly (seasonal) waterfront fireworks displays.

more description:
The spaceIsland House 131Discover white sandy beaches, fantastic golfing options, and gorgeous greenery at this charming, Hilton Head Island villa. You'll also be conveniently close to local shops, world-famous restaurants, and a wide array of family-friendly, year-round attractions.

Inside this ground-floor getaway, you'll find a bright interior and a warm feeling of welcome throughout the space. Gather on the plush sectional to stream all your favorite channels on the large TV or just carry on great conversations into the evening. Prepare grand meals or beach snacks in the well-equipped, full kitchen, or head outside, fire up the gas grill, and spice up that home-cooked menu. 

Cool off in the shared, outdoor pool, and then return home to witness spectacular sunsets from the back patio, where you can sip your favorite drink and watch the stars come out.

THINGS TO KNOW
Disney+, Netflix, and HBO Max are provided. Guest accounts are required to access additional streaming services.
This property is managed by Vacasa Vacation Rentals of Hilton Head Island LLC.1 dog(s)  are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 1.Parking notes: There is free parking for 2 vehicles. Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. more description: Hilton Head Beach and Tennis ResortBrand new bath & kitchen this year. Our Ocean front 1 bedroom 1 bath unit offers amazing 360 views of the ocean & resort from your balcony! We're so proud to share our new space with you. We wanted to keep the original beachy vibe of the villa while adding all the luxury and modern comforts you expect while traveling and relaxing in style. *2-3 guest max. No pets. 25 age minimum*The spaceOUR RESORT AT A GLANCE:THE BEACHOur Resort has four private boardwalks, which access the beach and open to our guests. THE RESORTThe 2 onsite swimming pools, featuring Large oceanfront pool on Hilton Head Island, expensive playground, fitness center, basketball, racketball court Fitness Center, Tennis center, tennis courts and pickle ball courts. Equipment available at fitness centerJamaica Joe’z Beachfront Bar and Grille Coconutz & Gatorz Pizza (located inside the convention center) open daily  for Outdoor/Indoor Dining and Take Out. Daily specials on both food, full bar beverage service.Must be 25 years old to book. Security will not issue resort passes to guests under 21THE VIILA*** As always we provide clean, sanitized accommodations and are committed to keeping our guests as healthy and happy as possible. Please do your part to stay safe, respectful our home and please leave the condo as you found it! Walk-in your beach getaway... This villa offers 360° views from your ocean front facing balcony. Located on the 3nd floor in popular C building, it is the closest to oceanfront pool, beach bar & ocean. Our condo has everything you need for a short stay, business trip or long vacation. Ideal for 2 guests, can accommidate no more than 4 guests. Total square footage of our condo is 540 sqft. so it is quite small. All the oceanfront condos in our resort are this size but vary in layout.Additional guests after 2 is $50/nt. max occupancy is 4 and will be strictly enforcedOur full-size kitchen with full size appliances is clean and new, perfect for preparing full meals or small snacks. We provide a Kuerig, 5 cup coffee maker, filters and gourmet coffee. Living space has a 50" Cromecast smart TV, loveseat, conversation set, bluetooth speaker, and secure high-speed WiFi. Large desk with universal and wireless charging stations, multi USB and outlet ports make a perfect work space to get things done before hitting the sand and sun. Bathroom equiped with full-size tub/shower. HAIR dryer and LINENS provided, perfect for getting ready to hit the town. Feel free to use any sunscreen, aloe, toiletries ect. or leave a few extra for future guests if you'd like. Beach equipment located in hallway storage closet,  including chairs, basket of toys, rafts, ect PLEASE wash sand off each day and return where you found them. Will make locating items easier for you and guests that come after you.Queen bed in the master with memory foam mattress. Full size closet with clothes basket, shelving and hangers. TV with upgraded cable packageLaundry card provided. You can refill money card at front-desk with cash or credit card, laundry rooms are located at the end of hallways on 1st and 2nd floors.The lighted tennis and pickleball courts are top notch with tennis pro onsite. Basketball court and playground are located beside gym, we provided a basketball in closet for your use. if you like gym access you must obtain an access card from the front desk, a refundable $20 deposit and signed waiver are required. It's an easy walk to the beach. Stop at Jamaica Joez by the pool when you are hungry, need a drink or just an ice cream cone! Coconuts sports bar and Gator's pizza restaurant are located on site, inside the Convention Center.Please feel free to use whatever you find around the condo. We try to keep it well stocked with fun. All I ask is that you wash off any sand after each use and return it where you found it for future guests enjoyment. If anything is lost, damaged or broken during your stay, no worries, just let us know, we very much appreciate it and understand things happen.

more description: This clean and comfortable - and dog friendly - cottage is the perfect vacation escape.  The free standing cozy, one bedroom home is located just inside the Ocean Gate of Sea Pines Resort, only a few minutes away from the beach. The home is located on a quiet street in a preserve-like setting. You will have everything you need for an enjoyable stay on your Hilton Head Island vacation.The spaceThis cottage is the start of your perfect vacation as you sit on the private patio overlooking a lagoon view. The inside living space is surrounded by windows that cascade wonderful natural light from the outside views. You will also find ample seating with a pull out couch and chair to relax.  A dining table for 4 is nested between the living room and kitchen.  The kitchen offers stainless steel appliances and basic tools to assist with making your favorite meals. The master bedroom has a queen bed and patio access.  The en suite also includes a clothes washer/dryer to utilize during your stay.  From here you have easy access to 15 miles of bike paths to the beach, Harbour Town, South Beach Marina, or just to explore the island and nature! There is no question that you will make wonderful vacation memories in the home.***AMENITIES***•	Complex pool access•	Outside Deck•	Outdoor Gas Grill•	Assigned Parking•	Bath and bedding linens provided•	Ceiling Fans•	Washer & Dryer available in unit•	Full Kitchen - dishware plus cookware and small appliances•	Start-up Supplies - toilet paper, paper towels, kitchen dish soap, dishwasher soap•	Basic Cable Service•	Iron & Ironing Board•	Central Heat & Air Conditioning•	Complimentary Wireless Internet•	Exterior water/shower to clean off sand•	Pet Friendly (2 small dogs, or 1 large dog allowed)•	Non-smoking Property

number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1.5 baths**__**Joined in July 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Have the quintessential island getaway at this beautiful 1-bedroom, 1.5 bath Barrington Park villa inside Hilton Head’s premier Palmetto Dunes Resort! This unit is a hop and a skip (3 minute walk) from the beach, and the complex features one of the best beachside pools on the island.**2 bikes included!**2 hrs per day of tennis/pickleball at Palmetto Dunes Tennis Center included!Renovated in 2022 - new flooring, bathrooms, bedroom furniture, luxury mattress, couch, washer/dryer, paint & trimThe spaceSituated inside Palmetto Dunes Resort, the options for fun and relaxation are endless.•	Veg all day at the oceanside pool and private beach (pool is seasonally heated)•	Hit the links at one of Palmetto Dunes three top-rated championship golf courses (including Robert Trent Jones) •	Join a tennis / pickleball clinic or play on your own at the Palmetto Dunes Tennis Center – ranked one of the “50 Greatest US Tennis Resorts” in the country by Tennis Magazine•	Grab morning coffee & breakfast, or the famous fried chicken for lunch at the humble, yet awesome Palmetto Dunes General Store•	Ride bikes in South Carolina’s most bike-friendly community•	Visit the legendary lighthouse and shop/dine at Harbour Town•	…and so much more!The condo features a large bedroom with a luxury adjustable base king bed, walk-in closet and newly renovated bathroom and shower. An open concept common area includes a pull-out couch, and a desk and chair for any work you need to complete (quickly so you can go back to the fun). Beautiful new flooring and furniture, and cozy beach colors complete the modern beach aesthetic.The kitchen is fully equipped for all your cooking needs, and a gazebo-covered grill is steps away from the unit. Take your dinner over to the breakfast bar, natural light saturated dining area, or outside to the private balcony that overlooks a peaceful lagoon. An in-unit washer and dryer (new in Fall '21) and an additional half bathroom round out an amenity-packed unit.I look forward to hosting you and wish you the best of vacations!

description: Gated Sea Pines home with private pool & large patio - near beaches & golf
name: Home in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Vacasa South Carolina8 guests ·  · 3 bedrooms ·  · 4 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 8 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in February 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
The spaceLawton Road 10Situated in the prestigious gated Sea Pines Plantation that offers an array of family and individual activities including natural beaches, championship golf, tennis, biking trails, and so much more. Play all of The Sea Pines Resort's three premier courses-each with its own signature character and designation as a Certified Audubon Cooperative Sanctuary. Tucked away in Lawton Woods (a smaller community inside of Sea Pines), this delightful single-level home is uncomplicated and easy to navigate. A seasonal trolley will whisk you away to all nearby Sea Pines amenities. Rent a bicycle and explore miles of area trails, or make a short drive to nearby beaches.

This beautifully updated three-bedroom home is the ideal family-friendly retreat. Vaulted ceilings, large glass patio doors, and wall-length mirrors add a grand feel to the extra-spacious living area. Kick back on the comfy seating and watch a movie on the 32' flat-screen TV. The well-equipped kitchen has ample counter space and a full suite of appliances to work your culinary magic. When it's time to eat, enjoy festive vacation meals at the dining room table.

This one-level home sleeps up to eight guests between three bedrooms and a queen-size sleeper sofa in the living area. The primary bedroom has a king-size bed and a 32' flat-screen TV. Directly adjacent, the master bathroom has a tub/shower combination. The second bedroom has two twin-size beds and a 32' flat-screen TV. The third bedroom has a queen-size bed and a 32' flat screen TV. These two bedrooms are connected by a Jack-and-Jill bathroom, complete with a tub/shower combination.

The home is far away enough from the neighbors to give a very private feeling to the backyard. Cook your favorite barbeque fare on a gas grill, then dine poolside at the patio with table seating for six. Relax in the private backyard, swim in a large pool (can be heated for a daily fee), or lounge poolside on the spacious patio. 

Go horseback riding at nearby Lawson Stables, just 0.5 miles away. Drive 1.4 miles to the Shops at Sea Pines Center, where you'll find a number of popular dining spots and boutiques. It's 2.2 miles to Harbour Town, home of the Harbour Town Lighthouse, as well as Harbour Town Golf Links. Or head 3.7 miles to Coligny Beach Park and 3.8 miles to South Beach.

THINGS TO KNOW
This property is managed by Vacasa South Carolina LLC No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 1.Parking notes: There is free parking for 3 vehicles. Welcome to Hilton Head Island! This property is located at 10 Lawton Rd. The address is marked on the mailbox. Turn into the circular driveway. There is room for up to two vehicles in the driveway.  No street or landscape parking is permitted.  Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.

Prestigious HILTON HEAD ISLAND South Carolina!  Get Your Vacation BOOKED Now for the Best Location on Hilton Head Island  Sun and Fun- Filling up FAST!  Whether your on a Family and Friends Vacation, Work Retreat, Military Graduation, Celebration or just passing through on a Road Trip- This is you relaxing Home Away from Home!
Everything at your fingertips- Arrive and Relax- Enjoy the sights and sounds of Island Life!
After a long day at the beach, golfing, Tennis, fishing, walking the nature trails, lounge by your own Private  FREE Heated Pool- Relaxing with Family and Friends, listening to the lake fountain as it shimmers on the lagoon. Have dinner out on the town and enjoy the nightlife that Hilton Head and Bluffton has to offer!

The back of the ground level under the home boasts a gorgeous sparkling, heated, private pool with paver patio. more description: You will LOVE your stay at "SANDY FEET RETREAT"....now under new ownership with many improvements to the condo!  Enjoy all that Hilton Head has to offer with close proximity to shopping, restaurants, grocery stores, and activities!  Hilton Head Resort is just steps away from the beach via our private boardwalk and is conveniently located near many golf courses. The Resort offers so many amenities including 3 pools, a hot tub, sauna, kiddie pool, tennis courts, badminton court, and fitness centerThe spaceOur condo is equipped to make your vacation as enjoyable as possible! Located in Building 2, this 2 BR/2BA condo accommodates up to 6 guests.  NO SMOKING/VAPING......designated areas are located exterior of buildings.NO PETSNO PARTIESMust be age 25 or over to rent this unit.LIVING ROOM - Free secure wi-fi provided along with cable TV.  Board games, cards, books available for your use.KITCHEN - Very well equipped to include dishes, flatware, blender, hand mixer, coffee maker (Kcup and drip), toaster, crock pot, cooking utensils, wine glasses, tea pot, microwave, pots, baking pans, cookie sheets.  Starter supply of dishwasher, liquid detergent, and paper towels.DINING AREA - Table accommodates six people.MAIN BEDROOM - A brand-new king-size memory foam mattress will keep you comfy!  Plenty of dresser and closet space for clothes. Roku TV for entertainment.  Drying rack included to hang those beach towels.  Ensuite bathroom.   Iron and ironing board in closet.SECONDARY BEDROOM - Two bunk beds for a total of four beds.   Must be 6 years or older and weight limit of 165 lbs to occupy top bunks.  Cute chest with four baskets to separate everyone's clothing.  Pack n Play in the closet, but you will need to bring your own linens for it.  Closet in this room includes a LOT of beach accessories, including a wagon to transport it all!BATHROOMS - Both are full bathrooms and include a starter supply of toilet paper, soap, shampoo, conditioner.   2 bath towels, 1 hand towel, and 1 washcloth provided per person.  Beach towels not provided.

description: BRAND NEW:  WALK TO THE BEACH!
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Beth6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 4 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in July 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: This completely renovated, 2-bedroom, 2-bath (one-level) condo is tucked away in Hilton Head Resort, a family-oriented gated community with 24-hour security.  The condo has plenty of amenities ~ such as indoor/outdoor pools, sauna, spa, fitness/business center, tennis/pickleball/badminton courts and a private boardwalk to our spacious beach.The spaceLIVING AREA:  Make yourself at home in the open living area which consists of a queen-size sleeper sofa, loveseat, armchair and a 50" smart flatscreen TV.  KITCHEN & DINING:  The appealing kitchen is fully equipped with cooking basics, stainless steel dishwasher, microwave, electric range, Keurig/drip coffee maker, toaster and blender.A large dining room table seats 8 and is perfect for family meals, playing games, putting together puzzles, and even homeschooling/work.  (Games/puzzles/books are there for your use).  BEDROOMS & BATHROOMS:  This condo sleeps up to 8 comfortably (max of six adults).  Retreat to the master suite where you'll find a queen-sized bed with a 43" smart flatscreen TV.  The en suite bathroom has a walk-in tiled shower.The second bedroom is home to a charming bunk bed with a twin on the top, full mattress in the middle, and twin trundle underneath that pulls out.  A 40" flatscreen TV is furnished in here.  (The stairs also serve as drawer space--kids will LOVE it!).  The guest bathroom is a tiled tub/shower combination.*****  WE ONLY USE BLEACHED, WHITE LINENS!!!! *****OUTDOOR AREA:  Relax on the balcony that overlooks 4 lighted tennis courts, which are open from 7am-11pm.  For your convenience, we have a keyless entry.  ADDITIONAL INFO:Guest amenities include complimentary Wi-Fi and Cable TV.  Card-operated washers/dryers are available steps away from the condo on the same floor.  Unassigned parking is available for 2 vehicles in the outdoor lots/under the building.  The condo is equipped with a beach cart, beach chairs, beach umbrella, boogie boards, an insulated cooler and beach toys so that you can have fun at the beach!  You only need to bring your beach towels and sunscreen!  Speaking of the beach, we have a 300-yard boardwalk to a private beach (complimentary shuttle), beachside cabana, two outdoor swimming pools, one indoor pool/one kiddie pool, jogging track, fitness center, spa/sauna, hot tub, tennis/pickleball/badminton courts on the resort.  The indoor pools are ideal for rainy days!  For those who prefer to dine outdoors, there are picnic tables and grills outside of the condo."Coco's On The Beach" is a well-known, ocean-front bar and grill at the end of the boardwalk.  Coco's provides food, snacks and refreshing drinks as well as beach volleyball and restrooms.  "Island Grill and Deli" is located beside the outdoor pool in Building One.  They not only serve burgers, pizza, salads, sandwiches, french fries and ice cream--they also have groceries and souvenirs.  Ping-pong and pool tables are located here also.  LOCATION:  Hilton Head Resort is conveniently located close to beaches, parks, golf courses, restaurants, shopping and the airport.  We're next to the Robert Trent Golf Course, which is in Palmetto Dunes.  Rent bikes and jump on the paved bike path at our entrance--it goes from one end of the island to the other.  Yes, 108 miles of paved shared-use paths!RESORT POLICIES:  No smoking indoors; no petsReady to create some fun memories?  Book today and enjoy our lovely, refreshing and comfortable vacation home!

more description: The spaceIsland Club 3105Walk to the beach, relax in the pool and hot tub, or play some tennis with your friends at this beautiful villa on the beach in Hilton Head! With beautiful landscaping and incredible amenities, including a easy beach access, this condo is the perfect destination for an oceanfront getaway.Located just a short drive from the many shops and restaurants of Hilton Head Island, this condo makes it easy to explore all the island has to offer. If you'd rather stay on the property, you'll find plenty there to enjoy, from an on-site pool to a well-equipped fitness center, as well as nine tennis courts and a shared jacuzzi.When you're not out in the sun, entertain yourself with the free WiFi, the 42' cable TV, or by watching the sunset from your private deck. Sate your hunger by fixing a snack in the fully equipped kitchen, or cooking some steaks on one of the gas grills on site. The master bedroom has access to the patio as well as a king bed and full bath while the second bedroom is across from the full hallway bathroom and features a queen and twin beds.A warm climate and countless activities make this villa a year-round destination. Book your reservation today!ISLAND CLUB AMENITIESSeasonal, shared pools in the center of the complex (early spring through November)Seasonal, shared hot tub (early spring through November - no children under 10)Island Club Tennis Center with tennis and pickleball courtsExercise roomMultiple picnic areas with shared charcoal and gas grillsFive private beach access points with rinse-off showersBusiness centers in the RotundaLawn games providedOn-site bicycle rentals availablePlayground for younger visitors13-acre catch and release, stocked lagoonTHINGS TO KNOWA sofa bed is included.Elevators in the buildings.This property is managed by Vacasa Vacation Rentals of Hilton Head Island LLC.The Island Club Management will close the lap pool and kiddie pool on the last Friday night in October. The hot tub will stay open and heated until the Friday night after Thanksgiving. The kiddie pool, lap pool, and hot tub are scheduled to reopen on the 2nd or 3rd Saturday of March, barring any maintenance issues.The heaters for both the lap and kiddie pools will stay on during the spring until the weather changes. The heaters will be turned back on in the fall, depending on the weather. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 1.Parking notes: There is free parking for 1 vehicles. Only 1 vehicle is allowed. Parking pass required for vehicle. No assigned parking. Gated entrance. No street parking.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. The Breakers complex offers an oceanfront pool and children's pool, along with direct beach access.  Walk to Coligny Plaza where you will find many shops, and restaurants, Pool Bar Jim's, Lowcountry Celebration Park, or bike on the many paths nearby. There will be a new closer elevator working in the summer of 2022.

description: Pristine Shipyard condo Sleeps 9- Bike 2 beach!
name: Townhouse in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire townhouse hosted by Sarah9 guests ·  · 3 bedrooms ·  · 5 beds ·  · 2.5 baths
number of guests: 9 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 5 beds · **__** · 2.5 baths**__**Joined in July 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.The spaceCome to the heart of HHI and enjoy our families 1600+ square ft. fully-remodeled & cared for condo. We are located within Shipyard, which is full of beautiful bike paths, 3 golf courses, tennis courts, a private beach for owners & guests only, a large pool overlooking the golf course (did I mention this is 100 steps from our front door?), right at the most convenient corner of the whole island. Like to bike? Us, too! You can bike to the beach in 12 minutes (or drive in 4, all within the neighborhood). Bike or walk to dinner as over 40 restaurants are 2 miles away (or less)! Our kids favorite part of the island is all of the wildlife… See sights of alligators, turtles, birds, and deer on your morning walk! Enjoy our back porch with new & comfortable patio furniture. There is lots of room out back for the kids to run around. Our kitchen is fully-stocked & opens up to the eating area. The living room holds large families on the XL couch for movie nights. Our den has a daybed that sleeps 2 on separate twin beds. Upstairs, you’ll find 3 large bedrooms and 2 full baths, all expertly remodeled. Every single room with a bed in the home has its own smart TV with cable and it is loaded with all the apps you could want. This includes the den, which is great for the little ones to enjoy their own time! The master bedroom has a king size bed with plenty of room to spread out. Traveling with a baby? Remember, that infant doesn’t count in the max guests AND the master closet is tucked away & more than large enough for a private pack & play area (that we provide, as well as a high chair)! The 2nd bedroom has a queen bed as well as a desk/workspace with speedy WiFi throughout the home. The 3rd bedroom has a twin over full bunk bed. There are a few toys in this room as well as a basketball hoop. Find a cabinet downstairs full of board games. We also provide beach towels, boogie boards & beach toys, a backpack cooler, beach bag, and loads of recommendations for a fun week at the beach! Bike rental options are endless on the island & they deliver bikes to/from your front door. We have a large private front porch to store your bikes at night. We take pride in hosting and look forward to chatting soon!  KITCHEN: Fully equipped, granite countertops, cooking basics, coffee maker, knife set, air fryer, microwave, toaster   GENERAL: Linens & towels provided, washer/dryer, central heating & A/C

description: Oceanview at Breakers - Vitamin’Sea
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by The Boys Of HHI2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in November 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Situated in the heart of Coligny, Vitamin’Sea at The Breakers is the perfect place to relax and unwind. The year-round heated pool and spectacular ocean views are two of the greatest highlights. I do not know if you will find a more private and romantic villa that is more tastefully designed and decorated in the Coligny area. Now with 2 Elevators.Breathe in the sea air from the balcony from the high-top table and chairs. Or, just sit on the sofa to watch the surf.The spaceThis charming one bedroom, one bath, with pools and ocean view end-unit is located on the second floor. There is a new elevator on the North end of the complex. The one bedroom, with plush Queen bed, high thread count sheets, a ceiling fan and has a large flat panel TV is perfect for enjoying movies in bed. The well-equipped kitchen has a full-size stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, and both Keurig and Nespresso coffee/espresso makers. Electrolux steam washing machine and steam dryer make laundry enjoyable. Vitimin’Sea is perfectly located at the Coligny Beach Plaza and situated on the award-winning best island on the continental United States. You should not need to pack anything other than your vacation clothes, flip-flops, and a toothbrush. We hope we have included everything and anything you could ever desire or ask for.Over 60 shops, restaurants, and the Piggly Wiggly supermarket are within walking distance of Coligny Plaza. And you are next door to the popular Coligny Beach Plaza.This villa is located in the middle of everything and has endless bike/jogging trails that connect with the island's 75-mile path network. The home boasts some additional luxury features like Alexa pucks, smartphone charging stations throughout, Netflix movies and so much more. The bedroom and baths feature Beekman 1802 designer amenities, alarm clocks, white noise machines, earplugs, and a ceiling fan. The towels and linens are of high-quality and high thread count.

description: Heart of Harbour Town - Beach | Pool | Golf | 2BR/2.5BA - Pool Access
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Karen8 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2.5 baths
number of guests: 8 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2.5 baths**__**Joined in June 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: In the Heart of Harbour TownExperience the best of Harbour Town living with exquisite harbour views in this recently updated 2 BR / 2.5 BA end unit just steps away from the waterfront. Villa is a short walk to pool, the pristine Harbour Town Golf Links, and the Sea Pines Trolley -- offering complimentary seasonal transport. Recently renovated with gourmet kitchen, elegant living area, and outdoor dining. Sleeps 8. Includes Harbour Town pool passes.The spaceRelaxing retreat featuring 2BR / 2.5BA and professionally decorated with a fun nautical theme. Located in the heart of the Harbour Town Yacht Basin and just steps away from the fairways of Harbour Town Golf Links and the Harbour Town pool. The seasonal Sea Pines Trolley offers complimentary transport around the local area, including the Sea Pines Beach Club.A recently renovated open living space creates a sense of airy comfort incorporating a spacious living room and formal dining. A wide set of patio sliding doors gives way to the tranquil outdoor dining area, where an elevated brick paver platform provides stunning harbor views. Inside, the kitchen enjoys a large footprint with updated granite countertops, wainscoting and stainless steel appliances.  Set above the sunlit foyer, the second floor landing guides toward two bedrooms with the master suite enjoying views of the harbor.LIVING AREASRelaxing, comfortable and stylish living space serves as the social heart of the home complete with new floors, a new 65” wall-mounted TV and seating for six on the full-size sofa and swivel chairs.KITCHEN & DININGFeel like you’re at home with a fully outfitted gourmet kitchen featuring granite countertops, decorative wainscoting and stainless steel appliances. When you're ready to eat, share meals around a spacious dining table that seats six or outside on the patio.BEDROOMS & BATHSAbove the floor to ceiling windows of the entry hall, you’ll find the master’s retreat along with the spacious guest bedroom.The richly appointed master bedroom features a king bed, LED lighted vanity mirror and a large 43” wall-mounted TV. An en-suite bathroom adds convenience with a recently updated walk-in shower.An equally inviting second bedroom boasts two double beds and a 43” flat-screen TV and is complemented by a guest bathroom featuring a tub/shower combination. An additional half bath downstairs is conveniently located off the main entry.OUTDOOR AREASMake the most of your Harbour Town getaway on your private patio with breathtaking views of the harbor. Enjoy dinner around the four-person patio table. After dinner, walk around the corner for a drink on the boardwalk or visit Cinnamon Bear Country Store for some ice cream.

name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States

number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in October 2011**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Walk across the street to the beach from this newly totally remodeled two bedroom, two full bath flat with queen size sleeper sofa.Walk right across the street to the beach!!!!!!!!The one level flat is located on the third floor near the first elevator facing the pool, tennis courts and lagoon. The location is perfect for enjoying the Island breezes on the spacious balcony with private access to the balcony from both bedrooms and the living room.The spaceWalk right across the street to the beach!!!!!!!!I have two properties across the hall from one another on the third floor that is perfect for groups. https://www.airbnb.com/h/forestbeach314The one level flat is located on the third floor near the first elevator facing the pool, tennis courts and lagoon. The location is perfect for enjoying the Island breezes on the spacious balcony with private access to the balcony from both bedrooms and the living room. This spacious two bedroom, two full bath villa with king size bed in the master and two twin beds in the guest room is located in the Forest Beach Villa complex at 10 South Forest Beach Drive, which is right across the street from the Beach and the Beach House Ocean Front Hotel and FAMOUS Tiki Bar. You will be right across the street from the beach and walking distance to Coligny Plaza and the shops and restaurants. Two hard surface tennis courts and a private pool are located right on the property. This villa offers exceptional amenities, style, and location.  The South Forest Beach area is located just down the street from the Ocean Gate to Sea Pines Resort as well.   Step inside, and this Forest Beach Villa features a nice open kitchen with two bar stools, two bathrooms with walk-in showers, a 65” flat screen Smart TV in the living room with Spectrum cable and complimentary secured high speed WiFi. The master bedroom also features a 50" flat screen Smart TV. the guest room features two twin beds and a 50" flat screen Smart TV.Step outside and you are walking right across the street to the beach and numerous walking and bike paths. There are several bike racks under the building and this condo is located on the third floor very close to the first elevator that you come to once you park underneath the building.  Unlike other owners or management companies, we offer an extremely personalized service which includes providing maps with points of interests and recommended shopping and restaurants. Also, we live locally and are available anytime both before and during your stay for any questions or assistance needed.  Starter condiments such as toilet paper, paper towels, shampoo and soap are provided. There is private covered parking for all Forest Beach Villa guests only or you can park outside right in front of the complex. Please no smoking inside of the villa, there is a lovely spacious balcony for smoking and enjoying the ocean breezes. Sorry,  NO PETS are allowed in the complex!  Bed spreads for all bedding are changed after every guest departure.Grills are not allowed at this property. To access the public beach, you will take a five-minute walk left out of the parking lot on the walking/bike path to The Beach House Hotel/Coligny Circle and walk across the street to the access point next to the Beach House Hotel. You can easily look up Coligny Public Beach and view the map. Complimentary secured WiFi, pool and hard court tennis courts onsite for guests. This newly decorated and remodeled villa is located on the third floor overlooking the pool, tennis courts and lagoon views. There are two elevators that are available and luggage carts are located in the covered garage area on the ground floor. I am happy to make payment arrangements for you so that you can enjoy this fantastic beach location. Sheets and Linens are provided. Large round filters are required for the 12 cup coffee maker with a timer.Forest Beach Villas features:Ground Coffee Maker, requires round filterKeurig Coffee MakerKing size bed in the Master bedroomBright and open Living roomSpacious Kitchen with new stainless steal appliances and dishwasherPortable Ice makerDining Room with seating for 6, bar with seating for twoSecure WiFi is complimentaryLinens and towels are providedBlanket50" TV with Cable in the Living Room50" TV with Cable in the Master BedroomMaster bedroom/Guest bedroom and Living room ceiling fans Hairdryer, Iron & Ironing boardApproximately 1100 sq ft of living space! Check-in 4:00 pm (or earlier if unoccupied the night before) Check-out by 10:00 a.m.A female or male Massage Therapist ($80 per hour) is available to come to the villa upon request. Travelers who cancel at least 28 days before check-in will get back 100% of the amount they've paid. This property is managed by Bradley Beach Side Properties, LLCProviding over a decade of hospitality excellence on Hilton Head Island and beyond......Yes, we are on the web!We do not provide bikes or beach equipment for this property. Beach equipment can be rented by the day, half day or hour on the Beach. Bikes can be ordered and delivered to your accommodations prior to your arrival. Self tanner is not allowed in this condo please. Thank you. Items not provided Extra toilet paperExtra paper towels Beach chairs Beach towels Coffee/KcupsSpices CoolerBeach cart Umbrellas

more description: Large 2BR/BA 2nd floor corner condo just listed and RENOVATED in 2018 near popular Coligny Plaza.  2 mins from the beach.This spacious 1225 Sq Ft Condo has an open floor plan with kitchen looking into Living Rm with an EXTRA Living Rm and kitchenette. New flooring,paint, furnishings, mattresses, fixtures,cabinets, beachy art work.Our tastefully decorated beach themed condo has all amenities of a home to make your vacation complete. 2 flat screen TV's.Heated Indoor pool/Spa makes it perfect.The spaceThis two bedroom condo is just minutes from the beach, in the South Forest Beach area. It is located on the second floor, accessible by elevator.Brand New 4 Pickeball courts and one new tennis court.Get your racquets!!!With upgrades throughout, this condo features two living rooms and two balconies and brand new flooring throughout. The well appointed kitchen, opens up to a beautiful dinning area with views off the patio. The dining table can accommodate up to six people, An open concept living room offers plenty of comfortable seating on the large sofa which doubles as a sleeper sofa and a beautiful flat screen TV; the second living room offers another large couch and another large a flat screen TV. The unit offers a washer & dryer,The master bedroom has a king size bed with private bathroom; the second bedroom has a queen and twin bed, with an adjacent bathroom.Ocean Walk condos are in a private complex that features a heated indoor pool and spa, outdoor pool,tennis courts, and is just a 2 minute walk to the beach! Located in the South Forest Beach area, Ocean Walk is located less than a block from the beach behind the hustle of the beach traffic, but still close enough to enjoy all that Coligny has to offer.Forest Beach is ideal location for families with beaches, shopping and dining located within walking distance. The newly renovated Coligny Beach Park area provides benches, swings, fountain, restroom and changing rooms for beachgoers and the wide stretches of white sand beach are ideal for a family day by the ocean.Coligny Plaza is the heart of Forest Beach and has access to over 100 boutiques, beach shops, novelty stores, coffee shops and island cuisine within one central location. There is a free shuttle to get to Coligny Plaza if you don't feel like making the short walk.Snowbirds accepted for the winter at a discounted price as well!!Caution: Please do not use the tennis courts beyond 10pm as the FOB will get disabled.

The master br. has a queen size bed,the second br. has a twin over twin bunk bed and a full size bed too. The kitchen is fully stocked . We offer a beach wagon and toys for a great day at the beach! The Resort has 3 pools ,tennis courts, a rest. at the pool and beach.The space* Your Vacation home away from home*                                                        Located in the most popular building closest to the beach with and the outdoor pool overlooking the Villa. This newly renovated and newly furnished ( June 2018)       2 bedroom and 2 bath Villa in the heart of Hilton Head Island. The unit has a fully stocked kitchen to cook meals, plus free wifi and cable. The master bedroom has a queen size bed and flat screen tv. The 2nd bedroom will accommodate up to 4 people with a new full size  bed on one side and a set of twin bunk beds on the other side.  It's stocked with beach chairs, boogie boards,noodles, sand toys, shovels, beach cart,  so you have everything you need for a day on the beach. The resort boasts wonderful amenities. There is always 24 hour security on the entire grounds. There are 2 outdoor pools an indoor pool, tennis courts and our semi -private beach a gym, hot tub, a bar and restaurant at the pool and beach. After this property is reserved we have to add Hilton Heads local 3% tax to you. Unfortunately there is not place for owners to add this fee so we have to do this thru the resolution center. more description:
The spaceSeacrest 2405Admire spectacular sunrise views from the balcony of this fourth-floor villa in Hilton Head's oceanfront Seacrest Resort. This condo enjoys an ideal location at Coligny Plaza, right near shops, restaurants, and bars, and within a few steps of the sandy beach. Within this gated resort, you'll have everything you need to enjoy a relaxing vacation, including oceanfront pools, hot tubs, a fitness center, and grilling areas to help you take advantage of the beautiful tropical weather. Back at the villa, enjoy such at-home comforts as flatscreen TVs in the living room and bedroom and DVD players for movie nights with family and friends. 

What's nearby:
This oceanfront resort is located right on the beach, allowing you to easily spend your days swimming, sunbathing, surfing, and strolling on the sand. Right across the street is Coligny Plaza, where you'll find more than 60 shops and restaurants, a theater, and other sources of entertainment. The Shipyard Golf Club, one of many renowned golf courses on Hilton Head Island, is less than two miles north as well. 

Things to know: 
Free WiFi
Full kitchen
There is an additional full-size Murphy bed in the living space
The pool is heated in March and April only

more description:
The spaceShorewood 410Guests staying here at this newly remodeled fourth-floor Shorewood condo have access to a shared swimming pool and hot tub.

The Shorewood complex has a convenient location just a third of a mile away from the Coligny Plaza Shopping Center, restaurants, and cafes. It takes only a few minutes to walk down to the complex's expansive pool area, which has lounge chairs, patio tables, and a baby pool for the little ones. The beach can be accessed by walking down the pathway from the pool, so you can splash around in the waves easily.

Take a breath of fresh air as you step onto your covered balcony with views of the Atlantic. This oceanfront condo is a great place to relax as it has a spacious living room and a fully equipped kitchen with granite countertops and custom cabinets. The master bathroom has a walk-in shower, and the hall bathroom has a tub/shower combination. Free WiFi, washer and dryer facilities and parking for two vehicles are also provided.

This oceanfront condo will be your temporary home as you enjoy your next vacation in Hilton Head.

*Please note that from 01/01/2022-02/01/2022 painting of the exterior buildings and deck will be happening.

Seasonally heated pool.

description: *Cozy Deer Island near Harbor Town*
name: Home in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Meredith6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in October 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Enjoy the luxury of this sea loft with all the comforts of home. Deer Island sea lofts are individual homes on a secluded Island within Sea Pines Plantation. As you cross the wood bridge onto Deer Island, you feel as if you have entered a neighborhood like no other where the deer roam freely along with the many species of birds that adorn the trees in this all natural setting.The spaceWhile quiet and secluded, you will enjoy walking or riding bikes to Harbour Town, the Sea Pines Equestian Center and Petting Zoo and the beautiful beaches of Hilton Head Island. You will be within 200 yards of the Harbour town Yacht basin, shoppes and many fabulous restaurants. Whether you are looking for a weekend getaway or an extended stay, rest assure you will find the comfort and luxury of Hilton Head Island in the finest of accommodations. This two bedroom, two bath sea loft offers a large living area (with sleeper sofa), full kitchen and large deck with grill. Five bikes are offered for your convenience to enjoy the winding bike trails throughout Hilton Head Island or catch a free trolley ride to many parts of the Island within a short walk to the Trolley Stop. This is a nature lovers dream vacation destination.

more description:
The spaceBeachwalk 142Beachwalk 142 is an ideal spot for athletes because the property has options for basketball players, tennis players, and golfers. A spacious swimming pool is on the grounds, too, and for those looking for a beach, it’s a short walk away.

This condo is located less than a mile from popular bike trails on Hilton Head Island, so you can peddle around the surrounding area without any hassle, exploring the beach or the Shipyard Beach Club. Guests get one free hour of tennis at the Van Der Meer Shipyard. If you want to spend a day on the property instead, you can unwind by the swimming pool and along the edge of the lagoon.

Many options for a family are found in the main living space, as a 42-inch flatscreen TV, modern stereo, and DVD/VCR combo are available to guests. The main furniture piece in the living room is a sofa, which can be converted into a bed. In the fully equipped kitchen, a strategically arranged skylight illuminates the breakfast bar, appliances, and cabinets. From the kitchen, you can easily access the master bedroom, which has a TV, DVD player, and sitting area. Free WiFi and a private washer/dryer round out the conveniences of this home.

Enjoy sports activities, dips in a swimming pool, and the comforts of home by booking this condo today!

One free hour of tennis per day included with reservations in 2020

number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1.5 baths**__**Joined in May 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Saltwater Zen - Your Oceanfront Retreat on Fripp Island. Our home is an ocean retreat, perfect for couples or a small family.   Fripp Island is a wonderful family-friendly alternative to the more well-known beaches in North and South Carolina.Our home is tastefully decorated and fully furnished.  Everything you need for a relaxing trip.Your price includes a $15 daily resort fee. This gives you access to restaurants, pools, bars, golf & tennis (+separate fee), and other resort spaces.The spaceOcean front location — directly adjacent to the breakwater barrier. The peaceful sound of the ocean will melt your cares away as you relax in this tastefully decorated home.This exceptional property has hardwood flooring throughout and two balconies for absorbing the beautiful ocean view.The kitchen has everything you’ll need including a combination coffee maker and k-cup machine to help you start your day.If you’re looking for some downtime, there’s expanded Cable TV as well as high-speed internet to keep you connected. Google Home is available (just say “hey Google”) to provide you with music in the living room and in the bedroom. And, you can pack light and use our washer and dryer.1 queen master bedroom upstairs with a pullout sofa downstairs.  Saltwater Zen is an absolutely fantastic location for a couple or a small family.Fripp Island is an absolutely fantastic location. 25 beach access points and several freshwater pools.  There are several restaurants right on the island and even more great options in Beaufort, SC -- a short 12-15 minute drive into town.  However, Fido will have to stay behind — pets are not allowed — sorry for that.We hope to see you soon at Saltwater Zen!

number of guests: 8 guests · **__** · 4 bedrooms · **__** · 5 beds · **__** · 3 baths**__**Joined in July 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Enjoy the ultimate beach vacation at the Tidewatch! Located directly on the sand with spectacular ocean views. Relax on the home's wrap-around porches while spotting dolphins or take a dip in the ocean right outside your front door. Located within the private, gated community of Harbor Island, a barrier island near Beaufort, SC with easy access to Charleston, Savannah, and Hilton Head. Guests have access to Harbor Islands' miles of sandy beaches, resort style pools, and recreation facilities.The spaceThis beautifully appointed and recently renovated home has 4 bedrooms (1 king bed, 2 queen beds and 2 twin beds), 3 full bathrooms, and sleeps up to 8 guests.All bedding, linens, and towels are provided with your rental, along with basic necessities (hand soap, shower gel, paper towels, toilet paper, dish soap, etc.) The kitchen is well stocked with dishes, pots/pans, utensils, etc. for cooking and serving meals at the house. In addition, the home comes fully equipped with everything you need for a memorable stay at the beach, including beach chairs, towels, umbrellas, wagon, sand toys, etc.Three wrap-around porches provide ample seating to soak in the breathtaking ocean views. When it’s time to move inside, the open concept kitchen features a large wall of windows with panoramic views of the Sound. The adjacent dining area and living room provide plenty of space to serve and enjoy meals or to simply relax after a day spent at the beach.

number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2.5 baths**__**Joined in October 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Enjoy Hilton Head Island in this designer decorated sealoft on Deer Island in Sea Pines Plantation. Classy coastal chic touches throughout this  2 Bedroom, 2  Bath sealoft are complemented by floor to ceiling windows that extend views of Calibogue Sound and the abundance of wildlife adorning the natural landscape. Relax  or dine al fresco on the expansive decks and patios. Within a 3 minute walk,  many fine shoppes, restaurants and entertainment  await you in Harbour Town.The space2033 DEER ISLAND | HARBOUR TOWN | Hilton Head IslandImmerse yourself in wooded views and rustic tranquility in this architecturally dazzling sealoft villa, just a short bike ride away from the shopping, dining and excitement of Harbour Town.Bedrooms: 2Baths: 2Sleeps: 6Square Footage: 950 sq. ft.Area: Harbour TownProximity to Beach: Ride To BeachBeds: 2 QUEEN, 1 SLEEPERParking Space Capacity: 2Dog Friendly: NoExpansive multi-level deck with gas grill.  Pool and Beach Access in Sea Pines Plantation. Walk to Harbour Town. Your Hilton Head Island escape to enjoy the beaches, bike ride for miles, golf and play tennis or to simply relax should have this cozy, elegant home as your nest. Indoor Living with floor to ceiling windows, 4 Flat Screen Smart TV's and cable,  comfortable living room upstairs, with an additional sitting area/office area on the first floor. We offer Free Wi-Fi and a Bose Blue Tooth Wireless Speaker. All linens/towels/kitchen towels are provided. Trash bags, toilet paper, paper towels, hand soap, laundry and dish detergents and a first aid kit are provided.Sleeping Options: Master Bedroom with King Bed, Second Bedroom with  two Twins (can be converted to a king upon request), Sleeper Sofa in Living Room and Third Bedroom (downstairs via a separate entrance) has a queen bed with a sitting area and office/game table space. Please make note the third bedroom downstairs has a separate entrance with a Half Bath.The outdoor Oasis offers a private wrap around deck  with outdoor dining area to seat six with a gas grill and several lounge areas. The Kitchen is fully equipped and boosts stainless steel appliances, marble counter tops, dishwasher, ice maker, Keurig and  regular drip coffee makers, blender and all the cooking basics and dishware you may need. 8 Beach Towels and Chairs (mix of low folding chairs and high collapsible chairs), rolling beach cart and cooler are provided as an added convenience. Umbrellas and boogie boards are for rent by the Lifeguards.Parking for two vehicles available with in spaces provided with a Sea Pines Plantation Pass fee required per vehicle for admittance onto the Plantation. The Sea Pines Beach Club is 2 miles from the sealoft and may be accessed by free seasonal trolley, bike or car. The pool access is in South Beach of Sea Pines, 4 miles from the sealoft and is accessible for $15/day or $75/week.Entry to the sealoft is keyless.The sealoft is accessible by stairs only and therefore may not  be suitable for those who have difficulty using stairs.House Rules-No Smoking-No Pets-No events, parties, or large gatherings-Must be 21 years old to book and Photo ID may be required.Security Cameras- This home is equipped with an exterior camera for your protection and security.Location DetailsBeaches: Coligny Beach Park (4.8 miles), Singleton Beach (8.4 miles), Burkes Beach (8.5 miles), Dreiseen Beach Park (8.7 miles), Folly Beach Park (9.2 miles) and Fish Haul Beach Park (12.2 miles)Island Attractions: Harbour Town Lighthouse (0.4 miles), Stoney Baynard Ruins (1.4 miles), Shelter Cove Community Park (6.9 miles), Coastal Discovery Museum (9.0 miles)Golf: Harbour Town Golf Links (0.5 miles), Robert Trent Jones Oceanfront Course (7.2 miles), The Heritage Golf Collection on Hilton Head Island (9.8 miles), Golden Bear Golf Club at Indigo Run (12.0 miles)Shopping: Village at Wexford (4.3 miles), Coligny Plaza Shopping Center (4.7 miles), Shelter Cove Town Center (7.0 miles), Main Street Village (9.8 miles)Airports: Hilton Head Island Airport (10.6 miles), Savannah/Hilton Head International Airport (47.8 miles)

Enter this bright and tastefully decorated villa via the front porch that is just three steps up from the parking lot. You'll love the coastal decor as well as the updated living room with ample seating, and a mounted flatscreen HDTV. The dining area is equipped with a large table that seats four, and there is additional seating on the outdoor patio. The kitchen is beautifully updated with granite counters, appliances, and flooring.

more description:
The spaceSeacrest 1503Enjoy all of the attractions that Hilton Head Island has to offer from the comfortable surroundings of this ocean view condo at Seacrest. Take advantage of amenities that include shared pools, an outside hot tub, and a fitness center.

The interior of your condo offers fifth-floor views of lagoons, the grounds, and the ocean. This condo provides you with a variety of creature comforts such as flatscreen TVs, private bathrooms, and even start-up cleaning supplies. The interior of your condo offers fifth-floor views of lagoons, the grounds, and the ocean. This condo provides you with a variety of creature comforts such as flatscreen TVs, private bathrooms, and even start-up cleaning supplies. The living room features comfortable seating and is open to the kitchen and dining area. The recently renovated kitchen features granite countertops and new cabinetry. The master bedroom features a king bed, private balcony and a ensuite bathroom with a stand alone shower and a soaking tub. The guest bedroom features two double beds. The guest bathroom, which can be accessed from the bedroom or main hallway, features a stand alone shower and a soaking tub.

Located in the North Forest Beach area of the island, Seacrest offers easy access to the nearby beach, shops, restaurants, golf courses, and tennis courts. You’ll also be right on the edges of the Shipyard Golf Course and only a short ride by bike or car to many other Hilton Head Island attractions that include resorts, a world-class tennis academy, bike trails, and many fishing areas. When it comes to nightlife, you’ll have your pick of a large selection of beachfront eateries, lounges, cafes, and bars. Seacrest puts you in a prime position to have a memorable getaway, so don't delay in booking this vacation rental today.

more description: Look no further for your Hilton Head Island Beach Retreat! Our recently renovated 2/2 is conveniently located to the tennis courts and has many amenities for the perfect vacation retreat! The resort includes a large swimming pool, beach access, tennis courts, pickle ball, volleyball, a children's park, fitness center, bike rentals and resort restaurants! When not out exploring all of the many activities, relax in our fully stocked beach villa.The spaceInside:Our 2/2 is designed with families in mind. Upon walking in, you'll be greeted by the open layout and light and airy space. The master features a King size bed, tv and en-suite bathroom, while the guest has a Queen bed with tv. The living room is equipped with a sleeper sofa for additional sleeping arrangements. The open kitchen with dining table ensure all of the family can enjoy well deserved time together. Outside:Step outside on our balcony and catch the action from the tennis courts. When not staying in, the resort has many out door activities to enjoy. Cool off at the pool or beach or rent bikes and explore Hilton Head Island. Sports enthusiasts will have their selection of tennis, pickle ball, volleyball, and basketball all located on the property. Golf courses are a quick drive away as well!

more description: *2 hours of court time (tennis or pickleball) per day at Palmetto Dunes Tennis Center included*2 bikes includedWelcome to Queens Grant! This 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom condo in beautiful Palmetto Dunes Resort is the perfect location for your next getaway. A short walk will land you on the picturesque Hilton Head beach and the Palmetto Dunes General Store and Palmetto Dunes Tennis Center are just about in your backyard.The spaceThe condo features a wide open common space with beautiful vaulted ceilings and cozy beach colors and décor. The living room has a sofa bed, lounge chair, and a 50” Smart TV. A fully stocked kitchen is ready to handle any of your cooking desires, and an in-unit washer/dryer will help you pack light.A large master bedroom with a king bed has a Smart TV and closet access. The dual entry bathroom is connected to the master bedroom and walkway. The second bedroom, which holds a double bed, also has a Smart TV.Head out the back door to the patio for morning coffee before you take on the day in paradise.To make your stroll to the beach easier, a beach wagon is available as are 2 backpack-style beach chairs. The condo is professionally cleaned by the island's top rated cleaning service.We wish you the best of vacations at our Queens Grant home away from home.

more description:
The spacePink PineappleSoak up the sun and enjoy a perfect Hilton Head vacation while staying in this newly renovated, contemporary condo in the oceanfront Carolina Beach Club! Admire the view of the Atlantic Ocean right from your private balcony, take easy walks across the boardwalk to the gorgeous beach each morning, and enjoy beautiful shared amenities that include pools, a hot tub, Ping-Pong tables, grills, and outdoor lounge spaces and picnic areas right in the complex.

What's nearby:
Everything you need for fun and relaxation is just a short distance from your front door. This oceanfront complex has its own access point to the spectacular sandy beach, allowing you to spend your days swimming, sunbathing, flying kites, and surfing. The Coligny Plaza Shopping Center is half a mile up the road, so you'll be within walking distance of an assortment of wonderful shops and restaurants. The Shipyard Golf Club - one of many world-class golf courses on Hilton Head Island - is just two miles north as well.

name: Condo in Hilton Head Island

unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Joy And Jill5 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 3 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in April 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to the Cozy in Coligny condo!  Located at The Breakers, a highly desirable beachfront property, you are only steps away from the pool and beach.  You will be in the heart of award-winning Coligny Beach – park your car and leave it!  You can spend the day playing in the sun and sand then walk across the street to Coligny Plaza – home to the beloved Piggly Wiggly grocery store and 60+ shops, restaurants, entertainment, tour information, beach equipment, and bike rentals.The spaceThe condo features a small kitchen, one bedroom with queen-sized bed, a small bunk perfect for a child, a sleeper sofa in the living room and one bathroom with a shower/tub combo.  Enjoy some time on the covered balcony that overlooks the pool area and has a view of the ocean.  This condo is perfect for those who want to be steps away from the beach, pool, restaurants and shops.The Breakers condos are cozy at 520 sq feet, but everything you need for a fun, relaxing vacation is here for you.  The space will accommodate 2 adults or a family of 4 comfortably.  Bedroom: 1 queen bed with a new mattress, high quality bedding (down alternative all-weather duvet).  32-inch smart TV and small closet to store your things.The small bunk bed is perfect for a child and outfitted with a fun space and high-quality bedding.Bathroom: Tub/shower combo, sink, and 10x makeup mirror.  Shampoo, conditioner, body wash and lotion provided.Kitchen: Full-sized refrigerator and dishwasher, Cuisinart toaster oven, two-burner stove, and Keurig coffee machine.  Cookware, bakeware, and utensils provided.  Seating at the counter for 2 on comfortable bar stools, and a small dining table (seats up to 4).Living room: sleeper sofa with new mattress, 58-inch smart TV and wifi.  Large sliding Pella door provides a cool breeze and sounds of the ocean.  Central heating and air-conditioning.Beach chairs, umbrella, small cooler, and wagon ready to easily transport all your beach goodies.  Other amenities include a booster seat for the dining table, iron, compact ironing board, hair dryer, shampoo, conditioner, body wash and lotion provided.  Washer/dryer available in the unit.We now have a sturdy, fold-away desk and monitor we can setup for your stay (upon request), if you are currently working remotely and need a change of scenery.

description: Player's Club - 1BR/1BA - Great Location and Pool!
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Ryan4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in November 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Situated on seven acres of lush semi-tropical land, Players Club is a laid-back resort complex that sits in the heart of Hilton Head between the Sea Pines and Shipyard areas. The tranquil surroundings of Players Club reflect the Lowcountry charm of coastal Carolina. Giant oaks draped with Spanish moss, weeping willows and palmetto trees generously adorn the landscape, accentuated by a peaceful pond.Adjacent to the Van Der Meer Tennis Center and close to the islands best golf courses.The spaceThis is a 1BR/1BA. This unit has a Full Kitchen with Stove, Oven, Microwave, Dishwasher, and Coffeemaker.    There is a sit at kitchen bar w/stools. There is also a Dining Table with seating for 4 and Living Room with Queen Sleeper sofa and balcony with table and chairs.   The Master bedroom has a King size bed and another balcony with table and chairs.     Enjoy either balcony while drinking your coffee in the morning or enjoying a beverage of choice in the evening.Your unit does NOT have its own Washer / Dryer, however there is a complimentary Laundry Room located at the end of each hallway where you will find Washers / Dryers that you can use for FREE.  This suite accommodates up to four (4) people.If tennis is your game, you’re in luck!   Players Club features 28 Hard Tru-surface lighted tennis courts, four of which are sheltered from the elements so you can play on the occasional rainy day.   You have the benefit of one (1) FREE hour per day at the Van Der Meer Tennis Center, one of the country’s best facilities.This year-round, family-friendly resort is home to one of the finest health clubs on the island (inside the S.R Hotel on property and open 8am to 8pm). Children can play at the nursery while you enjoy a vigorous game of racquetball, swim some laps in the indoor heated pool, de-stress in a yoga or Pilates class, burn some calories with aerobics or work out with a personal trainer. Afterwards, relax in the warmth of the hot tub or enjoy a tanning bed session. You could also choose to work on your tan in the bright South Carolina sunshine at the resort's inviting outdoor pool, or walk three blocks to Coligny Beach, the best public beach on the island. Frolic in the waves of the warm blue Atlantic Ocean, then treat yourself with a visit to the Tiki bar.Quaint shops and major outlet shopping centers are close by and the beach is just a short walk (7-10 minutes) or short drive away.   There is also a free golf cart shuttle providing transportation to the Beach, or else the Trolley also stops at Player's Club for pickup and drop off.

number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in May 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Gorgeous remodel!THIRD NIGHT FREE is offered DEC-FEB for CONSECUTIVE nights only Message me & I'll send the rate adjustment as a special offer or book 3 NTS & and I will immediately adjust the rateOCEAN BEACHFRONT RESORT 3 MIN WALK to beachfrontBeachfront poolTropical bike paths throughout island offer amazing viewsKing Bed w/ kid size bunks (not twin size) in the same room. A non-locking door separates the living room sleeping area from the King Bed & bunks Max 4 ADULTS/2 kidsThe spaceOur stays are different than hotel stays. Our condo offers extra comforts. The following is a 1 or 2 minute read and provides important information so that you are prepared for your stay: BATH AMENITIES We provide the following:1. Hotel size shampoo, conditioner, and shower gel and/or soap2. Hand soap3. Extra roll of toilet paper  KITCHEN SUPPLIES1. 1 small sized dish soap2. 1 scrub pad3. 2 dishwasher pods4. 1 roll paper towel5. 3 trash bags. This is only enough for a 1- or 2-night stay, please bring extra toilet paper, bathroom and kitchen essentials if needed.We have a single serve KUERIG. Bring your personal coffee supplies.We DO NOT Supply beach towels, chairs, umbrellas or toys. We can provide rental information.One parking pass is included with cleaning fee. Extra passes are $25 each and you’ll need to let me know ahead of time if needed.Our guests are an extraordinary part of the Airbnb Community, and they help us by being GREEN, CLEAN and SUPREME guests! This allows us to continue to offer a great stay at a good value.  Be a GREEN GUESTGreen guests conserve water by reusing towels. Each guest is provided with a set of towels.  If needed there is a pay laundry on the first and second floors. Cards can be purchased at the guest services building when you check in. Be a CLEAN GUEST You pay a cleaning fee that covers sanitization and refreshing after each stay.  While on vacation we don't want to ask much of you.  To keep with our high standards of sanitization and make a smooth transition to our next guest, please take a few minutes prior to departure to do the following:1. Place dirty towels in the tub and unused towels on bedroom shelf.  Why am I being asked to do this?Less laundry= less water usage= a greener environment2. Leave used beds unmade3. Load and start dishwasherWhy am I being asked to do this? If you start the dishwasher before the cleaner arrives, we are assured they are finished drying and fully disinfected prior to the next guest arrival4. Remove all trash and place in garbage bins located in the parking lotWhy am I being asked to do this?We have found this method keeps the condo smelling its freshest for the next guest  Be a SUPREME GUEST Our guests are supreme. They are each equally important to us and demonstrate great qualities and character.Thank you for booking our place! We’re here to help before and during your stay. Please reach out anytime with questions or suggestions for restaurants, excursions or attractions. We’re here to help!

name: Condo in Hilton Head Island

number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in March 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: January on HH is coming.  Perfect for bird watching from your condo deck, sunrise / sunset view, look down on morning high tides with your coffee. Golf, long  dog walks on the beach. Cooler days make for great walks, many refuges.Broad Creek Beauty's magic is the VIEW, calm feeling. Sunrise and Sunset view. Remarkable. This one bedroom is PERFECT for two, PERFECT for small families.Dog Friendly for good citizen dogs and 100% pick up,  barking rules.hot tub openThe spaceCaptains Quarters, Starboard Building:The View is among the best Hilton Head has to offer. Shelter Cove is a Mediterranean Syle Community of Villas, docks, restaurants, and shops. This space feels like home, you will not want to leave. Care Centers to facilitate your stay: baby items, beach items, wagon and chairs for music Thursdays. *King Master*bathroom with 2 sinks , walk in shower*fully equipped kitchen, bake a b day cake*Murphy bunk beds in second sleeping/ dining area, fun view for kids, feel like pirates. extra ENGLAND good quality high blow up twin makes for a third twin sleeping area*sheets and blankets left according to your reservation*we cover the couch and chairs for pets, we wash covers, please keep pets out of the beds:) Make sure pets are flea free. other things to note: We have many childproofs. parental supervision on outsidedeck , pool, hot tub always lock windows for safety if children are in the house, they are low to the floor Thank you. *Fuse ball coffee table is fun for kids and adults. Plenty of games...*The pool and hot tub are share. Card entry. Card is hanging in unit. Pool and hot tub are  located next to your building. Easy entry gate with pass swipe, there are bathrooms at the pool. *Charters, bikes, water rentals are a few steps away, walk out your front door and there is a gate to the left that walks out to the rentals, charters, restaurants, shops. Rent a pontoon boat with the family, or take a jet boat tour driving your own jet boat. Breakfast at the Social Club, or French Bakery is a must. Excellent coffee. *The community has many stores including a Kroger and  seven restaurants. *There are shuttles to the beaches that run in season at regular intervals. All questions easily answered by the many workers and Harbour staff as to location of shuttles and time intervals. *Fireworks every Tuesday night in season can be seen from your balcony. Live music on Thursdays and nightly at restaurants in season and year round beauty, bike rides and walks. See our temps year round in pictures posted. Look at the Shelter Cove Hilton Head website for all activities.It is the mission of Rick and Linda Airbnb to be good neighbors, we want you to join us and be a part of the short term rental revolution solution. Help neighbors to feel safe and welcome with you.

number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in October 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Newly Remodeled - 2 Bedroom/2 Bath First Floor Villa in a Gated Community - less than a five minute walk through our complex to a private, natural beach! Everything you need to enjoy a relaxing, peaceful getaway and all that Hilton Head Island is famous for.  Located in a beautiful, quiet community that offers 2 outdoor pools and one indoor pool that can be enjoyed year round.Come discover why this island has been voted the #1 best island in the United States!The spaceOur condo offers all of the beauty and relaxation you could ask for in an island vacation. It is the perfect home base for families, couples and snowbirds!The Spa on Port Royal Sound, considered a hidden gem, is a 21 acre private (gated with 24 hour security) waterfront condo community located on the north end of Hilton Head Island. Our unit offers an all season sun porch and is just a short walk within the complex to the indoor and outdoor pools and beach. The property is nestled between popular Mitchellville Freedom Park and Fish Haul Beach Park and links directly to the many miles of bike trails that surround the island. It is close to some of the best restaurants, world class golf courses, shopping and many family activities. Our beach is considered a natural beach and is perfect for long walks, exploring, enjoying a picnic, fishing or grabbing a chair and just relaxing as you watch for dolphins and wildlife! Families with young children will appreciate the gentle waves and shallow waters of Port Royal Sound. There are also several large public beaches with direct ocean access and parking within approximately a 5-10 minute drive from the property.

more description:
The spaceOcean Walk Villas 504This coastal paradise is the perfect home base for your next sabbatical. Sporting indoor and outdoor pools, as well as tennis courts, you'll be having fun whether you're here or out exploring. The numerous beaches nearby ensure you'll feel the sand between your toes whenever you like. There are also several golf courses, parks, and restaurants all just a short drive away, meaning there is always something new to try. 

Back at your vacation getaway, the bright, welcoming interior will help you wind down for the day. Relax in front of the TV or catch up on some reading while basking on the balcony and enjoying the breezy weather. The full kitchen has everything you need to make something as large as a meal or as simple as a cup of coffee. When nighttime approaches, the central air conditioning will keep you cool even in the summer months and prepare you for tomorrow's activities.

RESORT AMENITIES
- Indoor and outdoor pool
- Tennis courts

more description: 5-10 minute walk to the pristine Hilton Head beach, retreat to your spacious villa in Queen's Grant of Palmetto Dunes. With nearly 1500sq ft and lofted ceilings, you can spread out comfortably. New living room furniture that all reclines, amazing king green tea memory foam mattress in both bedrooms, and a fully stocked kitchen (blender, toaster oven, crock pot+.) The master and living room open up to a private back patio equipped with a grill, dining room table and beach accessories.The spaceOpen concept kitchen, dining and living room area. Washer and dryer inside. There is an indoor dining table to seat 4 as well as 2 bar seats. The living room features 2 recliners, a sofa and loveseat that all recline as well in front of a flat screen TV equipped with Hargray cable and high speed wifi. There are small writing desks in the living room and second bedroom. Both bedrooms feature king size beds and en suite bathrooms with tubs as well as TVs equipped with cable as well. The primary suite opens up to a very private back patio. No stairs and no carpet.
