more description: Experience Boat Life for a night on "The Last Mango", a Tiny Glamping Sailboat. This 1977 30' Cape Dory offers a comfy bed, some cute decor, a smart TV, Marine Toilet*, and A/C (or a space heater). This boat features a functional kitchenette with a Mini Fridge, a Microwave, and (cold) running water. The salon has two benches for perfect for a quiet night of reading or catching up on your favorite show. An awesome solo or couples escape, with one main cozy v-berth bed. Enjoy all the Shelter Cove Marina amenities including great restaurants & entertainment, free laundry, bikes & showers, ample free parking OUTSIDE the Disney gate, and easy access to lots more nearby. (see map in our photo gallery... This boat is on "J" Dock, so some walking or biking will be required) ExperienceBoatLife.on the web to read our Frequently Asked Questionsbefore diving in to Boat Life!

more description: Welcome to Beach City @ Freedom ParkThis gorgeous new build comes fully stocked with everything you could possibly need for your best beach vacay ever!The home is two years young and brand new to the rental market. It’s located on the north end by Freedom park where you can enjoy the observation deck, grill out at the cabana, and leisurely stroll to a nature-filled bay beach area. One street over takes you to the gorgeous fish haul beach access with restrooms, showers, handicap access&tables.The spaceThis home has bikes, indoor/outdoor games, a huge garage, oversized TV’s, multi-media entertainment, books and toys for kids, all the beach gear you could ask for, cooler, kayak, balls, boogie boards, and beach chairs. I keep it fully stocked with everything you could possibly need in the bathrooms, kitchen, and laundry room. I will keep adding amenities as they are implemented.

more description: Come relax in this bright and sunny 2 bedroom  end-unit condo located at Hilton Head Beach and Tennis Resort.  Beautifully remodeled and overlooking the tennis courts, you are only steps away from the largest oceanfront pool on the island, including a children's pool, tiki bar and two other restaurants, shaved ice/ice cream stand, 10 lighted tennis and pickle ball courts, bike rentals, large children's playground, fitness center and much more!The spaceThis lovely condo offers an open concept space with a recently updated and fully equipped kitchen, full-size stove/oven, dishwasher, microwave, new floors, upgraded finishes and furnishings, dining area, central a/c with guest-controlled thermostat, spacious balcony with comfortable seating overlooking tennis court, two full bathrooms, living room with very comfortable queen sleeper sofa, cable TV, high speed WiFi.  You’ll find everything you need including all essential cookware (pots, pans, utensils, etc.) dishes, glasses, coffee maker, toaster, iron/board, hair dryers, beach chairs, tennis rackets, etc.   We’ve taken care of all the details so all you have to do is enjoy your stay!

more description: Welcome to our updated 2 Bedroom 2 Bath Villa at Hilton Head Beach & Tennis Resort. Villa is a short walk to the Resort's beautiful Private Access Beach and largest outdoor pool on the Island.  New appliances, furniture, natural stone flooring & bathrooms. Villa has a fully equipped Kitchen, Coffee Bar with Keurig, Gel/Memory Foam Mattresses on all Beds including the sofa-bed, 3 Wall Mounted Smart TV's, Cable on 2 of the TV's & Free Wifi. Sleeps 5 Comfortably contact us for info on add'l guestsThe spaceYou're only steps to the Resort Fitness Center, Tennis & Pickleball Courts, Playground,  Picnic Area & Charcoal Grills.  On-site bike rentals will allow you the opportunity to explore the  Island and enjoy the scenery offered on the many bike/walking trails.  Resort has 3 on-site restaurants with one across from the pool on your way to the beach which offers food, drinks and ice cream.  Resort includes 24 hour manned security and on-site maintenance.  Shopping and restaurants are just a short drive or Trolley ride from the resort. The Island also has its own Outlet Mall just a 15 minute drive away.

more description: Enjoy this lovely condo with gorgeous views overlooking Braddock Cove. Top floor 1 BR villa located in SeaPines at South Beach. A short walknext door to Salty Dog Cafe/South Beach Marina with restaurants and shopping. It's also a barefoot walk across the way from beautiful Calibogue Sound (beach) for incredible dolphin/sunset watching!The spaceNew furniture and paint throughout! The beautiful updated kitchen looks out to the spacious living room. The living room has a beautiful water view of Braddock Cove. It also has a sectional sofa, comfortable recliner chair, Pottery Barn wicker chair, new 55 inch smart flat screen TV mounted on wall with streaming capabilities including Youtube TV (cable TV), Netflix, Prime  and/or upgraded cable box package including Showtime. Relax with remote controlled ceiling fans throughout as you enjoy the view of Braddock Cove. The fully equipped kitchen features granite counter top with bar seating for four, Keurig and standard coffee maker available!Walk down the hall to an updated bathroom with granite countertops, tile floors and tub/shower combo bath.The open loft bedroom upstairs has a queen bed with smart flat screen TV, two large walk-in closets, seating area, remote controlled ceiling fan, BedJet and Air Filtration System.

more description: Our Hilton Head Ocean View Beach Villa is 75 yards to the beach!  For your honeymoon, family vacation or weekend getaway OUR OCEANVIEW VILLA IS PERFECT FOR YOU!  Enjoy a beach vacation in our one bedroom villa with its own Atlantic Ocean view private balcony.  Located in the Hilton Head Beach & Tennis Resort, ranked #1 family resort by Forbes Magazine.  Our villa includes a full kitchen, queen size bed in the master bedroom, queen sofa sleeper in living room & children size bunk beds.The spaceOur ocean view villa offers a fantastic view of the Atlantic Ocean where you can witness the most spectacular early morning sunrises and dolphins playing in the surf.  Or take a few steps and you are on either the beautiful soft sands of the resort beach and ocean, the largest oceanfront pool on Hilton Head Island complete with pool side restaurants or ten free-play tennis courts.If you are looking for a place to tally unwind, listen to the crashing waves, watch the changing ocean, and miles of wide, white sand beach o explore, then you've found the right place!  Come share the magic of a wonderful vacation, honeymoon or weekend getaway in our lovely and comfortable condominium on the beach.  PLAN YOUR VACATION WITH US TODAY!

more description: Xanadu Villas is situated in Hilton Head's Forest Beach area, home to one of the island's best beaches! This comfortable, one-bedroom condo gives you the prime access to the sand via a beach path right across the street. You'll be an easy walk from all the shops, restaurants, and nightlife at Coligny Plaza, yet enjoy a quiet, just of-the-beach location, tucked into beautifully landscaped grounds. On-site amenities, pool, tennis, picnic and grilling area.The spaceThe condo is an open layout, remodeled bathroom, kitchen, modern beachy furnishings. Brand new King size bed and a twin  air mattress is included for you.

description: "Beach Time" - a cozy HHI Condo, steps from beach
name: Condo in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Ambrose6 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in September 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: 9/20 21 are available at great discounts. HHI Beach & Tennis is a beachfront resort with complete vacation amenities. Our condo is a first floor condo in Building B, very close to the center of beach activities but far away enough from noise of pool and restaurant. Our condo is just 2-3 minutes from the beach. We provide a clean, safe, comfortable and affordable space for our guests. Our condo is cleaned, sanitized and ozonized. We have a new air system, air purifier and dehumidifier.The spaceWe are steps from two of the four private boardwalks of the resort.  One boardwalk is flat and wide and passes through a large pool and a beach-side restaurant. The other boardwalk has several steps to take to get down to the beach but is less busy.   You can see the top of ocean from the balcony of our condo.  But why strain your neck from any balcony?  Just take 2-3 minutes to go from condo to experience the beach itself.  The beach here is especially wide, flat and clean.  The condo is facing southeast.  In spring and summer, it gets the morning and early afternoon sun but is totally shaded from the blistering summer sun in the afternoon and evening.The queen bed in the bedroom, queen sleeper sofa and bunk beds (76" x 24") provide a capacity for 4 adults and 2 children.  But it is more comfortable for 2 to 4 persons.  Beachfront condos are small.  So, please plan accordingly.We try to provide the safest and most comfortable space possible for our guests.  We have installed a new heating and cooling system and have ductwork professionally cleaned.  The condo and linens are carefully cleaned and sanitized for our guests.  In addition, an ozonizer is used to sanitize the condo before each guest arrival.  Ozone is environmentally friendly, it’s made from oxygen.  It kills bacteria and viruses throughout the condo including the ductwork.  It decomposes back to oxygen afterwards.  In addition, we have an air purifier with plasma wave to kill germs and with HEPA filter to remove dust, pollen, bacteria, viruses and other common air pollutants.  We have installed a dehumidifier to inhibit germ growth and for your cooling comfort.  A new EcoBee thermostat helps regulate temperature and humidity.  Please keep doors closed.  This is as safe and comfortable as I know how as a chemist.  As a chemist, I understand the danger of chemicals on humans.  I don’t use chemicals lightly.  For example, I don’t use pesticides in and around my house.  Keeping house clean and use traps as necessary work great.For your entertainment, we have new 58” and 40” Samsung UHD TV’s equipped with local HD cable and streaming with YouTube TV and Amazon Prime Videos.  We provide high speed Internet at 300/30 mbps.  We provide a Wii console with games, a Wii Fit game with balance board to keep you in shape.    It requires a lot of space, work and effort to bring your own beach equipment especially from long distance.  For your convenience, beach chairs(5), Hi-Boy beach chairs(1), umbrellas(4), beach wagon(1) and some beach and pool toys are provided.  Bring your own favorite beach equipment or use ours.  We are now providing beach towels/blankets. These are oversized (84” x 42”) microfiber towels. They are good for the beach and pool because they are light weight, sand free, soft and quick dry. These can also be used as a blanket for TV watching or as an extra blanket for the bed. They are four in the closet in the hallway. If you use them, just leave them out with other towel, linens for washing when you leave. Please let me know how these towels/blankets work out for you. We provide paper towels, toilet paper, soap, dish washing detergent and dishwasher detergent that usually lasts a week.  We provide most kitchen amenities.  We provide quality towels and linens.  We have installed new combination and dead bolt locks on entrance door.  Water leak sensors protect condo from potential water damages. Please keep WiFi receiver plugged in.If you need to work from home or beach, a home office can be set up with the  48” x 24” adjustable height (24”, 30” or 35”) folding table in front of the bookcase.  A high speed Internet at 300/30 mbps is available.  A HP laser jet B/W printer/scanner are available.  You can even use the Samsung TV's as monitors.

description: Shipyard, Beach, Golf, Tennis, Quiet End Unit
name: Villa in Hilton Head Island
location: Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, United States
unit rental details: Entire villa hosted by John4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in April 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Located in the gated Shipyard Plantation that offers a private residential resort community with recreational facilities that include championship golf and tennis as well as a premier spa and wellness center. Paved paths throughout the 800 acre plantation provides trails for bikes and joggers. Lagoons, sunsets and Spanish moss provide a few of the beautiful backgrounds for picturesque settings.Saturday check in/out from April through AugustThe spaceTHE VILLA This is an absolutely delightful uplifting villa decorated with fun and the island in mind. Spacious, bright, and a short walk to the Shipyard Beach Club. A 1200sf one bedroom, 2 full baths, sleeps up to 4 people and has a new air conditioning system. The kitchen is full of light with a red tiled floor, stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, white cabinets and wall tiles, a large skylight. The living room has wood floors, queen size sleeper sofa with upgraded memory foam mattress and a fireplace. The dining area with a country style wooden table looks out over the ponds and oaks. The bedroom offers a king-sized bed, flat screen tv and private bath. The 2nd bathroom is a full bath with a shower stall. We have a full size washer and dryer. Outside, a large private shaded wrap-around deck also provides views of the ponds, oaks and the golf course for a very tranquil and peaceful setting. After a day fun in the sun it is a very tranquil setting to end the evening.

more description:
The spaceBeachwood Place 1HWhen it comes to Hilton Head Island, there are few places as perfectly located as Beachwood Place 1H. Boasting uninterrupted pool and ocean views, a private furnished balcony, and beach access mere steps away, you won't have any shortage of fun activities right at your fingertips. Not to mention, Coligny Beach Park is less than a mile away where you will find unlimited options for dining, shopping, and beach rentals. When you have had your fill of sandy toes or tanning by the shared pool, kick back inside and enjoy the central AC as a delicious meal simmers in the fully equipped kitchen. Finish each dreamy day on the balcony with a favorite drink in hand or leave the sliding door open as you watch a movie so you can feel that salty breeze lull you into relaxation. Don't hesitate, as this is a rare find in Hilton Head!

Things to Know
Free WiFi
Beach access

This property is managed by Vacasa South Carolina LLC. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 1.Parking notes: There is free parking for 2 vehicles.
